data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 8 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4

data.description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A-Grade weapon

data.description: A scroll of enchantment that relocates you to the nearest village

data.name: Sword of Solidarity
data.description: A bronze sword crafted long ago in memory of the union between the Humans and the Elves

data.name: Broken Sword Handle
data.description: The handle portion of the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Altran

data.name: Broken Blade Bottom
data.description: Take this, and the upper portion of the blade to Blacksmith Altran

data.name: Broken Blade Top
data.description: Take this, and the lower portion of the blade to Blacksmith Altran

data.name: Altran's Note
data.description: A letter requesting the handle of the sword from Roien. Take this to Grand Master Roien of Cedric's Training Hall

data.name: Sword of Sentinel
data.description: A steel blade issued to those fighters that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods

data.description: A staff issued to those magicians that have been acknowledged as protectors of the woods

data.name: Alberius's List

data.name: Gallint's Oak Wand

data.description: An introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Go to the School of Dark Arts, hunt skeletons, and gather 10 bone fragments

data.description: An item used during the exorcism ritual to call upon a spirit of the dead. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon

data.name: Preserving Oil
data.description: An oil that when used, prevents the rotting of corpses. Take this and go hunt zombies in the swamps

data.name: Zombie Head
data.description: The head of tree Elf zombies that have been cut after they are defeated. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon

data.name: Steelbender Head
data.description: Please, I beg of you! Don't take me to that brutal blacksmith!\0

data.name: Blood Saber
data.description: An Oriharukon sword crafted in the Abella style of the east

data.name: 1st Mark of Sentinel
data.description: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Tanuki skullcrusher and report to Sentinel Kendell

data.name: 2nd Mark of Sentinel
data.description: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Bhato bloodspear and report to Sentinel Kendell

data.name: Skullcrusher Amulet
data.description: The amulet that represents the Skullcrusher Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell

data.name: Bloodspear Amulet
data.description: The amulet that represents the Bloodspear Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell

data.name: Red Sunset Sword
data.description: A sword used by warriors belonging to the Red Sunset clan

data.name: Esrandell's Letter
data.description: Esrandell's introduction\0

data.name: Kendell's Letter
data.description: Kendell's letter\0

data.name: 1st Onyx Talisman
data.description: A necklace crafted of onyx. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia

data.name: 2nd Onyx Talisman
data.description: A necklace crafted of onyx. Recover the original scrolls from the blackskull Orcs and bring them to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia

data.name: Ancient Scroll
data.description: An ancient scroll called Kaysha's Revelation. Take it along with the clay tablet to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia

data.name: Ancient Clay Tablet
data.description: An ancient clay tablet engraved with text. Take it along with the ancient scroll to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia

data.name: Kartia's Translation
data.description: Kartia's translation of Kaysha's Revelations. Take it to Tetrarch Thifiell

data.name: Eldritch Dagger
data.description: A steel dagger engraved with the runes of Shilen and Gran Kain

data.name: Harrys's 1st Receipt
data.description: A receipt Harrys received after ordering tools. Take this and go to Blacksmith Altran

data.name: Harrys's 2nd Receipt
data.description: The receipt that Harrys has received after placing an order for his tools. Go and gather golem shards needed for creating the tool

data.name: Golem Shard
data.description: Shards of rock that have fallen from the Golem's body. Gather 5 and take them to Blacksmith Altran

data.name: Tool Box
data.description: A toolbox containing the tools that Blacksmith Altran has forged. Take this to Magister Harrys at the temple

data.name: Delivery List
data.description: Take the heavy wooden box to Trader Jackson. The bolts of cloth to Trader Silvia. Take the clay pot to the warehouse keeper Rant

data.name: Heavy Wood Box
data.description: The wooden box to be delivered to Trader Jackson of the weapons shop

data.name: Cloth Bundle
data.description: Bolts of cloth that need to be delivered to Trader Silvia of the grocery store

data.name: Clay Pot
data.description: The clay pot that must be delivered to the warehouse keeper Rant

data.name: Jackson's Receipt
data.description: The receipt that Jackson has issued upon receiving his wooden box. Take this to Guard Arnold

data.name: Silvia's Receipt
data.description: The receipt that Silvia has issued upon receiving her bolts of cloth. Take this to Guard Arnold

data.name: Rant's Receipt
data.description: The receipt issued by Rant upon his receiving of the clay pot. Take this to Guard Arnold

data.name: Official Letter
data.description: An official letter that the Lord of Gludio has sent to Sir Colin Windawood, calling a meeting. Deliver this to Sir Windawood

data.name: Flame Shard
data.description: A fragment of soul ore of fire. Can be taken from the fire spirit salamander. Give it to Trader Katerina

data.name: Ice Shard
data.description: A fragment of elemental stone of water. Can be taken from the water spirit undine. Give to Trader Katerina

data.name: Lilith's Letter
data.description: A letter written by Lilith in longing for her lover, separated a thousand years ago. Find out news about her lover for her

data.name: Theon's Diary
data.description: A diary written by Theon in longing for his lover, separated a thousand years ago. Take this to Lilith

data.name: Adamantite Ore
data.description: Adamantite ore. All of it is imported from Gracia. Gather 20 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Wilford

data.name: Clay Tablet
data.description: A tablet praising Beleth that the devil Nerkas possessed. Deliver this to High Priest Biotin

data.name: Silvery Spidersilk
data.description: The spider silk of the silver spider. Take this to Trader Unoren of the weapons shop

data.name: Unoren's Receipt
data.description: The receipt issued by the magic shop. Take this and go to Trader Creamees

data.name: Creamees's Ticket
data.description: A ticket issued by the warehouse. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Julia

data.name: Nightshade Leaf
data.description: The leaf of the nightshade plant. Take this to Nerupa

data.name: Cracked Skull
data.description: The cracked skull of the Dark Horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty

data.name: Perfect Skull
data.description: Skull of the dark horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty

data.name: Fox Fur
data.description: A mane of keltirs. It is soft and luxurious, and used to spin thread and yarn. Take this to Cristel

data.name: Fox Fur Yarn
data.description: Yarn spun out of the fur of keltirs. Take this to the former tailor Warehouse Keeper Rolfe, and he will make it into the doll's hair

data.name: Maiden Doll
data.description: A doll resembling a Human maiden. Take this to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell

data.name: Plague Dust
data.description: A powder obtained from the plague zombie. Take this to Hierarch Asterios

data.name: Fruit of the Mother Tree
data.description: Fruit that the Mother Tree bears once every few years. Take this to Andellia

data.name: Rumiel's 1st Poem

data.name: Rumiel's 3rd Poem

data.name: Rumiel's 4th Poem
data.description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fourth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden

data.description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source and obtain five handfuls of plague dust from the zombies

data.name: Gludio Guard's 1st Badge
data.description: A mark that proves guard membership. As Captain Bathis requested, hunt Bugbear Raiders

data.name: Bugbear Necklace
data.description: A necklace worn by Bugbears for incantation purposes. Collect ten of these and visit Captain Bathis

data.name: Einhasad's 1st Temple Badge
data.description: As High Priest Raymond requested, go to the Ruins of Despair, defeat the departed spirits of priests, and collect 12 Einhasad crucifixes

data.name: Einhasad's Crucifix
data.description: A holy symbol of Einhasad, the goddess of light. Collect 12 of these and go to High Priest Raymond

data.name: Gludio Guard's 2nd Badge
data.description: The mark that distinguishes guard membership. As Captain Bezique requested, hunt giant spiders

data.name: Venomous Spider's Leg
data.description: A severed leg of a dead Venomous Spider. Collect twenty of these and go to Captain Bezique

data.name: Einhasad's 2nd Temple Badge
data.description: As High Priest Levian requested, kill Langk lizardmen and collect the proof

data.name: Lizardman's Totem
data.description: A small sculpture Langk lizardmen carry with them. Collect twenty of these and take them to High Priestess Levian

data.name: Gludio Guard's 3rd Badge
data.description: A mark that proves guard membership. As Captain Gilbert requested, hunt giant spiders

data.name: Giant Spider's Husk
data.description: The husk of a giant spider that you peeled off. Collect twenty of these and take them to Captain Gilbert

data.name: Einhasad's 3rd Temple Badge
data.description: As High Priest Biotin requested, hunt silent horrors in the Elven Ruins

data.name: Skull of Silent Horror
data.description: The skull of a long-dead Elf. Collect 10 and take them to High Priest Biotin

data.name: Bezique's Letter
data.description: Captain Bezique's letter to Neti. Find Neti in the Village of Gludin and give her the letter

data.name: Neti's Bow
data.description: A favorite bow used by Neti, who was once a Treasure Hunter. Use it when hunting the skeletons and spartoi of the Ruins of Agony to gather bone pieces

data.name: Neti's Dagger
data.description: Neti used this dagger when she was a Treasure Hunter. Use it when hunting the skeletons and spartoi of the Ruins of Agony to gather bone pieces

data.name: Spartoi's Bones
data.description: Undead bone pieces. Collect 10 and take them to Neti

data.name: Horseshoe of Light
data.description: A proof you received after passing Neti's test. You must take it to Captain Bezique

data.name: Most Wanted List
data.description: It is written that whoever does away with the Cat's Eye bandits and recovers the stolen goods will be rewarded

data.name: Stolen Jewelry
data.description: A fair amount of jewelry the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take them to Captain Bezique

data.name: Stolen Tomes
data.description: A rare tome the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique

data.name: Stolen Ring
data.description: An expensive necklace that the Cat's Eye bandits have stolen. You must take it back to Captain Bezique

data.name: Stolen Necklace
data.description: An expensive necklace the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique

data.name: Bezique's Recommendation
data.description: Take this medallion to the Grand Masters of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Rogue

data.name: 1st Letter of Order
data.description: A certificate of forbidden book collection given by Priest Zigaunt. Carry this around and collect all the forbidden books

data.name: 2nd Letter of Order
data.description: A certificate that proves that you represent the religious body. This certificate is given by Priest Zigaunt. Take this to Lionel for covenant

data.name: Lionel's Book
data.description: The last book of Lioniel. Hand this book to Grand Magister Gallint in the Einhovant School of Magic

data.name: Book of Vivyan
data.description: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Vivyan. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt

data.name: Book of Simplon
data.description: The rest of Simplon's forbidden books. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt

data.name: Book of Praga
data.description: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Praga. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt

data.name: Certificate of Gallint
data.description: A certificate that Gallint gives for safekeeping of forbidden books. Give to Lionel and receive covenant

data.name: Pendant of Mother
data.description: The pendant of his mother that Guard Praga lost in the ruins. Take this to Guard Praga and receive a forbidden book

data.name: Necklace of Mother
data.description: A necklace chain where a pendant used to hang. Recover the pendant from the zombies in the Ruins of Agony to make it complete

data.name: Lionel's Covenant
data.description: Lionel's pledge not to use the forbidden book again. Give it to Priest Zigaunt and receive the mark of faith

data.name: Mark of Faith
data.description: Take this token to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Cleric

data.name: Sorius's Letter
data.description: A letter received from Master Sorius to be given to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin

data.name: Kluto Box
data.description: A box that Kluto asked to give to Master Sorius

data.name: Elven Knight Brooch
data.description: Take this brooch to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild and he will change your occupation to a Knight

data.name: Topaz Piece
data.description: A piece of topaz obtained from the undead in the ruins. Collect 20 to take to Master Sorius

data.name: Emerald Piece
data.description: A piece of emerald obtained from the Ol Mahum Novices. Collect 20 of these to take to Blacksmith Kluto

data.name: Reisa's Letter
data.description: Master Reisa's letter to Guard Moretti. Find Guard Moretti and give him the letter

data.name: Prias's 1st Torn Letter
data.description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti

data.name: Prias's 2nd Torn Letter
data.description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti

data.name: Prias's 3rd Torn Letter
data.description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti

data.name: Prias's 4th Torn Letter
data.description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti

data.name: Moretti's Herb
data.description: An herb that Guard Moretti asked to give to Prias

data.name: Guard's Bow
data.description: A bow given by Guard Moretti. May be efficiently used for some purpose

data.name: Moretti's Letter
data.description: An urgent letter from Guard Moretti to Prias

data.name: Prias's Letter
data.description: A reply of Prias to the letter from Guard Moretti. Hand this to Moretti

data.name: Honorary Guard
data.description: A letter written by Guard Moretti to Master Reisa. Take it to Master Reisa

data.name: Reisa's Recommendation
data.description: Take this recommendation to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Scout

data.name: Rosella's Letter
data.description: A letter from Rosella to Elven Magister Greenis. Related to ruby, the symbol of fire

data.name: Red Down
data.description: Material needed to make ruby of magical powers. Collect 5 and take them to Magister Greenis for the magical power ruby

data.name: Magical Powers Ruby
data.description: Ruby that symbolizes fire. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations

data.name: Pure Aquamarine
data.description: Aquamarine that symbolizes water. Gather the 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations

data.name: Appetizing Apple
data.description: A very ripe apple. Give it to Thalia for information on the aquamarine of water

data.name: Gold Leaves
data.description: Leaves used as fertilizer for the Mother Tree. Collect five leaves and give them to Thalia for an aquamarine

data.name: Immortal Love
data.description: A book Northwind wanted to borrow. If you give this book to Northwind, you can obtain information on the amethyst

data.name: Amethyst
data.description: An amethyst obtained by killing sukar wererat. Give two to Northwind for nobility amethyst

data.name: Nobility Amethyst
data.description: Amethyst that symbolizes wind. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations

data.name: Rosella's Recommendation
data.description: Rosella's recommendation. If you show this to Varsak, you can get information on the fertility peridot

data.name: Peridot
data.description: A peridot you can get if you kill a sniper skeleton. If you collect 3 and show them to Varsak, you can get the fertility peridot

data.name: Fertility Peridot
data.description: A peridot that symbolizes the earth. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations

data.name: Eternity Diamond
data.description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Magician Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Wizard

data.name: Crystal Medallion
data.description: A necklace given by Priest Manuel. Take this and go to the port Gludin to find the girl who works miracles

data.name: Swindler's Money
data.description: Money from Perrin's swindling. Give it to Allana

data.name: Allana's Diary
data.description: A diary with records of fraud miracle. Show this to Priest Manuel as proof

data.name: Lizard Captain Order
data.description: An order of lizard captain to kidnap the sacred flame of prophecy

data.name: Leaf of Oracle
data.description: Take this to the high priest to change your occupation to an Oracle

data.name: Half of Diary
data.description: Half of the diary given by Allana. You must get money from Perrin and find the other half of the diary

data.name: Palus Talisman
data.description: A talisman inscribed with palus runes that symbolize a deep lake. Carry this and hunt lycanthrope in the Neutral Zone

data.name: Lycanthrope Skull
data.description: A skull obtained after killing lycanthrope. Collect thirteen and take them to Master Virgil

data.name: Virgil's Letter
data.description: A letter written by Master Virgil. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta of the village of Gludin

data.name: Morte Talisman
data.description: A talisman with inscription of rune of Morte, symbol of death. Carry this and find materials needed for coffin

data.name: Venomous Spider's Carapace
data.description: The hard carapace of a Venomous Spider. Take this and five Arachnid Tracker Silk threads to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta

data.name: Arachnid Tracker Silk
data.description: Arachnid Tracker web threads. Take five of these and a giant Venomous Spider carapace to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta

data.name: Coffin of Eternal Rest
data.description: A coffin used in funeral of Dark Elven Knight. Take this to Master Virgil

data.name: Gaze of Abyss
data.description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight

data.name: Shilen's Call
data.description: A letter received from Triskel. Go to Witch Arkenia of the Altar of Rites

data.name: Arkenia's Letter
data.description: A letter received from Arkenia. Take this to Guard Leikan to obtain information about the thief

data.name: Leikan's Note
data.description: A simple contract given by Guard Leikan. Must hunt moonstone beasts and collect their molars

data.name: Moonstone Beast's Molar
data.description: A molar obtained after killing a moonstone beast. Collect 10 of these to take to Guard Leikan

data.name: Leikan's Knife
data.description: A knife received as present from Leikan. They say it works well against the Calpicos

data.name: Shilen's Tears
data.description: Magic liquid stolen from the Altar of Rites. Give this to Witch Arkenia

data.name: Arkenia's Recommendation
data.description: A token of thanks received from Arkenia. Take this to Triskel

data.name: Iron Heart
data.description: Take this to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf Guild to change your occupation to an Assassin

data.name: Seed of Anger
data.description: A seed obtained from Charkeren, who is full of anger. Take this to Witch Varika

data.name: Seed of Despair
data.description: A seed obtained from Witch Varika. You must obtain all four seeds to earn the Dark Jewel

data.name: Seed of Horror
data.description: A seed obtained from Annik who is full of horror. Take this to Witch Varika

data.name: Seed of Lunacy
data.description: A seed obtained from a lunatic. Take this to Witch Varika

data.name: Family's Remains
data.description: Remains of Charkeren's slain family. Find 3 and return to Charkeren

data.name: Varika's Liquor
data.description: A medicine Varika made for the son of Duchess Dwell. If you give it to Duchess, you can obtain the Seed of Despair

data.name: Knee Bone
data.description: The knee bone of undead that Annika was looking for. Give this to Annika to obtain the Seed of Horror

data.name: Heart of Lunacy
data.description: The hearts of those who have been turned into skeletons by a sorcerer of lunacy. Collect 3 Hearts of Lunacy and take them to Arkenia

data.name: Dark Jewel
data.description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf guild to change your occupation to a Dark Wizard

data.name: Sidra's Letter
data.description: The letter of introduction written by Magister Sidra. Take this to Magister Talbot

data.name: Blank Sheet
data.description: A blank scroll. Take this and hunt dark succubus to obtain bloody runes

data.name: Bloody Rune
data.description: Runes written with the blood of dark succubus. Collect 5 and take to Magister Talbot

data.name: Garmiel's Book
data.description: The sacred book of Gran Kain, god of darkness, written in elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find

data.name: Prayer of Adonius
data.description: The widely beloved prayer book. Take this to Priest Adonius in the village of Gludin

data.name: Penitent's Mark
data.description: The mark that shows one is in the course of repenting one's sins. Carry this and hunt skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair

data.name: Ashen Bones
data.description: Bones from the skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair. Gather 10 and take them to Priest Adonius

data.name: Andariel Book
data.description: The sacred book of Einhasad, goddess of light, written in the Elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find

data.name: Orb of Abyss
data.description: Take this token to a Grand Master of a Dark Elf Guild in any major city to change your occupation to a Shillien Oracle

data.name: Squire's Mark
data.description: A mark that indicates an esquire. Wander around the villages in Gludio and meet with guard captains and high priests

data.name: Greenis's Charm
data.description: Greenis's good luck charm. Kill pincer spiders and give 5 red down to Greenis

data.name: Sap of the Mother Tree
data.description: Sap of Mother Tree that dryad elders like. Find 5 gold leaves and give them to Thalia

data.name: Lucky Potpourri
data.description: Northwind's lucky potpourri. Give Northwind 2 amethysts obtained from killing sukar wererats

data.name: Tamil's Necklace
data.description: Tamil's necklace. Show it to Perrin

data.name: Kluto's Memo
data.description: A memo from Blacksmith Kluto asking to defeat the Ol Mahum Novices

data.name: Lucky Key
data.description: A bronze key. Hunt zombies in the swamp are collect 3 remains, and take them to Charkeren

data.name: Candle
data.description: A candle that lights up the dark. Collect 2 knee bones from the undead and give them to Annika for the Seed of Horror

data.name: Hub Scent
data.description: Fragrant herb potpourri. Obtain 3 Hearts of Lunacy from a skeleton scout and take them to Arkenia

data.name: Map of Luster
data.description: A map given by the Flame Salamander. Kill ratman fighters and give the key of flame to the salamander in exchange for the token of fire

data.name: Key of Flame
data.description: The key that can be obtained by killing a ratman fighter. When you give it to a salamander, he will give you the token of fire

data.name: Flame Earring
data.description: The token of fire given by fire spirit salamander. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations

data.name: Broken Bronze Mirror
data.description: The mirror given by the Wind Sylph. Go to the lizardmen of the Wastelands and obtain the Wind Feather and return it to the Wind Sylph

data.name: Wind Feather
data.description: The feather hidden by the Wind Sylph near the Wastelands. Return this to the Wind Sylph to receive a Wind Token

data.name: Wind Bangle
data.description: The Wind Token given to you by the Wind Spirit Sylph. Collect all four tokens and give them to Parina to receive a special token that will enable you to change occupations

data.name: Rama's Diary
data.description: Kill water seer and take two sparkle pebbles to water Undine for the token of water

data.name: Sparkle Pebble
data.description: Kill water seer in Lake Fellmere for stones. If you give this to Water Undine, she will give you the token of water

data.name: Water Necklace
data.description: The token of water given by water spirit Undine. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations

data.name: Rusty Coin
data.description: The coin given by earth snake. Kill red bear and give red soil to earth snake for Token of Earth

data.name: Red Soil
data.description: The soil obtained from killing red bear. Give to the earth snake for the token of earth

data.name: Earth Ring
data.description: Token of Earth given by earth snake. Collect 4 tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations

data.name: Bead of Season
data.description: Take this bead to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Wizard

data.name: Rusted Key
data.description: The key that unlocks Prias's shackles. Take this and go to Prias

data.name: Spellbook: Defense Aura
data.description: Spellbook needed to learn Defense Aura. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.\\nRequired level: 5\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.description: A temporary item for Kamex\0

data.name: Brandish
data.description: A two-handed sword for beginners

data.name: Predator's Fang
data.description: Collect 100 predator's fangs and take them to Pixy Murika

data.name: Goblin Club
data.description: A sturdy club made from thick tree branches and carried by goblins. Take this to Treant Bremac

data.name: Glass Shard
data.description: A broken glass piece. Can be sold in any shop for a low price

data.name: Emerald
data.description: Can be sold in any shop for a high price

data.name: Blue Onyx
data.description: A blue jewel. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Onyx
data.description: A black jewel. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Silvery Leaf
data.description: The leaf of a silvery mistletoe. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Bone Arrow
data.description: An arrow made from a piece of sharpened bone. It is used as an arrow for a D-Grade bow

data.name: Steel Arrow
data.description: A powerful arrow made of steel. It is used as an arrow for a C-Grade bow

data.name: Silver Arrow
data.description: A steel arrow plated with silver

data.name: Mithril Arrow
data.description: A steel arrow plated with Mithril

data.name: Shining Arrow
data.description: The most powerful arrow. Unknown material

data.name: Golem's Stoneheart
data.description: A stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Rorento

data.name: Monster Eye Meat
data.description: The carcass of monster eye. Take this to Trader Sarien

data.name: Basilisk's Gizzard
data.description: The digestive organ of a basilisk. Take this to Trader Sarien

data.name: Anatomy Diagram
data.description: A diagram designed by Avella physicians for human anatomy. Use this to perform Samed's request

data.name: Zombie Head
data.description: A head of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed of the town of Gludio

data.name: Zombie Heart
data.description: A heart of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Zombie Liver
data.description: A liver of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Skull
data.description: A skull of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Rib Bone
data.description: A rib of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Spine
data.description: A spine of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Arm Bone
data.description: An arm bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Thigh Bone
data.description: A thigh bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Complete Skeleton
data.description: A complete skeleton put together with bone pieces by undertaker Varsak. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio

data.name: Red Cross Badge
data.description: A soldier badge of foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin

data.name: Blue Cross Badge
data.description: A badge of high ranking of Gracian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin

data.name: Black Cross Badge
data.description: A badge of captain ranking of Gracian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin

data.name: Spider's Carapace
data.description: The hard carapace of a spider. Often used to coat a shield or a helmet. Take this to Trader Arodin

data.name: Spider Silk
data.description: Tough, stretchy spider web. Used to make bowstrings. Take this to Trader Arodin

data.name: Spider's Poison Sac
data.description: A sac with a spider's deadly poison in it. Can be sold to Trader Cullinas in Gludin

data.name: Broken Stoneheart
data.description: A small pieces of stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Rorento

data.name: Monster Eye's Lens
data.description: The transparent part of monster eye. Take this to Trader Sarien

data.name: Wolf Claw
data.description: Collect 50 wolf claws and take them to Trader Payne of the weapons and armor shop

data.name: Imp Shackles
data.description: The metal shackles attached around the neck of the imp race. Take this to Sentry Kristin

data.name: Black Lion Mark
data.description: The mark that indicates one is a member of the Black Lion troop

data.name: Spellbook: Aqua Swirl
data.description: Spellbook needed to learn Aqua Swirl. Used by Elven Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

data.name: Spellbook: Blaze
data.description: Spellbook needed to learn Blaze. Used by Human Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

data.description: An ingredient needed for certain magic

data.name: Greater Haste Potion
data.description: A magical potion that increases movement speed dramatically\0

data.name: Greater Swift Attack Potion
data.description: A magical potion that increases Atk. Spd. dramatically\0

data.name: Guard Spear
data.description: A spear that guards use

data.name: Spellbook: Poison Recovery
data.description: Spellbook needed to learn Poison Recovery. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\\nRequired level: Elven Knight - 20, Elven Scout - 24\0

data.name: Blood Mark
data.description: An item needed to upgrade a clan to level three

data.name: Ingredient List
data.description: A list of cooking ingredients from Jonas. Mandragora essence. Honey. Dionian potato. Marsh moss. Floating eye meat

data.name: Sonia's Botany Book
data.description: A picture that shows what a mandragora looks like. You need this to get mandragora roots

data.name: Red Mandragora Root
data.description: Red mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia

data.name: White Mandragora Root
data.description: Rare white mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia

data.name: Red Mandragora Sap
data.description: Red mandragora sap. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: White Mandragora Sap
data.description: Transparent mandragora sap. One of the ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Jacob's Insect Book
data.description: A diagram that depicts the drawing of a bee. You must possess this in order to obtain nectar and royal jelly from the bloody bee or the stinger wasp

data.name: Nectar
data.description: Honey water taken from a giant bee. Collect 20 of these to take them to Guard Jacob

data.name: Royal Jelly
data.description: A rare ingredient that can be taken only from newborn working bees. Collect these and take them to Guard Jacob

data.name: Honey
data.description: Honey made from the nectar you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Golden Honey
data.description: Golden honey made from the nectar and the royal jelly you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Pano's Contract
data.description: A contract Grocer Pano gave you. It says, if you kill Hobgoblins and bring 30 pieces of proof, he will give you potatoes as a reward

data.name: Hobgoblin Amulet
data.description: An amulet made of a feather that Hobgoblins carry on their bodies. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Pano

data.name: Dionian Potato
data.description: The highest-quality potatoes grown in the rich soil of southern Dion. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Glyvka's Botany Book
data.description: A picture that explains how to collect moss. You need this to collect marsh moss from grey ants or crimson ants

data.name: Green Marsh Moss
data.description: Green marsh moss is sometimes used in cooking. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka

data.name: Brown Marsh Moss
data.description: Rare brown marsh moss, its flavors are superior to the green ones. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka

data.name: Green Moss Bundle
data.description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Brown Moss Bundle
data.description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Rollant's Creature Book
data.description: A picture that shows what a monster eye looks like. You need this to collect the right monster eye searcher or the monster eye gazer

data.name: Body of Monster Eye
data.description: Severed flesh of the dead body of monster eye. Take this to Magister Rollant

data.name: Monster Eye Meat
data.description: The dead body of a monster eye, ready to cook. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking

data.name: Jonas's 1st Steak Dish
data.description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien

data.name: Harpy Feather
data.description: A feather taken from a harpy. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton

data.name: Medusa Venom
data.description: Poison extracted from the snake hair of a medusa. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton

data.name: Wyrm's Tooth
data.description: A sharp fang of a Wyrm. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton

data.description: Jonas's recipe for making marsh moss salad

data.name: Gludin Panacen
data.description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio

data.name: Gludin Vermouth
data.description: Medicated wine from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio

data.name: Artemeter
data.description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio

data.name: Kasha Wolf Fang
data.description: A fang that is obtained by killing a kasha wolf. Collect fifty and take these to Praetorian Rukain

data.name: Grave Robber's Head
data.description: The head of goblin robbers, who damaged the graves of Orc ancestors. Collect 50 to take to Seer Livina

data.name: Black Soulstone
data.description: A black soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees

data.name: Red Soulstone
data.description: A red soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees

data.name: Maraku Werewolf Head
data.description: The head of a Maraku werewolf that has been cut off after they were defeated. Collect 40 of these and take them to Prefect Brukurse

data.name: Darkwing Bat Fang
data.description: A fang of a darkwing bat. Collect 70 of these and take them to Neruga Chief Tantus

data.name: Varangka's Parasite
data.description: An evil parasite that summons Varangka's trackers

data.name: Kasha Parasite
data.description: A parasite-type evil spirit that comes out of the gray bear polluted by kasha's evil spirit. This is the key calling forth the kasha totem spirit

data.name: Kasha Crystal
data.description: A crystal obtained by killing the gray bear totem polluted by kasha's evil spirit. Take this to Seer Tanapi

data.name: Black Wolf Pelt
data.description: Pelt of a black wolf. Collect 40 to take to Maryse Redbonnet

data.name: Goblin Necklace
data.description: A necklace obtained by killing a low-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron

data.name: Goblin Pendant
data.description: A necklace obtained by killing a high-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron

data.name: Goblin Lord Pendant
data.description: A necklace obtained by killing the goblin lord. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron

data.name: Suspicious Memo
data.description: A suspicious memo obtained by killing a goblin brigand leader. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron

data.name: Suspicious Contract
data.description: A suspicious contract completed by collecting suspicious memos. This contract reveals that the Silver Scale Guild requested the brigands to attack the freight wagons

data.name: Chrysolite Ore
data.description: Chrysolite Ore received from defeating Utuku Orcs. Collect these and take them to Filaur of the Gray Pillar

data.name: Torn Map Fragment
data.description: A part of the map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. Collect 4 of these pieces to complete the map

data.name: Hidden Ore Map
data.description: A map that reveals a hidden vein of Chrysolite. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar

data.name: Bat Fang
data.description: A fang taken by killing a blade bat or a barb bat. Collect 100 and take them to Bronze Key's Keef\0

data.name: Floating Stone
data.description: A stone that floats on water. Obtain it from a magical weaver. Collect 50 and take them to Black Anvil's Arin

data.name: Tarantula Spider Silk
data.description: The spider silk that makes when making their nests. Collect these and take them to Trader Mion

data.name: Tarantula Spinnerette
data.description: A pocket shaped organ that makes spider silk. Take this to Defender Nathan

data.name: Giant Spider's Skin
data.description: The husk of a giant spider that you peel off. Collect them and take them to Edmond

data.name: Voucher of Flame
data.description: This token represents the qualification of Orc fighters. Take this and go to the Flame Guardian Vulkus

data.name: Necklace of Flame
data.description: The necklace of flame given by Vulkus. Hand this to Kakai, the Lord of Flame, king of the Orcs

data.name: License of Miner
data.description: A license given to Dwarves to allow them to mine. Take this and go to Foreman Laferon

data.name: Laferon's Recommendation
data.description: The recommendation of Foreman Laferon. Take this and go to First Elder Lockirin

data.name: Totem of Hestui
data.description: The totem of the Hestui. Can be sold in any shop for a high price

data.name: Maraku Werewolf Totem
data.description: Maraku Wolfmen Totem. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Grandma's Pearl
data.description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop for a high price

data.name: Grandma's Mirror
data.description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Grandma's Necklace
data.description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Grandma's Hairpin
data.description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop

data.name: Necklace of Courage
data.description: A necklace that is given to young Orcs who have proven their courage

data.name: Necklace of Valor
data.description: A necklace that is given to young Orcs who have proven their valor

data.name: Ring of Raccoon
data.description: A ring given to apprentices of the Bronze Key Guild

data.name: Ring of Firefly
data.description: A ring given to apprentices of the Black Anvil Guild

data.name: Butcher's Sword
data.description: A sword granted to young Orc Fighters who distinguished themselves at war

data.name: Silversmith Hammer
data.description: A hammer silversmiths of the ancient Elmoreden used

data.name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to the nearest village\0

data.name: Greater Healing Potion
data.description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. Its effect lasts for 15 seconds

custom.name: Healing Potion
custom.description: Potion that quickly restores HP. Effect lasts for 15 seconds

data.name: Quick Healing Potion
data.description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP

data.name: Honey Khandar
data.description: A miraculous medicine made of the mixture of honey and khandar extract. Take this to Centurion Nakusin

data.name: Bear Fur Cloak
data.description: A cloak made of grizzly bear's fur. Excellent for keeping warm. Take this to Centurion Nakusin

data.name: Bloody Axe
data.description: An axe that holds the blood of wild animals. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin

data.name: Ancestor Skull
data.description: A skull of an ancestor of Urutus. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin

data.name: Spider Dust
data.description: A grain of powder made of dried legs of poisonous spiders. Smelling it will make you feel refreshed. Take this to Centurion Nakusin

data.name: Deep Sea Orb
data.description: A pearl brought out of a deep sea. It is said to help predict the future. Take this to Centurion Nakusin

data.name: Bolter's List
data.description: The list of things that Bolter wants you to bring from the village

data.name: Mining Boots
data.description: A pair of mining boots you got from Trader Garita. Take this to Miner Bolter

data.name: Miner's Pick
data.description: A miner's pick you got from Blacksmith Brunon. Take this to Miner Bolter

data.name: Boomboom Powder
data.description: A sack of boomboom powder you got from Trader Shari. Take this to Miner Bolter

data.name: Redstone Beer
data.description: Delicious beer you got from Warehouse Chief Reed. Take this to Miner Bolter

data.name: Bolter's Smelly Socks
data.description: A pair of socks that Miner Bolter gave you. For what...?\0

data.name: Hatos's 1st Order
data.description: The order to kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Hatos's 2nd Order
data.description: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Hatos's 3rd Order
data.description: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Letter to Dark Elf
data.description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Dark Elven Magister Kaland. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Letter to Human
data.description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Duke Van Halter. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Letter to Elf
data.description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Elven Master Laria. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Gouph's Contract
data.description: Collector Gouph drew up this contract when buying the star diamond from Trader Reep. Take this to Trader Reep

data.name: Reep's Contract
data.description: Trader Reep drew up this contract when he requested the delivery of the star diamond. Take this to Carrier Torocco

data.name: Elven Wine
data.description: Carrier Torocco bought this high quality wine to give it to his old friend, Maron, as a present. Take this to Miner Maron

data.name: Brunon's Dice
data.description: These dice were specially made for gambling. Take these to Blacksmith Brunon

data.name: Brunon's Contract
data.description: This contract says if Brunon gets the 20 stolen jewels back from goblins, he can get the star diamond back

data.name: Aquamarine
data.description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon

data.name: Chrysoberyl
data.description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon

data.name: Gem Box
data.description: Blacksmith Brunon gives this gem box. Take it to Collector Gouph

data.name: Coal Piece
data.description: This coal piece is in the gem box. Take this to Blacksmith Brunon

data.name: Brunon's Letter
data.description: Blacksmith Brunon sends this letter to Warehouse Keeper Murdoc asking for the right box

data.name: Berry Tart
data.description: Sweet strawberry-flavored tart. Warehouse Keeper Murdoc sends this to Warehouse Keeper Airy as a present of apology

data.name: Bat Diagram
data.description: This diagram shows the blade bat in details. Take this and go hunt blade bats to obtain the star diamond

data.name: Star Diamond
data.description: Everyone is looking for this diamond. Take this to the real owner

data.name: Starstone
data.description: A mineral collected from the destroyed greystone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gatekeeper Tamil

data.name: Starstone
data.description: A mineral obtained by defeated whinstone golems. Collect twenty and take them to Gatekeeper Wirphy

data.name: Mirien's Review
data.description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this and go to Jonas

data.name: Mirien's Review
data.description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas

data.description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas

data.name: Mirien's Review
data.description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas

data.name: Green Blood
data.description: Goblin's blood. If you have enough of this item, the Kuruka ratman leader appears

data.name: Goblin Dwelling Map
data.description: A map showing goblins' dwelling. Take this and find the goblin tribes and destroy them

data.name: Kuruka Ratman Tooth
data.description: A tooth obtained after killing Kuruka ratman leader. Collect ten of these to take to Prefect Karukia

data.name: Betrayer's Report
data.description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest

data.name: Head of Betrayer
data.description: The head of a traitor orc. Collect 2 and take them to Prefect Kasman in Gludin Village

data.name: Mark of Raider
data.description: A necklace given to an Orc who has earned the qualification to become an Orc Raider. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Raider

data.name: Pomegranate
data.description: A red pomegranate fruit given by Gantaki. Take this and go to Khavatari Rosheek

data.name: 1st Leather Pouch
data.description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this and hunt kasha bears and collect 5 of their claws

data.name: 2nd Leather Pouch
data.description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Hunt kasha blade spiders with this and collect 5 talons

data.name: 3rd Leather Pouch
data.description: A leather pouch Khavatari Rosheek gave you. Take this while hunting scarlet salamanders to obtain 5 of their scales

data.name: 1st Leather Pouch (Full)
data.description: A pouch that contains 5 kasha bear claws. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek

data.name: 2nd Leather Pouch (Full)
data.description: A pouch that contains 5 pincers of kasha blade spider talon. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek

data.name: 3rd Leather Pouch (Full)
data.description: A pouch that contains 5 scales from the scarlet salamander. Take this to Khavatari Rosheek

data.name: Kasha Bear Claw
data.description: A claw pulled out from a kasha bear after killing it. Collect 5 of these

data.name: Kasha Blade Spider Talon
data.description: A talon pulled out from a kasha blade spider after killing it. Collect 5 of these

data.name: Scarlet Salamander Scale
data.description: A scale of a scarlet salamander. Collect 5 of these

data.name: Fiery Spirit Scroll
data.description: The first scroll containing secret of kabart, the Orcs' traditional martial arts

data.name: Rosheek's Letter
data.description: A letter written by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this to Gantaki Zu Urutu

data.name: Gantaki's Letter of Recommendation
data.description: Gantaki's letter of recommendation. Receive the help of Gatekeeper Tamil and take this recommendation to Prefect Kasman in the Village of Gludin

data.name: Fig
data.description: A fig given by Prefect Kasman. Take this to Khavatari Toruku

data.name: 4th Leather Pouch
data.description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Toruku. Take this, kill fighters of various races and collect 12 tokens

data.name: 4th Leather Pouch (Full)
data.description: A full pouch of 12 tokens after killing fighters of various races. Take this to Khavatari Toruku

data.name: Vuku Orc Tusk
data.description: A tusk obtained after killing a vuku Orc. Gather 3 of these

data.name: Ratman Fang
data.description: A fang from a dead ratman fighter. Gather 3 of these

data.name: Langk Lizardman Tooth
data.description: A tooth obtained after killing a Langk lizardman. Gather 3 of these

data.name: Felim Lizardman Tooth
data.description: A tooth obtained after killing the Felim lizardman. Gather 3 of these

data.name: Iron Will Scroll
data.description: The second scroll that contains secret of the Orcs' traditional martial arts, Kabart

data.name: Toruku's Letter
data.description: A letter from Khavatari Toruku. Take this to Prefect Kasman

data.name: Khavatari Totem
data.description: A token given to one who has qualifications to change occupations to Orc Monk. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Monk

data.name: Fire Charm
data.description: A charm with inscription of fire mantra. Take this and find the 3 items that Tataru spoke of

data.name: Kasha Bear Pelt
data.description: A pelt of kasha bear. Take to Tataru along with kasha bladespider husk and fiery egg

data.name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
data.description: The husk of a kasha blade spider. Take it to Tatar along with a kasha bear pelt and a fiery egg

data.name: 1st Fiery Egg
data.description: A spirit egg obtained from a scarlet salamander. Take it to Tataru along with a kasha bear pelt and a kasha bladespider husk

data.name: Hestui Mask
data.description: A mask in shape of bear. Take this and go to Hestui totem spirit

data.name: 2nd Fiery Egg
data.description: A spirit egg received from a scarlet salamander. Take this to the Hestui totem spirit

data.name: Totem Spirit Claw
data.description: A claw received from Hestui totem spirit. Take this and go to Tataru

data.name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
data.description: A letter written by Tataru. Take this to Seer Umos in the town of Gludin

data.name: Flame Charm
data.description: A charm with inscription of flame mantra. Take this and gather grizzly blood and take to Seer Umos

data.name: Grizzly Blood
data.description: A glass bottle filled with grizzly blood. Gather 3 and take to Seer Umos

data.name: Blood Cauldron
data.description: A cauldron filled with grizzly blood. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit

data.name: Spirit Net
data.description: A net made with Spirit's Spider Silk. Use this to capture Durka Spirit hidden inside Venomous Spiders

data.name: Bound Durka Spirit
data.description: Durka spirit bound inside Spirit Net. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit

data.name: Durka Parasite
data.description: An evil parasite spirit that comes out from spiders contaminated with the evil durka spirit. It is the key for calling upon the evil durka spirit

data.name: Totem Spirit Blood
data.description: Blood spilt by the Duda-Mara totem spirit. Take this and go to Seer Umos

data.name: Mask of Medium
data.description: A token that shows one has the qualifications to become an Orc Shaman. Take this to the high prefect, to change your occupation to an Orc Shaman

data.name: Silvera's Ring
data.description: A ring given to artisan aspirants by Blacksmith Silvera. Strike down the boogle ratman gang and collect their front teeth

data.name: 1st Pass Certificate
data.description: The certificate for passing the 1st artisan test. To take the next test, you must go to Blacksmith Kluto of the village Gludin

data.name: 2nd Pass Certificate
data.description: The certificate for passing the 2nd artisan test. Take this and go to Blacksmith Kluto in Gludin

data.name: Final Pass Certificate
data.description: The certificate for passing the final Artisan test. Take this to the head blacksmith to change occupations to an Artisan

data.name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
data.description: The ugly front bucktooth of a boogle ratman. Just looking at it will make you nauseous. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera

data.name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Tooth
data.description: The boogle ratman leader's big tooth. Before its stink makes you pass out, collect 2 of them and take them to Blacksmith Silvera

data.name: Kluto's Letter
data.description: Blacksmith Kluto's letter. Take to Blacksmith Pinter in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Footprint of Thief
data.description: Trace left by thieves. Kill Vuku Orc fighters, recover stolen items and take them to Blacksmith Pinter

data.name: Stolen Secret Box
data.description: A secret box stolen by Vuku orc fighters. The contents of the box are unknown, but anyway, take it to Blacksmith Pinter

data.name: Secret Box
data.description: A secret box received from Pinter. The contents are unknown, but do not worry and take it to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin

data.name: Ring of Raven
data.description: A mark certifying that one has earned the right to become a Scavenger. If you take it to a Warehouse Chief, you can transfer your class to Scavenger

data.name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
data.description: A letter of introduction written by Collector Pipi. Take this to Trader Mion

data.name: Raut's Teleport Scroll
data.description: An order sheet given by Warehouse Freightman Raut. Give it to Torai, in the south of Death Pass

data.name: Succubus Undies
data.description: The underwear of Succubus received from Torai. Take this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin

data.name: Mion's Letter
data.description: A letter sent from Trader Mion to her brother. Take this letter and go to Master Toma

data.name: Bear Picture
data.description: A picture of a bear received by Master Toma. Take this to hunt hunter bears, then the honey bear will appear

data.name: Tarantula Picture
data.description: A picture of spider received by Master Toma. Use this to hunt tarantulas

data.name: Honey Jar
data.description: A honey jar taken from a honey bear. Collect 5 and take them to Master Toma

data.name: Bead
data.description: A bead obtained from tarantula. Gather 20 of these and give to Master Toma

data.name: Bead Parcel
data.description: A parcel made of beads. Give this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin

data.name: Gatekeeper Charm
data.description: Used to teleport from the Orc Village to Gludin

data.name: Gatekeeper Token
data.description: Used to teleport from the Dwarven Village to Gludin

data.name: Cursed Maingauche
data.description: Cursed Maingauche. Although its P. Atk. is weak, it gives bleeding effect with a certain rate during a critical attacks

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
data.description: A scroll that relocates you to your clan hall. If you don't have a clan hall, it will relocate you to the nearest village

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Castle
data.description: A scroll that relocates you to your castle. If you don't have a castle, it will relocate you to the nearest village

data.name: Antidote
data.description: A reagent that neutralizes poison

data.name: Greater Antidote
data.description: A high-quality reagent that neutralizes powerful poison

data.name: Bandage
data.description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding when injured

data.name: Emergency Dressing
data.description: A medical bandage that stops bleeding fast when severely injured

data.name: Soulshot: No Grade
data.description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a No grade weapon

data.name: Kendell's 1st Order
data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Uoph. He should be somewhere around the ruins over the hill, west of the Elven Village

data.name: Kendell's 2nd Order
data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Kracha. He should be somewhere around the Nine obelisk, southwest of the Elven Village

data.name: Kendell's 3rd Order
data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Batoh. He should be somewhere around the entrance of the underground fortress of the Elves

data.name: Kendell's 4th Order
data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Tanukia. He should be somewhere around the open-air theatre ruins, southwest of the Elven Village

data.name: Kendell's 5th Order
data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Turel. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, northwest of Lake Iris

data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Roko. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, west of Lake Iris

data.name: Kendell's 8th Order
data.description: Punish Kaboo Chief Murtika. He should be somewhere around the seashore ruins, east of Lake Iris
