data.name: Mark of Challenger
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Challenger. An item for occupational change

data.name: Letter of Kash
data.description: Kash's introduction letter. Take this letter to Martien in Town of Giran

data.name: Watcher's 1st Eye
data.description: An item obtained from the monster, Gorr. Take this to Martien in Town of Giran

data.name: Watcher's 2nd Eye
data.description: An item obtained from the monster, Baraham. Show this to Raldo and..

data.name: Scroll of Shyslassys
data.description: An ancient scroll obtained by slaying Shyslassys. Take this to Kash in the Town of Dion

data.name: Broken Key
data.description: A key obtained by slaying Shyslassys. This key is needed in order to open the Chest of Shyslassys

data.name: Mark of Duty
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of Duty. An item for occupational change

data.name: Letter of Dustin
data.description: A letter given by Dustin. Deliver the letter to Grand Master Hannavalt in Town of Giran

data.name: Knight's Tear
data.description: Obtained from the spirit of Sir Herod. Take this to Sir Aaron Tanford

data.name: Mirror of Orpic
data.description: This is needed in order to speak with the ghost of Sir Talianus. Use this to defeat the hangman tree

data.name: Tear of Confession
data.description: Obtained from the ghost of Sir Talianus. Take this to Sir Kiel Nighthawk

data.name: Report Piece
data.description: You may obtain this by hunting strains and ghouls. Gather 10 pieces and put them together to create Talianus's report

data.name: Report Piece
data.description: The completed report. After speaking with Sir Kiel Nighthawk, deliver the report to the ghost of Sir Talianus

data.name: Tear of Loyalty
data.description: This item can be obtained from Isael Silvershadow. Take it to Priest Dustin

data.name: Militas Article
data.description: You can receive this item when you catch a Leto lizardman. Collect 20 of them and take them to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Saints Ashes Urn
data.description: An object received from Priest Dustin. Deliver this to Sir Windawood

data.name: Athebaldt's Skull
data.description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's shin

data.name: Athebaldt's Ribs
data.description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's skull and Athebaldt's shin

data.name: Athebaldt's Shin
data.description: You can obtain this item from a Breka orc overlord. Take it to Priest Dustin along with Athebaldt's ribs and Athebaldt's skull

data.name: Letter of Windawood
data.description: A letter received from Sir Colin Windawood. Show this to Priest Dustin

data.name: Dufners Letter
data.description: A letter sent from Master Dufner to Master Terry in the Town of Dion

data.name: Terry's 1st Order
data.description: Investigate the neer ghoul berserkers of the Execution Grounds

data.name: Terry's 2nd Order
data.description: Investigate the Ol Mahum captain, Turek orc warlord, ant captain and Turak bugbear warrior

data.name: Terry's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Master Terry to Trader Viktor of Hunters Village

data.name: Viktor's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Trader Viktor to Master Terry in the Town of Dion. The letter has Terry's seal

data.name: Hawkeye's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Hawkeye to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village

data.name: Mysterious Spirit Ore
data.description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying neer ghoul berserkers. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Ol Mahum Spirit Ore
data.description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Ol Mahum captain. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Turek Spirit Ore
data.description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turek orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Ant Spirit Ore
data.description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Turak Bugbear Spirit Ore
data.description: A mysterious Spirit Ore obtained after slaying the Turak bugbear warrior. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Terry's Box
data.description: A chest containing the mysterious Spirit Ore. Take this to Trader Viktor of the Hunters Village

data.name: Viktor's Request
data.description: A request issued by Trader Viktor. "Please gather 10 medusa scales."\0

data.name: Medusa Scales
data.description: The scales of the medusa. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Viktor

data.name: Shilen's Spirit Ore
data.description: Strange Spirit Ore obtained from the bodies of mutant species. They seem to be related to Shilen, the goddess of death

data.name: Analysis Request
data.description: A request letter sent to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower from Trader Viktor. The letter asks Marina to analyze the dark bezoar

data.name: Marina's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Magister Marina to Blacksmith Brunon of the Dwarven Village

data.name: Experiment Tools
data.description: Experimental tools crafted by Blacksmith Brunon. Deliver these to Magister Marina of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Analysis Result
data.description: A document where Magister Marina has organized the analyzed results of the Dark Bezoar. Deliver this to Master Terry in the Town of Dion

data.name: Terry's 3rd Order
data.description: Master Terry's orders. The orders give instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36

data.name: List of Host
data.description: A list of the bezoar hosts. "Marsh stakato drone, Breka orc overlord, ant warrior captain, Leto lizardman warrior"\0

data.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
data.description: The dark bezoar retrieved from the body of a marsh stakato drone. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
data.description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Breka orc overlord. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
data.description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the ant captain. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Abyss Spirit Ore
data.description: The Spirit Ore retrieved from the body of the Leto lizardman warrior. Take this to Master Terry

data.name: Terry's Report
data.description: A report detailing information about the Spirit Ore incident. Take this to Master Dufner of Town of Giran

data.name: Mark of Seeker
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Seeker. An occupation change related item

data.name: Mark of Scholar
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Scholar. An occupation change related item

data.name: Mirien's 1st Sigil
data.description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete High Priest Sylvain's request

data.name: Mirien's 2nd Sigil
data.description: A mark given by Magister Mirien while giving orders to complete Grand Magister Jurek's request

data.name: Mirien's 3rd Sigil
data.description: A mark given by Magister Mirien when giving orders to complete Elder Cronos's request

data.name: Mirien's Instruction
data.description: A note that contains Magister Mirien's instructions. The note gives instructions to come back for the next task after reaching level 36

data.name: Maria's 1st Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Maria to Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion

data.name: Maria's 2nd Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Maria to Astrologer Creta of the village of Floran

data.name: Lucas's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Captain Lucas in the Town of Dion to Maria

data.name: Lucilla's Handbag
data.description: The handbag left by Maria's friend Lucillas on the night of the theft. Take this to Astrologer Creta

data.name: Creta's 1st Letter
data.description: A letter sent by the Astrologer Creta to Maria in the Town of Dion

data.name: Creta's Painting1
data.description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Maria

data.name: Creta's Painting2
data.description: A painting by Astrologer Creta. It contains a shadow presumed to be that of the thief. Take this to Captain Lucas

data.name: Creta's Painting3
data.description: A painting painted by Astrologer Creta. The shadow in the painting is that of a Leto lizardman warrior

data.name: Brown Scroll Scrap
data.description: A scrap of a scroll that contains directions on how to create the crystal of purity. Gather 5 of these and take them to Maria

data.name: Crystal of Purity
data.description: A crystal used to purify the earth. Take this to High Priest Sylvain in the Town of Dion

data.name: High Priest's Sigil
data.description: A mark received from High Priest Sylvain. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the High Priest

data.name: Grand Magister's Sigil
data.description: A mark received from Grand Magister Jurek. A proof given to those who are carrying out the orders of the Grand Magister

data.name: Crono's Sigil
data.description: A mark received from Elder Cronos. This signifies proof that someone is carrying out orders from Elder Cronos

data.name: Sylvain's Letter
data.description: High Priest Sylvain's letter. Take this to Maria in the Town of Dion

data.name: Symbol of Sylvain
data.description: A symbol given to those who have passed High Priest Sylvain's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion

data.name: Jurek's List
data.description: The list of evil creatures that Grand Magister Jurek asked you to investigate: Monster eye destroyer, Breka orc shaman, and shackle

data.name: Monster Eye Destroyer's Skin
data.description: A beamer's skin. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran

data.name: Shaman's Necklace
data.description: A Breka orc shaman's necklace. Gather 5 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek in Town of Giran

data.name: Shackle's Scalp
data.description: Skin of the shackle's head. Gather 2 of these and take them to Grand Magister Jurek of Town of Giran

data.name: Symbol of Jurek
data.description: A symbol given to those who have passed Grand Magister Jurek's test. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion

data.name: Cronos Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Elder Cronos to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran

data.name: Dieter's Key
data.description: A key to the chest where Dieter has hidden the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Astrologer Creta in Floran Village

data.name: Creta's 2nd Letter
data.description: Creta's letter describing the theft of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Take this to Magister Dieter in the Town of Giran

data.name: Dieter's Letter
data.description: A letter from Magister Dieter to Trader Edroc of the weapons shop of Hunters Village

data.name: Dieter's Diary
data.description: Magister Dieter's Diary, given by him in hopes that it may be of aid in recovering the Scriptures of Knowledge

data.name: Raut's Letter Envelope
data.description: A plain letter envelope with no contents. The envelope is addressed "To Warehouse Keeper Raut"

data.name: Triff's Ring
data.description: A ring given by Drunkard Triff. Show this ring to those whom Triff has entrusted with the Scriptures of Knowledge

data.name: Scripture Chapter 1
data.description: The 1st book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books

data.name: Scripture Chapter 2
data.description: The 2nd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books

data.name: Scripture Chapter 3
data.description: The 3rd book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books

data.name: Scripture Chapter 4
data.description: The 4th book of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Gather all 4 books

data.name: Valkon's Request
data.description: Warehouse Keeper Valkon's request. The instructions are to bring back the crystal of purity

data.name: Poitan's Notes
data.description: Blacksmith Poitan's accounting books. Take this to Elder Casian of the Wastelands

data.name: Scriptures of Knowledge
data.description: A scripture edited by Elder Cronos. It is said to contain a vast knowledge of the past. It is part of a 4-scripture set

data.name: Strong Liquor
data.description: As its name indicates, a strong liquor. Take this to Drunkard Triff at the harbor

data.name: Crystal of Purity
data.description: An item that Warehouse Keeper Valkon in Town of Giran agreed to trade with you for scripture chapter 2

data.name: Casian's List
data.description: 10 ghoul's skins, 12 units of medusa's blood, 5 units of fettered soul's ichor, and 5 enchanted gargoyle's nails

data.name: Ghoul's Skin
data.description: The skin of a ghoul. Gather 10 of these and take them to Elder Casian

data.name: Medusa's Blood
data.description: Medusa's Blood. Gather 12 bottles and take them to Elder Casian

data.name: Fettered Soul's Ichor
data.description: The ichor of a fettered soul. Gather 5 units and take them to Elder Casian

data.name: Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail
data.description: The enchanted nails of a gargoyle. Gather 5 of these and take them to Elder Casian

data.name: Symbol of Cronos
data.description: The mark of Cronos, the top sage of the continent. Take this to Magister Mirien in the Town of Dion

data.name: Mark of Pilgrim
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Pilgrim. An occupation change related item

data.name: Book of Sage
data.description: A book received from Elder Casian. Take this book to Hermit Santiago

data.name: Voucher of Trial
data.description: A mark given by Hermit Santiago. Show this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village

data.name: Spirit of Flame
data.description: Proof that you have an understanding of the spirit of flame. In order to carry out the next stage of this trial, go see Gauri Twinklerock of Dwarven Village

data.name: Essence of Flame
data.description: A jewel obtained from the lava salamander. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus

data.name: Book of Gerald
data.description: A book given by Priest Gerald. The book looks very cheap

data.name: Gray Badge
data.description: A badge given by Wanderer Dorf. Take this to Priest Primos at Town of Giran

data.name: Picture of Nahir
data.description: A picture of the monster, Nahir. Defeat Nahir, who lurks in the depths of the Elven Ruins on Talking Island

data.name: Hair of Nahir
data.description: The hair of the monster, Nahir. Take this to Priest Petron

data.name: Statue of Einhasad
data.description: A statue of Einhasad given by Priest Petron. Take this to Andelli who lives near the Mother Tree Glade in the Elven Village

data.name: Book of Darkness
data.description: A book given by Uruha. The book contains unrecognizable letters written in blood

data.name: Debris of Willow
data.description: Debris obtained from the black willow. Go and seek Uruha while in possession of this

data.name: Tag of Rumor
data.description: This contains rumors regarding Wanderer Dorf and Priest Gerald

data.name: Mark of Trust
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Trust. An occupation change related item

data.name: Letter to Elf
data.description: A letter requesting the trust of the Elves. Deliver this to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village

data.name: Letter to Dark Elf
data.description: A letter requesting the trust of the Dark Elves. Deliver this to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elven Village

data.name: Letter to Dwarf
data.description: A letter requesting the trust of the Dwarves. Deliver this to Lockirin of the Dwarven Village

data.name: Letter to Orc
data.description: A letter requesting the trust of the Orcs. Deliver this to the Pa'agrio Lord Kakai at the Orc Village

data.name: Letter to Seresin
data.description: A letter given by High Priest Hollint. Deliver this to Cardinal Seresin at the Town of Oren

data.name: Scroll of Dark Elf Trust
data.description: A scroll given by Tetrarch Thifiell. Deliver this, along with the scroll of the Elf trust, to High Priest Hollint

data.name: Scroll of Elf Trust
data.description: This item can be obtained from Hierarch Asterios. Give this item along with scroll of Dark Elf trust to High Priest Hollint

data.name: Scroll of Dwarf Trust
data.description: A scroll given by Lockirin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this, along with the scroll of Orc trust, to Cardinal Seresin

data.name: Scroll of Orc Trust
data.description: A scroll given by Kakai, Lord of Flame. Deliver this, along with the scroll of Dwarf trust, to Cardinal Seresin

data.name: Recommendation of Hollint
data.description: Deliver this to High Priest Biotin at the Temple of Einhasad on Talking Island

data.name: Order of Asterios
data.description: Slay Luell of Zephyr Winds and Actea of Verdant Wilds and bring back proof of their deaths

data.name: Breath of Winds
data.description: Obtained from Luell of Zephyr Winds. Deliver this, along with the seed of verdure to Hierarch Asterios

data.name: Seed of Verdure
data.description: A proof obtained from Actea of Verdant Wilds. Deliver this, along with the breath of winds, to Hierarch Asterios

data.name: Letter from Thifiell
data.description: Deliver this to Magister Clayton, member of the Dark Elf Guild, in the Town of Dion

data.name: Guardian Basilisk Blood
data.description: Blood taken from a Guardian Basilisk. Collect 5 to produce Basilisk Plasma

data.name: Giant Aphid
data.description: Acquired from various Ant Soldiers. Collect 5 to create Honey Dew

data.name: Stakatos Fluids
data.description: Fluid acquired from various Marsh Stakatos. Collect 5 to produce Stakato Ichor

data.name: Basilisk Plasma
data.description: Take this, along with the honey dew and stakato ichor, to Magister Clayton

data.name: Honey Dew
data.description: Take this, along with the basilisk plasma and stakato ichor, to Magister Clayton

data.name: Stakato Ichor
data.description: Take this, along with the honey dew and basilisk plasm to Magister Clayton

data.name: Order of Clayton
data.description: Obtain basilisk plasma of a guardian basilisk, stakato ichor of a marsh stakato and honey dew of an ant guard and take them to Magister Clayton

data.name: Parasite of Lota
data.description: This may be obtained from the Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Seer Manakia

data.name: Letter to Manakia
data.description: A letter received from Pa'agrio Lord Kakai. Deliver this to Seer Manakia in the Town of Giran

data.name: Letter of Manakia
data.description: A letter received from Seer Manakia. Deliver this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Letter to Nikola
data.description: A letter received from Lockirin of the Iron Gate. Deliver this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower

data.name: Order of Nikola
data.description: Obtain 1 Porta Heartstone and take it to Maestro Nikola

data.name: Heartstone of Porta
data.description: Heartstone acquired from Porta. Bring it to Maestro Nikola. \0

data.name: Mark of Duelist
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Duelist. An item for occupational change

data.name: Order Gludio
data.description: Kill at least 10 punchers and 10 noble ant leaders in Gludio

data.name: Order Dion
data.description: Kill at least 10 marsh stakato drones and 10 dead seekers in Dion

data.name: Order Giran
data.description: Kill at least 10 Breka orc overlords and 10 fettered souls in Giran

data.name: Order Oren
data.description: Kill at least 10 Leto lizardman overlords and 10 enchanted monster eyes in Oren

data.name: Order Aden
data.description: Kill at least 10 Tamlin orcs and 10 Tamlin orc archers in Aden

data.name: Puncher's Shard
data.description: A shard of the broken puncher. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Noble Ant's Feeler
data.description: The feelers of the noble ant leader. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Drone's Chitin
data.description: The chitin of the marsh stakato drone. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Dead Seeker Fang
data.description: The fangs of the dead seeker bat. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Overlord Necklace
data.description: Collect ten Breka orc overlord's necklaces and take them to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Fettered Soul's Chain
data.description: The chains that surround a fettered soul's body. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Chief's Amulet
data.description: The amulet of a Leto lizardman overlord. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Enchanted Monster Eye Meat
data.description: The flesh of an enchanted eye. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Tamlin Orc's Ring
data.description: The ring of a Tamlin orc. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Tamlin Orc's Arrow
data.description: The arrows of a Tamlin orc archer. Collect 10 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Final Order
data.description: Defeat the Excuro and Krator of the Cruma Tower, the Grandis of Giran, the Timak Orc Overlord of Oren, and the Lakin of Aden 3 times

data.name: Excuro's Skin
data.description: The skin of the excuro. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Krator's Shard
data.description: The shard of a broken krator. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Grandis' Skin
data.description: The skin of a grandis. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Timak Orc's Belt
data.description: The belt of a Timak orc overlord. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Lakin's Mace
data.description: Mace used by a lakin. Collect 3 of these to take to Duelist Kaien

data.name: Luther's Letter
data.description: A letter given by Master Luther. Take this to Alex of the village of Floran

data.name: Alex's Warrant
data.description: A warrant written by Alex. Take this to Leirynn

data.name: Leirynn's 1st Order
data.description: A list of orders given by Leirynn. "Slay 10 Delu Shamans and bring back their tokens."\0

data.name: Delu Totem
data.description: The totem of Shaman Saska. Take this, along with the rest of the Delu Shaman totems, to Leirynn

data.name: Leirynn's 2nd Order
data.description: A list of orders given by Leirynn. Slay Delu chief Kalkis and bring back proof

data.name: Chief Kalki's Fang
data.description: Proof that the Delu chief Kalkis has been slain. Take this to Leirynn

data.name: Leirynn's Report
data.description: A report issued by Leirynn. Take this to Alex

data.name: Strange Map
data.description: A strange map obtained from the Delu chief Kalkis

data.name: Lambert's Map
data.description: A map where the name of Lambert, the former lord's guard, is written

data.name: Alex's Letter
data.description: A letter given by Alex. Take this and go to drunkard Borys at the Town of Gludio

data.name: Alex's Order
data.description: Alex's orders. The orders give instructions to find and recover Duke Ashton's missing gold

data.name: Wine Catalog
data.description: A list of premium wine published by the Giran Traders' Guild. Show this to Trader Tyra

data.name: Tyra's Contract
data.description: The contract that Trader Tyra has drawn up. The contract states that Tyra will trade 10 pouches of red spore dust for a Malrukian wine

data.name: Red Spore Dust
data.description: Red spore dust obtained by slaying the giant fungus. Gather 10 pouches and bring them to Trader Tyra

data.name: Malrukian Wine
data.description: Premium wine crafted following the methods of the Malruk tribe. Take this to drunkard Borys

data.name: Old Order
data.description: An old order received from drunkard Borys. Take this and go to bodyguard Jax

data.name: Jax's Diary
data.description: A diary that bodyguard Jax has given, saying that it will aid in the search for Solt's and Makel's maps

data.name: 1st Torn Map Piece
data.description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Solt. Gather 4 of these

data.name: 2nd Torn Map Piece
data.description: A piece of the map that belonged to the former lord's guard Makel. Gather 4 of these

data.name: Solt's Map
data.description: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Solt is written

data.name: Makel's Map
data.description: A map where the name of the former lord's guard Makel is written

data.name: Combined Map
data.description: Using the map (alt-m), find the hiding place of the lord's gold bar

data.name: Rusted Key
data.description: A rusty copper key discovered while digging under the tree indicated on the map

data.name: Gold Bar
data.description: A gold bar stamped with Duke Ashton's seal. Take this to Alex

data.name: Alex's Recommend
data.description: A recommendation written by Alex. Take this to Master Luther

data.name: Mark of Searcher
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Searcher. An occupation change related item

data.name: Report of Perrin
data.description: Take this report and go seek Perrin in Gludin Harbor

data.name: Kristina's Letter
data.description: A letter given by Saint Kristina. Deliver this to Master Sorius

data.name: Picture of Windy
data.description: A picture of Windy. Take this drawing to Windy

data.name: Golden Statue
data.description: The reward given by the head of the orphanage. Something good happens if this is in possession?\0

data.name: Windy's Pebbles
data.description: A pebble that Windy has picked up from the Wastelands. Take this to Gup the head of the orphanage near Gludio

data.name: Order of Sorius
data.description: Take these orders and show them to Daurin, who is located west of the Orc Barracks

data.name: 1st Secret Letter
data.description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

data.name: 2nd Secret Letter
data.description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

data.name: 3rd Secret Letter
data.description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

data.name: 4th Secret Letter
data.description: The documents of Leto lizardmen. Gather all of the letters and deliver them to Saint Kristina

data.name: Mark of Healer
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Healer. An occupation change related item

data.name: Mark of Reformer
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Reformer. An occupation change related item

data.name: Book of Reform
data.description: A book received from Priestess Pupina. Go to the Execution Grounds and slay the nameless undeads with the power of light

data.name: Letter of Introduction
data.description: A letter introducing Priestess Pupina. Take this and meet with to Preacher Sla of the Wastelands

data.name: Sla's Letter
data.description: A letter given by Sla. Take this to Katari, who is near the waterfalls of the Neutral Zone

data.name: Greetings
data.description: A letter sent by Sla to her disciples. Go to the Orc Village, Dwarven Village, and Talking Island in this order

data.name: Ol Mahum's Money
data.description: Ol Mahum currency given by the themselves as a reward. For what...? Nobody knows

data.name: Katari's Letter
data.description: Katari's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla

data.name: Nyakuri's Letter
data.description: Nyakuri's reply letter to Sla. Collect 3 reply letters from Sla's disciples and deliver them to Sla

data.name: Undead List
data.description: Skeleton archer, skeleton lord, skeleton marksman, misery skeleton, silent horror

data.name: Ramus's Letter
data.description: A reply letter sent by Ramus to Sla. Deliver this to Sla after meeting all of Sla's disciples

data.name: Ripped Diary
data.description: Diaries containing the final words of young women unfairly killed during the witch hunts of Duke Byron Ashton. Collect 7 of them

data.name: Huge Nail
data.description: The large nail that was embedded in Aruraune's skull. Take this to Priestess Pupina at Town of Giran

data.name: Letter of Betrayer
data.description: A letter given by an Ol Mahum Betrayer. Take it to Katari in the swamp area of the Dark Forest

data.name: Bone Fragment
data.description: Bone pieces of a silent horror. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

data.name: Bone Fragment
data.description: A bone fragment of a skeleton lord. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

data.name: Bone Fragment
data.description: A bone fragment of a skeleton marksman. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

data.name: Bone Fragment
data.description: A bone fragment from a misery skeleton. Take it along with other bone fragments of the undead to Ramus

data.name: Bone Fragment
data.description: A bone fragment of a skeleton archer. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

data.name: Bone Fragment
data.description: A bone fragment of a skeleton. Take this, along with the rest of the undead bone fragments, to Ramus

data.name: Mark of Magus
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Magus. An item for occupational change

data.name: Rukal's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Bard Rukal to Parina of the Village of Gludin

data.name: Parina's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Parina to Elder Casian. The letter makes inquiries regarding the singing flower

data.name: Lilac Charm
data.description: A protection charm created by Elder Casian. Take this and seek out the 3 types of singing flowers

data.name: 1st Golden Seed
data.description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal

data.name: 2nd Golden Seed
data.description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal

data.name: 3rd Golden Seed
data.description: The seed of the singing flower, which absorbs blood in order to bloom. Gather 3 of these and take them to Bard Rukal

data.name: Score of Elements
data.description: A music score sheet given by Bard Rukal. Take this and find the 4 elemental tones

data.name: Dazzling Drop
data.description: A dazzling, tear-shaped jewel. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Water Undine

data.name: Flame Crystal
data.description: A crystal obtained from the ghost fire. Gather 5 of these and take them to the Flame Salamander

data.name: Harpy's Feather
data.description: The feather of a slain harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph

data.name: Wyrm's Wingbone
data.description: The wingbone of a slain Wyrm. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph

data.name: Windsus Mane
data.description: The mane of a slain Windsus. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Wind Sylph

data.name: Enchanted Monster Eye Shell
data.description: The skin of a slain enchanted eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake

data.name: Enchanted Golem Powder
data.description: Stone powder obtained after slaying an enchanted stone golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake

data.name: Enchanted Iron Golem Shard
data.description: A fragment of a destroyed enchanted iron golem. Gather 10 of these and take them to the Earth Snake

data.name: Tone of Water
data.description: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the 4 elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

data.name: Tone of Fire
data.description: One that comprises the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

data.name: Tone of Wind
data.description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

data.name: Tone of Earth
data.description: One that comprise the beautiful harmony of the four elemental tones. Take this to Bard Rukal in the Town of Dion

data.name: Salamander Charm
data.description: A charm of agreement given by the Flame Salamander. It promises to give the tone of fire in return for 5 flame crystals

data.name: Sylph Charm
data.description: A charm of agreement given by the Wind Sylph. It promises to give the tone of wind in return for materials gathered from the harpy, Wyrm, and Windsus

data.name: Undine Charm
data.description: A charm of agreement given by the Water Undine. It promises to give the tone of water in return for 20 dazzling drops

data.name: Serpent Charm
data.description: A charm of agreement given by the Earth Snake. It promises to give the tone of earth in return for slaying the enchanted monsters in the surroundings of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Recommendation of Balanki
data.description: A recommendation given by Silver Scale's Balanki. Gather all 3 recommendations and visit Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: Recommendation of Filaur
data.description: A recommendation given by Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Gather all 3 recommendations and seek out Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: Recommendation of Arin
data.description: A recommendation given by Black Anvil's Arin. Gather all 3 recommendations and go to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: Mark of Maestro
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Maestro. An occupation change related item

data.name: Letter of Solder Detachment
data.description: A letter from Captain Croto that promises to send soldiers. Deliver this to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: Paint of Kamuru
data.description: A painting of Kamuru. Go to the Cave of Trials in the orc kingdom to seek him out

data.name: Necklace of Kamuru
data.description: A necklace worn by Kamuru. Deliver this to Captain Croto

data.name: Paint of Teleport Device
data.description: A drawing of a teleport device. Recover this device from Master Toma

data.name: Teleport Device
data.description: A teleport device given by Master Toma. Deliver this to Black Anvil's Arin

data.name: Architecture of Cruma
data.description: A simple explanation of Cruman architecture. Take this to the research team stationed at the entrance of the Cruma Tower

data.name: Report of Cruma
data.description: A report recording the results of investigations made by the Cruma research team. Deliver this to Eldar Filaur

data.name: Ingredients of Antidote
data.description: Gather 10 stinger wasp needles, 10 marsh spider webs, and 10 leech bloods and deliver them to Researcher Lorain

data.name: Stinger Wasp Needle
data.description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain

data.name: Marsh Spider's Web
data.description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain

data.name: Leech Blood
data.description: Gather 10 of these and deliver them along with the other ingredients to Researcher Lorain

data.name: Mark of Warspirit
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the War Spirit. An item for occupational change

data.name: Vendetta Totem
data.description: A totem given to the Orcs who seek to punish betrayers of their race. Take this and hunt the Tamlin Orcs

data.name: Tamlin Orc Head
data.description: The head of a slain Tamlin Orc. Gather 13 of these and take them to Seer Somak

data.name: Warspirit Totem
data.description: A totem used in the Ritual of the War Spirit. Take this to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials

data.name: Orim's Contract
data.description: I will give you Braki's remains in return for 10 porta eyes, 10 excuro scales and 10 mordeo talons

data.name: Porta's Eye
data.description: A jewel pried from the porta's eye. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow

data.name: Excuro's Scale
data.description: The scales of an excuro. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow

data.name: Mordeos Talon
data.description: The talons of a mordeo. Gather 10 of these and take them to Orim of the Shadow

data.name: Braki's Remains
data.description: The remains of Braki, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 3 remains, to Seer Somak

data.name: Pekiron's Totem
data.description: A guardian totem received from Seer Pekiron. Take this and go to the Leto lizardman shamans and chiefs to recover Tonar's remains

data.name: Tonar's Skull
data.description: The skull of Tonar, an ancient Orc hero. Take this, along with the additional 4 remains, to Seer Pekiron

data.name: Tonar's Remains

data.name: Manakia's Totem

data.name: Mark of Guildsman
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Trial of the Guildsman. An occupation change related item

data.name: Valkon's Recommendation
data.description: A recommendation letter written by Warehouse Keeper Valkon. Take this and go to Blacksmith Altran of Talking Island

data.name: Mandragora Berry
data.description: The fruit of mandragoras, known for their uses in treating ailments

data.name: Altran's Instructions
data.description: Blacksmith Altran's instructions. The instructions are to gather materials and create 7 journeyman's rings

data.name: Altran's 1st Recommendation
data.description: A recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Altran. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Norman of the Village of Gludin

data.name: Altran's 2nd Recommendation
data.description: A recommendation letter written by Blacksmith Altran. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pinter of the Town of Gludio

data.name: Norman's Instructions
data.description: Warehouse Keeper Norman's instructions. The instructions are to go to Blacksmith Duning of Hunters Village and bring back the key

data.name: Norman's Receipt
data.description: Warehouse Keeper Norman's receipt. Take this and go to Blacksmith Duning of the Hunters Village

data.name: Duning's Instructions
data.description: Blacksmith Duning's instructions. It gives an order to recover 30 keys from Breka orcs

data.name: Duning's Key
data.description: Mithril key recovered from Breka orcs. Collect 30 and take them to Blacksmith Duning

data.name: Norman's List
data.description: Ingredient list of Warehouse Keeper Norman: 70 units of gray bone powder, 70 granite whetstones, 70 units of red pigment, and 70 units of braided yarn

data.name: Gray Bone Powder
data.description: The powder collected from the bones of ghouls and strains. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman

data.name: Granite Whetstone
data.description: A whetstone made from the fragments of the granite golem. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman

data.name: Red Pigment
data.description: Red pigment obtained by slaying the dead seeker bat. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman

data.name: Braided Yarn
data.description: Braided yarn obtained by slaying the silenos. Gather 70 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Norman

data.name: Journeyman Gem
data.description: A material used to make the journeyman's ring

data.name: Pinter's Instructions
data.description: Instructions of Blacksmith Pinter: Find and bring back 70 amber beads

data.name: Amber Bead
data.description: A bead-shaped piece of amber. Collect 70 of these and take them to Blacksmith Pinter

data.name: Amber Lump
data.description: An unrefined lump of amber. The material used in creating the Amber Bead

data.name: Journeyman Deco Beads
data.description: Ingredient item used to make a journeyman's ring

data.name: Journeyman Ring
data.description: To pass the Trial of the Guildsman, you must create 7 of these rings. Take the completed rings to Warehouse Keeper Valkon

data.name: Mark of Life
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Life. An occupation change related item

data.name: Cardien's Letter
data.description: Letter by Master Cardien. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios of the Elven Village

data.name: Camomile Charm
data.description: A talisman given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and return to Master Cardien in the Town of Dion

data.name: Hierarch's Letter
data.description: A letter given by Hierarch Asterios. Take this and go to Thali who lives on the eastern shores of Iris Lake

data.name: Moonflower Charm
data.description: The charm given by Hierarch Asterios to keep in possession while searching for the water of life

data.name: Grail Diagram
data.description: A diagram of the grail, given by Thalia. Take this and go to Blacksmith Pushkin of Town of Giran

data.name: Thalia's 1st Letter
data.description: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Arkeni who is at the Altar of Rites

data.name: Thalia's 2nd Letter
data.description: Thalia's letter. Take this and go to Isael Silvershadow of the Hunters Village

data.name: Thalia's Instructions
data.description: A letter containing Thalia's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38

data.name: Pushkin's List
data.description: A list given by Blacksmith Pushkin. "10 pure Mithril Ore, 20 ant soldier acid, 20 Wyrm talons"\0

data.name: Pure Mithril Cup
data.description: A cup crafted by Blacksmith Pushkin that is made of pure mithril. Take this back to Thalia

data.name: Arkenia's Contract
data.description: A contract written by Arkenia. The contract states that she will give stardust in return for Andariel's book from the Village of Gludin

data.name: Arkenia's Instructions
data.description: Arkenia's instructions. The instructions are to bring back Andariel's book from the Temple of Einhasad in the Village of Gludin

data.name: Adonius's list
data.description: A list given by Priest Adonius: 20 spider ichor and 20 harpy's down

data.name: Andariel Scripture Copy
data.description: A copy of Andariel's book given by Priest Adonius. Take this back to Arkenia

data.name: Stardust
data.description: The silver dust received from Arkenia of the Dark Elves. Take this back to Thalia

data.name: Isael's Instructions
data.description: A document containing Isael Silvershadow's instructions. It asks you to recover 6 pieces of talins spear from Leto lizardman shamans

data.name: Isael's Letter
data.description: A letter given by Isael Silvershadow. Take this back to Thalia along with Talin's spear

data.name: Grail of Purity
data.description: A grail crafted of pure mithril. Catch the tears of the unicorn with the grail and take it back to Thalia

data.name: Tears of Unicorn
data.description: The tears shed by Eva's unicorn when it is killed with Talin's spear. Take this back to Thalia

data.name: Water of Life
data.description: The holy water that contains the powers of life to rejuvenate the Mother Tree. Take this and go to Hierarch Asterios

data.name: Pure Mithril Ore
data.description: The ore of pure mithril. Gather 10 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin

data.name: Ant Soldier Acid
data.description: The acid collected from ant soldiers after slaying them. Gather 20 bottles of this, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin

data.name: Wyrm's Talon
data.description: The talon of a Wyrm obtained after slaying it. Gather 20 of these, along with the rest of the ingredients, and take them back to Blacksmith Pushkin

data.name: Spider Ichor
data.description: The ichor of a marsh spider. Gather 20 units of this and take them back to Priest Adonius

data.name: Harpy's Down
data.description: The down feathers obtained after slaying a harpy. Gather 20 of these and take them back to Priest Adonius

data.name: Talin's Spear Blade
data.description: The blade portion of Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Talin's Spear Shaft
data.description: The shaft portion of Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Talin's Ruby
data.description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Talin's Aquamarine
data.description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Talin's Amethyst
data.description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Talin's Peridot
data.description: A decorative jewel that adorned Talin's spear. Take this, along with the remaining portions of the spear, back to Isael Silvershadow

data.name: Mark of Fate
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Fate. An item for occupational change

data.name: Kaira's Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Magister Kaira to Brother Metheus of the Temple of Einhasad. This must be delivered secretly

data.name: Metheus's Funeral Jar
data.description: A jar for storing the remains of the dead. Take this to the Execution Grounds and search for the remains of Metheus's sister

data.name: Kasandra's Remains
data.description: The remains of Kasandr Metheus's sister. Take this back to Brother Metheus

data.name: Herbalism Textbook
data.description: A textbook of various herbs and their usages. It also contains information about the deadly poison belladonna

data.name: Ixia's List
data.description: 10 units each of medusa's blood, marsh spider fluids, dead seeker's dung, tyrant's blood and nightshade root

data.name: Medusa's Ichor
data.description: The bottled blood of a medusa. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia\0

data.name: Marsh Spider's Fluids
data.description: The bottled fluids of a marsh spider. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

data.name: Dead Seeker Dung
data.description: The dung of dead seeker bats. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

data.name: Tyrant's Blood
data.description: The bottled blood of tyrant. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

data.name: Nightshade Root
data.description: The roots of the rare nightshade herb. Collect 10 of these and take them back to Master Ixia

data.name: Belladonna
data.description: A legendary poison that can kill a bull with a single drop. Take this to Brother Metheus

data.name: Alder's Skull
data.description: The skull of Alders, who drafted the copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira

data.name: Alders Skull
data.description: Skull of Priest Alders. Take it to Magister Ro a distant descendant of the priest

data.name: Alder's Receipt
data.description: The receipt for the item that Alder entrusted to the warehouse. Take this and go to the warehouse in the Village of Gludin

data.name: Revelations Manuscript
data.description: A copy of Kaysha's Revelations. Take this to Magister Kaira

data.name: Kaira's Instructions
data.description: A note where Magister Kaira's instructions are written. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38

data.name: Kaira's Recommendation
data.description: A recommendation letter written by Magister Kaira. Take this and go to Tetrarch Thifiell of the Dark Elven Village

data.name: Palus Charm
data.description: A charm given by Tetrarch Thifiell to keep in possession until the Initiation Ceremony of the Shillien Circle is complete

data.name: Thifiell's Letter
data.description: A letter from Tetrarch Thifiell to Arkenia. Arkenia is at the Dark Elven Initiation Altar

data.name: Arkenia's Note
data.description: A note written by Arkenia. It contains instructions to bring back red fairy dust and blight treant sap

data.name: Pixy Garnet
data.description: A garnet given by the Bloody Pixy as a token of promise. Bring one skull each of four different races

data.name: Grandis' Skull
data.description: The skull of Grandis. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy

data.name: Karul Bugbear Skull
data.description: The skull of Karul Bugbear. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy

data.name: Breka Overlord Skull
data.description: The skull of a Breka Overlord. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy

data.name: Leto Overlord Skull
data.description: The skull of a Leto Lizardman Overlord. Bring this to the Bloody Pixy

data.name: Red Fairy Dust
data.description: Red fairy dust given by the bloody pixy. Take this to Arkenia

data.name: Blight Treant Seed
data.description: A seed given by a blight treant as a mark of promise. Slay the black willow lurker and bring back its leaf

data.name: Black Willow Leaf
data.description: A leaf obtained by slaying the black willow lurker. Take this to the Blight Treant

data.name: Blight Treant Sap
data.description: The sap of a blight treant. Take this to Arkenia

data.name: Arkenia's Letter
data.description: A letter written by Arkenia. It states that the Initiation Ceremony of the Shillien Circle is complete. Take this to Tetrarch Thifiell

data.name: Mark of Glory
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Glory. An item for occupational change

data.name: Vokian's Order
data.description: Collect and return with 10 manashen shards, 10 tyrant talons and 10 guardian basilisk fangs

data.name: Manashen Shard
data.description: A shard of the broken manashen. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian

data.name: Tyrant Talon
data.description: The talons plucked from a slain Tyrant. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian

data.name: Guardian Basilisk Fang
data.description: The fangs of a slain guardian basilisk. Collect 10 and take them back to Prefect Vokian

data.name: Vokian's Order
data.description: Prefect Vokian's orders. The instructions are to go and seek out the Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion

data.name: Necklace of Authority
data.description: A symbol given to those representing Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Chianta's 1st Order
data.description: Orders of Gandi Chief Chianta. The instructions are to go and recover the flame scepter from the lower orc tribes

data.name: Scepter of Breka
data.description: Scepter of flame which can be obtained from a Breka orc chief. Take it along with 4 other tribes' scepters and go see Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Scepter of Enku
data.description: The flame scepter received from the Enku orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Scepter of Vuku
data.description: The flame scepter received from the Vuku orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Scepter of Turek
data.description: The flame scepter received from the Turek orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Scepter of Tunath
data.description: The flame scepter received from the Lennunt orc chief. Take this, along with the remaining 4 scepters, to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Chianta's 2nd Order
data.description: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to come back for further orders after reaching level 38

data.name: Chianta's 3rd Order
data.description: Gandi Chief Chianta's orders. The instructions are to bring back 20 each of Timak and Tamlin orc heads

data.name: Tamlin Orc Skull
data.description: The head of a Tamlin orc cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Timak Orc Head
data.description: The head of a Timak orc, cut off after being slain. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Scepter Box
data.description: A box containing the 5 flame scepters recovered from the lesser orc tribes. Take this to Seer Tanapi of the Orc Village

data.name: Pashika's Head
data.description: Kill Pashik son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar

data.name: Vultus' Head
data.description: Kill Vultus, son of Voltar, cut his head off and show it to Breka Chief Voltar

data.name: Glove of Voltar
data.description: Glove that was thrown out by Breka Chief Voltar. Slay Pashika and Vultus, sons of Voltar

data.name: Enku Overlord Head
data.description: The head of an Enku overlord, cut off after being slain. Show this to Enku Chief Kepra

data.name: Glove of Kepra
data.description: The glove thrown down by Enku Chief Kepra. Go and slay the Enku overlords

data.name: Makum Bugbear Head
data.description: The head of a Makum bugbear warrior, cut off after being slain. Show this to Turek Chief Burai

data.name: Glove of Burai
data.description: The glove thrown down by Turek Chief Burai. Go and slay the Makum bugbear warriors

data.name: Manakia's 1st Letter
data.description: Letter of Seer Manakia. Take it to Breka orc chief

data.name: Manakia's 2nd Letter
data.description: Seer Manakia's letter. Take this and go to the Enku Orc Chief

data.name: Kasman's 1st Letter
data.description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Vuku Orc Chief

data.name: Kasman's 2nd Letter
data.description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Turek Orc Chief

data.name: Kasman's 3rd Letter
data.description: Prefect Kasman's letter. Take this and go to the Lennunt Orc Chief

data.name: Driko's Contract
data.description: Vuku Chief Driko's contract. The contract contains instructions to hunt the marsh stakato drones in the Cruma Marshlands

data.name: Stakato Drone Husk
data.description: The husks of a marsh stakato drone. Collect 30 of these and take them to Vuku Chief Driko

data.name: Tanapi's Order
data.description: Seer Tanapi's orders. Hunt the Ragna Orc Chief and seers and recover the scepter of Tantosc

data.name: Scepter of Tantos
data.description: The flame scepter of the now-perished Tantos tribe. Take this to Seer Tanapi

data.name: Ritual Box
data.description: A box containing the scepters recovered from the Orcs of the Tantos tribe. Take this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Mark of Prosperity
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Testimony of Prosperity. An occupation change related item

data.name: 1st Ring of Testimony
data.description: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find the 4 proofs of prosperity

data.name: 2nd Ring of Testimony
data.description: A ring given to those Dwarves attempting the Testimony of Prosperity. Find Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry

data.name: Old Account Book
data.description: Iron Gate Lockirin's account book. The proof of wealth. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran

data.name: Blessed Seed
data.description: A seed containing the blessings of Maphr. The proof of fertile lands. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran

data.name: Emily's Recipe
data.description: A recipe good for childbirth and childbirth recovery. The proof of fertility. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran

data.name: Lilith's Elven Wafer
data.description: Food regarded as the secret to the Elves' longevity. The proof of health. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran

data.name: Maphr Tablet Fragment
data.description: A fragment of Maphr's tablet, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Parman of Town of Giran

data.name: Collection License
data.description: A license that allows the bearer to collect guild contributions. Seek out those who still owe contributions and collect the funds from them

data.name: Lockirin's 1st Notice
data.description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron

data.name: Lockirin's 2nd Notice
data.description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki

data.name: Lockirin's 3rd Notice
data.description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Bronze Key's Keef

data.name: Lockirin's 4th Notice
data.description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar

data.name: Lockirin's 5th Notice
data.description: A notice that guild contributions are due. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin

data.name: Contribution of Shari
data.description: Trader Shari's guild contribution. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron

data.name: Contribution of Mion
data.description: Trader Mion's guild contribution. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki

data.name: Contribution of Maryse
data.description: Maryse Redbonnet's guild contribution. Take this to Silver Scale's Balanki

data.name: Maryse's Request
data.description: Note containing Maryse Redbonnet's request that you bring back 10 leather hides for use in crafting items

data.name: Contribution of Toma
data.description: Master Toma's guild contribution. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin

data.name: Receipt of Bolter
data.description: Miner Bolter's contribution receipt. Take this to Black Anvil's Arin to confirm if Miner Bolter has already submitted his contribution

data.name: 1st Receipt of Contribution
data.description: The contribution receipt received from Golden Wheel's Spiron. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: 2nd Receipt of Contribution
data.description: The contribution receipt received from Silver Scale's Balanki. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: 3rd Receipt of Contribution
data.description: The contribution receipt received from Bronze Key's Keef. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: 4th Receipt of Contribution
data.description: A contribution receipt received from Filaur of the Gray Pillar. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: 5th Receipt of Contribution
data.description: The contribution receipt received from Black Anvil's Arin. Collect 5 receipts and take them to Lockirin of the Iron Gate

data.name: Procuration of Torocco
data.description: The bearer of this procuration hereby agrees to make contributions on behalf of Torocco. Take this to Bronze Key's Keef

data.name: Bright's List
data.description: A list of ingredients that Guard Bright has written. "20 mandragora petals, 10 bunches of crimson moss"\0

data.name: Mandragora Petal
data.description: The petals of a mandragora flower. Collect 20 of these and take them to Guard Bright

data.name: Crimson Moss
data.description: Crimson Moss obtained from giant red ants. Collect 10 of these and take them to Guard Bright

data.name: Mandragora Bouquet
data.description: A flower bouquet made of mandragora petals and crimson moss. Take this to Emily in the Town of Dion

data.name: Parman's Instructions
data.description: A note containing Warehouse Keeper Parman's instructions. The instructions are to come back after reaching level 38

data.name: Parman's Letter
data.description: Warehouse Keeper Parman's letter. Take this to Maestro Nikola of the Cruma Tower

data.name: Clay Dough
data.description: A piece of clay that Maestro Nikola has given. Use this to make a copy of the keyhole from the titan's box

data.name: Pattern of Keyhole
data.description: The keyhole pattern made from clay dough. Take this to Maestro Nikola

data.name: Nikola's List
data.description: 20 stakato shells, 10 toad lord sacs, 10 spider thorns and 10 D-grade crystals

data.name: Stakato Shell
data.description: The shell of a marsh stakato. A key ingredient in making the titan's key

data.name: Toad Lord Sac
data.description: The Giant Spider's Poison Sac removed from the neck of a toad lord. A key ingredient in making the titan's key

data.name: Marsh Spider's Thorn
data.description: A thorn removed from the shell of a Marsh Spider. A key ingredient in making the Titan's Key

data.name: Mark of Champion
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Champion. An item for occupational change

data.name: Ascalon's 1st Letter
data.description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Mason in the Town of Dion

data.name: Mason's Letter
data.description: A letter from Mason to Veteran Ascalon of Town of Giran

data.name: Iron Rose Ring
data.description: A ring given by Mason. The ring is engraved with the symbol of the iron rose. Complete the revenge in place of Mason

data.name: Ascalon's 2nd Letter
data.description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Trader Groot of Town of Giran

data.name: White Rose Insignia
data.description: An insignia given by Trader Groot. It was formerly worn by the medics of the iron rose. Aid Trader Groot in his material gathering

data.name: Groot's Letter
data.description: A letter from Trader Groot to Veteran Ascalon in Town of Giran

data.name: Ascalon's 3rd Letter
data.description: Veteran Ascalon's letter. Take this to Captain Mouen of the Town of Oren

data.name: Mouen's 1st Order
data.description: Cut off and bring back the heads of 100 road scavengers or road collectors

data.name: Mouen's 2nd Order
data.description: Destroy the Leto lizardmen and bring back 100 of their fangs

data.name: Mouen's Letter
data.description: A letter from Captain Mouen to Veteran Ascalon of Town of Giran

data.name: Harpy's Egg
data.description: An egg obtained after slaying a harpy. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran

data.name: Medusa's Venom
data.description: The venom obtained after slaying a medusa. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran

data.name: Windsus Bile
data.description: The bile obtained after slaying a Windsus. Collect 30 of these and take them to Trader Groot of Town of Giran

data.name: Bloody Axe Head
data.description: The head of a Bloody Axe Elite. Collect 10 of these and return to Mason in the Town of Dion

data.name: Road Ratman Head
data.description: The severed head of a road scavenger or road collector. Collect 10 of them and take them to Captain Mouen

data.name: Leto Lizardman Fang
data.description: A fang from a slain Leto lizardman. Collect 10 of these and take them to Captain Mouen

data.name: Mark of Sagittarius
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Sagittarius. An occupation change related item

data.name: Bernard's Introduction
data.description: Take this letter and go to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran

data.name: Hamil's 1st Letter
data.description: Take this letter and meet with Sir Aron Tanford of the Southern Wastelands

data.name: Hamil's 2nd Letter
data.description: Take this letter and go to Prefect Vokian of Town of Giran

data.name: Hamil's 3rd Letter
data.description: Take this letter and go to Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Hunter's 1st Rune
data.description: A stone engraved with a hunter's rune. Collect 10 of these and take them to Hamil of the Village of Floran

data.name: Hunter's 2nd Rune
data.description: A rune obtained from Breka orc overlords or Shamans. Collect 10 of these and take them, along with the snake talisman, to Prefect Vokian

data.name: Talisman of Kadesh
data.description: A strange talisman obtained after slaying Kadesh. Take this to Sagittarius Hamil of the Village of Floran

data.name: Talisman of Snake
data.description: Talisman that is related to a serpent totem spirit worshipped by Breka orcs. Take it to Prefect Vokian of Town of Giran

data.name: Mithril Clip
data.description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Stakato Chitin
data.description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Reinforced Bowstring
data.description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Manashen's Horn
data.description: A key ingredient in restoring the Crescent Bow. Take this, along with the rest of the ingredients, to Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Blood of Lizardman
data.description: The blood shed by Leto Lizardmen. Kadesh appears when enough of this is gathered

data.name: Mark of Witchcraft
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of Witchcraft. An occupation change related item

data.name: Orim's Diagram
data.description: A diagram of relics, given by Orim of the Shadow. The 6 jewels needed for opening the Cube of Aklantoth are depicted here

data.name: Alexandria's Book
data.description: A book that contains records on who purchased Aklantoth's Gems. "Magister Iker, Magister Kair Trader Lara"\0

data.name: Iker's List
data.description: Collect and bring back 20 dire Wyrm fangs, 20 Leto lizardman charms, and 20 enchanted stone golem heartstones

data.name: Dire Wyrm Fang
data.description: The fangs of a slain Dire Wyrm. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker

data.name: Leto Lizardman Charm
data.description: A totem obtained after slaying the Leto Lizardman. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker

data.name: Enchanted Stone Golem Heartstone
data.description: A crystal found amongst the shattered fragments of an enchanted stone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Iker

data.name: Lara's Memo
data.description: Trader Lara's sales records. It is recorded that a man named Ismel bought the jewel from Lara

data.name: Nestle's Memo
data.description: Trader Lara's purchase records. It is recorded that Leopold of the Black Lion brought the jewel

data.name: Leopold's Journal
data.description: A portion of Leopold's Diary. It is recorded that 3 deserters died and became undead while escaping to the Wastelands

data.name: Aklantoth 1st Gem
data.description: Gem that can be obtained from Magister Iker. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow

data.name: Aklantoth 2nd Gem
data.description: The gem given by Magister Kaira. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow

data.name: Aklantoth 3rd Gem
data.description: The gem that can be obtained by killing a nameless revenant. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow

data.name: Aklantoth 4th Gem
data.description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow

data.name: Aklantoth 5th Gem
data.description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow

data.name: Aklantoth 6th Gem
data.description: The gem that can be obtained by slaying a skeletal mercenary. Find all 6 of Aklantoth gems and take them to Orim the Shadow

data.name: 1st Brimstone
data.description: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel when escaping from his binds

data.name: Orim's Instructions
data.description: A set of instructions written by Orim of the Shadow. The instructions are to bring back the Sword of Binding and Soul Trap Crystal

data.name: Orim's 1st Letter
data.description: A letter from Orim of the Shadow to Sir Karol Vasper of the Town of Gludin. The letter asks for the loan of the Sword of the Seal

data.name: Orim's 2nd Letter
data.description: A letter from Orim of the Shadows to Magister Iker of Town of Giran. The letter asks for the loan of the Soul-trap Crystal

data.name: Sir Vasper's Letter
data.description: A letter from Sir Klaus Vasper to Vadin of the Town of Oren. The letter gives permission for the use of the Sword of Binding

data.name: Vadin's Crucifix
data.description: A holy crucifix of the order, given by Vadin. Take this and go hunt Tamlin Orcs

data.name: Tamlin Orc Amulet
data.description: Amulets that the Tamlin Orcs carry for sorcery purposes. Gather 20 of these and take them to Vadin

data.name: Vadin's Sanctions
data.description: A sanctions letter from Vadin allowing for the use of the Sword of Binding. Take this to Sir Klaus Vasper of the Town of Gludin

data.name: Iker's Amulet
data.description: An amulet given by Magister Iker. It is said to have powers of protection against evil..

data.name: Soultrap Crystal
data.description: A crystal with the power to trap and seal the soul of a monster. Use this to seal the spirit of the Drevanul Zeruel

data.name: Purgatory Key
data.description: A key needed to close Aklantoth's Chest. Take this to Orim of the Shadow

data.name: Zeruel Bind Crystal
data.description: A crystal that contains the trapped soul of the Drevanul Zeruel. Take this to Orim of the Shadow

data.name: 2nd Brimstone
data.description: A mark left behind by the Drevanul Prince Zeruel while escaping from the body of Fisher Evert

data.name: Mark of Summoner
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Summoner. An occupation change related item

data.name: Leto Lizardman Amulet
data.description: An amulet obtained after slaying a Leto Lizardman. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Sac of Redspores
data.description: Red spores obtained from the bodies of the giant fungus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Karul Bugbear Totem
data.description: A totem obtained after slaying the Karul Bugbear. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Shards of Manashen
data.description: A shard of the shattered Manashen. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Breka Orc Totem
data.description: A totem that can be obtained after slaying a Breka orc. Collect 30 of them and take them to Trader Lara

data.name: Crimson Bloodstone
data.description: A spirit stone embedded in the body of a fettered soul. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Talons of Tyrant
data.description: The talon of a slain tyrant. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Wings of Droneant
data.description: Wings obtained after slaying Noble Ants at the Ant's Nest. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Tusk of Windsus
data.description: The tusks of a slain Windsus. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Fangs of Wyrm
data.description: The fangs of a slain Wyrm. Gather 30 of these and take them back to Trader Lara

data.name: Lara's 1st List
data.description: Collect 30 Leto lizardman amulets from the Plains of the Lizardmen and 30 units of red spore dust from the giant fungus in the Sea of Spores

data.name: Lara's 2nd List
data.description: Collect 30 Karul bugbear totems from Hunters Valley and 30 shards of manashen from the Crater of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Lara's 3rd List
data.description: Collect 30 Breka orc totems from Breka's Stronghold and 30 crimson bloodstones of fettered soul from Death Pass

data.name: Lara's 4th List
data.description: Collect 30 Tyrant Talons from the Wastelands and 30 Windsus Tusks from Death Pass

data.name: Lara's 5th List
data.description: Collect 30 noble ant wings from the Ant Nest and 30 Wyrm fangs from Gorgon's Flower Garden

data.name: Galatea's Letter
data.description: A letter from Head Summoner Galatea to Trader Lara in the Town of Dion

data.name: Mark of Lord
data.description: A mark given to those who have passed the Test of the Lord. An item for occupational change

data.name: Ordeal Necklace
data.description: A necklace given to those who are attempting the Test of the Lord. Go seek 5 Chiefs of different tribes and return with their approvals

data.name: Varkee's Charm
data.description: The Atuba chief Varkee's charm. Go back to him after completing this task

data.name: Tantus's Charm
data.description: The Neruga chief Tantus's charm. Go back to him after completing this task

data.name: Hatos's Charm
data.description: The Urutu Chief Hatos's charm. Go back to him after completing this task

data.name: Takuna's Charm
data.description: The Duda-Mara Chief Takuna's charm. Go back to him after completing this task

data.name: Chianta's Charm
data.description: Gandi Chief Chianta's charm. Go back to him after completing this task

data.name: Manakia's Orders
data.description: A document containing Seer Manakia's orders. It tells you to kill Breka orc shamans and Breka orc overlords and bring back 20 Breka orc fangs

data.name: Breka Orc Fang
data.description: A Breka orc's fang. Collect 20 of them and take them to Seer Manakia

data.name: Manakia's Amulet
data.description: A mark received after passing Manakia's test. Take this to Atuba Chief Varkees

data.name: Huge Orc Fang
data.description: The totem of the Atuba tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Sumari's Letter
data.description: A letter from Blacksmith Sumari to Seer Somak in the Town of Dion

data.name: Urutu Blade
data.description: A blade crafted by Blacksmith Sumari. Take this to Urutu Chief Hatos

data.name: Timak Orc Skull
data.description: The skull of a slain Timak Orc. Gather 10 of these and take them to Urutu chief Hatos

data.name: Sword Into Skull
data.description: The totem of the Urutu tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Neruga Axe Blade
data.description: The blade portion of a ceremonial axe. Take this to Neruga Chief Tantus

data.name: Axe of Ceremony
data.description: The totem of the Neruga tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Marsh Spider's Feeler
data.description: A key ingredient in making the Duda-Mara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna

data.name: Marsh Spider's Feet
data.description: A key ingredient in making the Duda-Mara tribe totem. Gather 10 of these and take them to Duda-Mara Chief Takuna

data.name: Handiwork Spider Brooch
data.description: The totem of the Duda-Mara tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Enchanted Monster Cornea
data.description: A key ingredient in making the Gandi tribe totem. Gather 20 of these and take them to Gandi Chief Chianta

data.name: Monster Eye Woodcarving
data.description: The totem of the Gandi tribe. Gather the totems of the 5 tribes and take them to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Bear Fang Necklace
data.description: The totem of the Hestui tribe. Take this and go to the Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials

data.name: Martankus's Charm
data.description: The talisman of the Ancestor Martankus. Go back to him after completing this task

data.name: Ragna Orc Head
data.description: The head of a slain Ragna Orc. Take this to the Ancestor Martankus

data.name: Ragna Chief Notice
data.description: He who destroys the Lord of Flame shall be appointed Chief. Take this to the ancestral spirit Martankus

data.name: Immortal Flame
data.description: The mark received after passing the Ancestor Martankus' test. Take this to Pa'agrio Lord Kakai

data.name: Animal Lover's List
data.description: Go and seek Gatekeeper Bella in the Town of Gludio, Guard Metty in the Town of Dion, and Accessory Jeweler Ellie in the Town of Giran

data.name: Animal Slayer's 1st List
data.description: Destroy the animal slayers of Talking Island: giant spiders, talon spiders, and bladers

data.name: Animal Slayer's 2nd List
data.description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Elven Forest: crimson spiders, hook spiders, and the pincer spiders

data.name: Animal Slayer's 3rd List
data.description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Dark Elven Forest: lesser dark horrors, dark horrors, and prowlers

data.name: Animal Slayer's 4th List
data.description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Indomitable Plateau: kasha spiders, kasha poker spiders, and kasha blade spiders

data.name: Animal Slayer's 5th List
data.description: Destroy the animal slayers of the Spine Mountains Mining Zone: hunter tarantulas and plunder tarantulas

data.name: Bloody Fang
data.description: A fang dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin

data.name: Bloody Claw
data.description: A claw dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin

data.name: Bloody Nail
data.description: A nail dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin

data.name: Bloody Kasha Fang
data.description: A fang of a kasha dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin

data.name: Bloody Tarantula Nail
data.description: A nail of a tarantula dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin

data.name: Crystal Brooch
data.description: A brooch received from Warehouse Keeper Wilford. Present this to Lilith of the temple at the Village of Talking Island

data.description: Amulet required for the Remedy spell. Used by Paladins.\\nRequired level: 40\0

data.description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Blacksmith Rupio. You must deliver it quickly

data.description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Martin. You must deliver it quickly

data.description: Supply item. It's really heavy. Let's take it to Alex in Florin Village

data.description: Supply item. It's really heavy. Let's take it to Warden Endrigo at the Execution Grounds

data.description: Return gift given by Alex as expression of thanks for having brought enough of the supply item

data.description: Letter of thanks given by Warden Endrigo of the Execution Grounds as expression of thanks for having brought enough of the supplied items

data.description: Item that Warehouse Chief Gesto entrusted saying to take it to Orim the Shadow. What could be inside...?\0

data.description: Certificate of master deliveryman received for having successfully completed 1000 deliveries. 120% delivery fee added!\0

data.description: Confirmation form the person receiving delivery of an item signs. Collect two sheets and take it to Warehouse Chief Gesto

data.name: 1st Circle Hunter License
data.description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 1st circle hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild

data.description: Certificate that proves eligibility as a 2nd circle hunter. You must have this to be able to carry out orders given by the Hunter Guild

data.description: Mark given to hunters that successfully carry out requests of the guild. The more experienced a hunter is, the more of these he or she has

data.description: Instructions of the test for the 1st circle hunter certificate. Says to complete at least three of the six tasks presented by Grey
