data.description: Ancient document recovered from Karul Chief Orooto. Take it to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Rotting Tree Spores
data.description: Seed collected from rot tree trunks. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Trisalim Venom Sac
data.description: Venom sac removed from trisalim corpse. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Taik Orc Totem
data.description: Statue obtained from killing Taik orc shamen or captains. Collect 50 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Harit Barbed Necklace
data.description: Necklace obtained from killing Harit lizardman soldiers, archers or warriors. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Coin of Old Empire
data.description: Coin used during the time of the ancient Elmoreden Empire. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Skin of Farcran
data.description: Skin removed after killing farcran. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Tempest Shard
data.description: Spirit ore obtained by killing a fline. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Tsunami Shard
data.description: Spirit ore obtained by killing a liele. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Satyr Mane
data.description: Mane obtained from killing satyr or satyr elders. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Hamadryad Shard
data.description: Spirit Ore obtained from killing forest runner. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Vanor Silenos Mane
data.description: Mane of vanor silenos soldiers, scouts or warriors. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Talk Bugbear Totem
data.description: Small statue that talk bugbear warriors carry around on their bodies. Collect 30 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Okun's Head
data.description: Certificate of having killed timak overlord okun. Take it to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Kakran's Head
data.description: Certificate of having killed taik overlord kakran. Take it to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Narcissus's Soulstone
data.description: Fragment of destroyed mirror. Collect 40 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Deprive Eye
data.description: Eye obtained from deprive corpse. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Unicorn's Horn
data.description: Horn obtained from killing unicorn or unicorn elder. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Kerunos's Gold Mane
data.description: Mane removed after killing vanor chief kerunos. Take it to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Skull of Executed
data.description: Skull obtained from killing grave wanderer. Collect 20 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Bust of Travis
data.description: Bust of King Travis recovered from hatar chieftain kubel. Take it to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Sword of Cadmus
data.description: Sword of bodyguard of King Cadmus recovered from judge of marsh. Collect 10 and take them to Guild Member Tor

data.name: Coin Diagram
data.description: An illustration of the coin that Warehouse Keeper Sorint wants you to retrieve. Meet with Hunter Guild President Bernard who will instruct you on what to do next

data.name: Kaldis Gold Dragon
data.description: Coin that is the same as that which Hunter Guild President Bernard has. Take this to Warehouse Keeper Sorint

data.name: Coin Collector Membership 1
data.description: Level 1 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with members of other places

data.name: Coin Collector Membership 2
data.description: Level 2 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 2 or level 3 members of other places

data.name: Coin Collector Membership 3
data.description: Level 3 coin collector club membership card. You must have this to exchange coins with level 3 members of other places

data.name: Fairy Stone
data.description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy Mimyu

data.name: Deluxe Fairy Stone
data.description: Jewel required to meet and talk with fairy Mimyu. Be careful because creatures living in Enchanted Valley disappear when killed

data.name: Fairy Stone List
data.description: 10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 D-grade gemstone, 3 silver nuggets and 10 pieces of toad lord back skin

data.name: Deluxe Fairy Stone List
data.description: 10 pieces of coal, 10 pieces of charcoal, 1 C-grade gemstone, 1 stone of purity, 5 nuggets of silver and 20 pieces of toad lord back skin

data.name: Toad Lord Back Skin
data.description: Haggard backskin of a toad lord. Ingredient used for removing impurities from fairy stone

data.name: Juice of Monkshood
data.description: Medicine needed to talk with drakes or Wyrms

data.name: Scale of Drake Exarion
data.description: Scale of drake exarion. Take this and recover 20 eggs from leto lizardman warriors near Oren Castle

data.name: Egg of Drake Exarion
data.description: Egg of drake exarion recovered from leto lizardman warriors

data.name: Scale of Drake Zwov
data.description: Scale of drake zwov. Take this and recover 20 eggs from marsh spiders of Cruma Marshlands

data.name: Egg of Drake Zwov
data.description: Egg of drake zwov recovered from marsh spiders

data.name: Scale of Drake Kalibran
data.description: Scale of Drake Kalibran. Take this and recover 20 Eggs from Road Scavengers near Death Pass

data.name: Egg of Drake Kalibran
data.description: Drake Kalibran Egg recovered from Road Scavengers

data.name: Scale of Wyvern Suzet
data.description: Scale of Wyvern Suzet. Take this and recover 20 eggs from Breka Orc Overlords in northern Giran

data.name: Egg of Wyvern Suzet
data.description: Egg of Wyvern Suzet recovered from Breka Orc Overlords

data.name: Scale of Wyvern Shamhai
data.description: Scale of wyvern shamhai. Take this and recover 20 eggs from deadseekers of the Execution Grounds

data.name: Egg of Wyvern Shamhai
data.description: Egg of wyvern shamhai recovered from deadseekers

data.name: Herb of Harit
data.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time

data.name: Herb of Vanor
data.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time

data.name: Herb of Oel Mahum
data.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time

data.name: Blood of Eva
data.description: One ingredient of antidote. Take all four antidote ingredients to the clan leader within the time

data.name: Athrea's Coin
data.description: If you collect three Athrea's coins and take them to Witch Athre you will be able to obtain Eva's Blood

data.name: Symbol of Loyalty
data.description: Certificate exchanged for life of clan member. Take this to clan leader

data.name: Recipe: Titan's Powerstone
data.description: For Dwarves only. Recipe for Quest. Required to make a Titan's Powerstone. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 2. The success rate is 25%

data.name: Mist Drake's Egg
data.description: Egg of mist drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien

data.name: Blitz Wyrm Egg
data.description: Egg of blitz Wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien

data.name: Drake's Egg
data.description: Egg of drake. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien

data.name: Thunder Wyrm Egg
data.description: Egg of thunder Wyrm. The clan leader must collect ten of each of four kinds of eggs and take them to Martien

data.name: Brooch of the Magpie
data.description: This brooch that was left by a dying Dwarf to be delivered to Head Blacksmith Kusto, his younger brother in Town of Giran

data.name: Nebulite Crystals
data.description: Soulshot of unknown identity. The clan leader must collect ten each of this and Titan's powerstones and take it all to Balthazar

data.name: Broken Titan's Powerstone
data.description: Titan's Powerstone. It is broken and useless

data.name: Titan's Powerstone
data.description: Titan's Powerstone. The clan leader must collect ten of these and also, ten Nebulite Crystals and take them all to Balthazar

data.name: Imperial Key
data.description: Key used when opening imperial coffer. Must have all six to open the coffer

data.name: Undead Ash
data.description: Ash dust remaining after an undead of the Execution Grounds is destroyed. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya

data.name: Bloody Axe Insignia
data.description: Insignia obtained from killing Ol Mahums in the Fortress of Resistance. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya

data.name: Delu Lizardman Fang
data.description: Tooth removed after killing a Delu Lizardman. Collect these and take them to Mercenary Sophya

data.name: Stakato Talon
data.description: Claw cut off after killing marsh stakatos of the Cruma Marshlands. Collect this and take it to Mercenary Sophya

data.name: Feather of Gabrielle
data.description: Mark given by Seal Guardian Gabrielle. Receive recognition for your abilities after taking this and meeting the other guardians

data.name: Marsh Stalker Horn
data.description: The horn that was cut off of a marsh stalker after it was killed. Take it to Magister Kaien the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Marsh Drake Talons
data.description: The talons that were removed from a marsh drake after it was killed. Take them to Magister Kaien the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Kranrot Skin
data.description: The skin that was removed from a Kranrot after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Hamrut Leg
data.description: The leg that was removed from a Hamrut and skinned after it was killed. Take it to Prefect Chakiris, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Remains of Sacrifice
data.description: The remains of a sacrificed soul. Take them to High Priest Orven, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Totem of Land Dragon
data.description: The totem created by Harit lizardmen who worship Antharas. Take it to Master Kendra the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: 1st Fragment of Abyss Jewel
data.description: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Gludio. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: 2nd Fragment of Abyss Jewel
data.description: A fragment obtained by destroying an abyss jewel in Oren. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: 3rd Fragment of Abyss Jewel
data.description: Fragment obtained from destroying abyss jewel. Take this to Antharas Watchman Theodric at the entrance to Antharas's Lair

data.name: Mara Fang
data.description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Mara. Take it to Warehouse Chief Moke, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Musfel Fang
data.description: The proof obtained after killing jewel guardian Musfel. Take it to Blacksmith Helton, the Watchman of the Seal

data.name: Mark of Watchman
data.description: Certificate of having been recognized by seal guardian. Return to Gabrielle after receiving certificates from guardians of each region

data.name: Portal Stone
data.description: Item needed to activate the teleport crystal that teleports to Antharas's Lair

data.name: Gustav's 1st Letter
data.description: A secret letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to his aides. Get a hold of it and take it to Martien of the Town of Giran

data.name: Gustav's 2nd Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Balthazar of Hunter Village

data.name: Gustav's 3rd Letter
data.description: A letter sent by Sir Gustav Athebaldt to those supporting him. Take it to Sir Eric Rodemai of the Town of Aden

data.name: Scepter of Judgment
data.description: Scepter bestowed on Founding Emperor Shunaiman of the ancient Elmoreden Empire by the god of light. Certificate representing the emperor's authority

data.name: Seal of Aspiration
data.description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 5

data.name: Black Anvil Coin
data.description: Commemorative coin given as an expression of gratitude by the Black Anvil Guild

data.name: Antidote Recipe List
data.description: Herb of Vanor, herb of Oel Mahum, herb of harit and blood of Eva

data.name: Voucher of Faith
data.description: If you take this document to Sir Kristof Rodemai, you will receive the Alliance Manifesto

data.name: Alliance Manifesto
data.description: Item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan to level 4

data.name: Knuckle Duster
data.description: Bestows one of the following functions, Rsk. Evasion, Rsk. Haste or Haste

data.name: Hatchling's Level 65 Armor
data.description: Can be put on by double-clicking. Exclusively used by a Hatchling

data.name: Hatchling's Level 75 Armor
data.description: Can be put on by double-clicking. Exclusively used by a Hatchling

data.name: Hatchling's Level 65 Weapon
data.description: Can be put on by double-clicking. Exclusively used by a Hatchling

data.name: Blade Mold
data.description: Cargo that Trader Arodin needs to send to the Dark Elves. Find all 20 of them and take them to Trader Tyra

data.name: Tyra's Bill
data.description: A note from Trader Tyra. Take it to Trader Arodin in Gludin Village

data.name: Ranger's Report - Part 1
data.description: First piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah

data.name: Ranger's Report - Part 2
data.description: Second piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah

data.name: Ranger's Report - Part 3
data.description: Third piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah

data.name: Ranger's Report - Part 4
data.description: Fourth piece of a ranger's report. Find all 4 pieces and take them to Guard Alvah

data.name: Weapons Trade Contract
data.description: The contract that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. It is stamped with the Mark of the Dwarves. Take it to Guard Alvah

data.name: Attack Directives
data.description: An operation order that was carried by an Ol Mahum General. Take it to Guard Alvah

data.name: Certificate of the Silver Scale Guild
data.description: Certificate that verifies one's membership to the Silver Scale Guild

data.name: Rolento's Cargobox
data.description: The war supplies that the Dwarven trader Rolento promised to send to Turek orcs. First, show it to Guard Alvah

data.name: Ol Mahum Captain's Head
data.description: A severed head of an Ol Mahum captain. Collect 30 of them and take them to Turek Chief Burai

data.name: Jade Crystal
data.description: Jade gemstone from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunters Village

data.name: Ancient Statue of Goddess
data.description: A statue of a goddess from an old empire that has been discovered in the cemetery. Take it to Priestess Flownia of Town of Aden

data.name: GalfRedo Romer's Bust
data.description: A statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. Take it to Trader Galibredo of the Town of Oren

data.name: Eye of the Shadow
data.description: Collect 50 eyes of the Shadow and take them to Warehouse Keeper Sorint

data.name: Certificate of Participation: Battle Royal
data.description: The certificate that allows one to participate in a Battle Royal. This game is played by grade 1 members of the Coin Collectors Club

data.name: Trade Cargo
data.description: The cargo boxes that have been robbed from the wagon of the Trade Guild. Collect 30 of them and take them to Guard Weisz

data.name: Agnes's Holy Symbol
data.description: The Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad. This article was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with Agnes's Rosary to Priest Adonius

data.name: Agnes's Rosary
data.description: A rosary used while praying. It was left by Priestess Agnes after her death. Take it along with the Crucifix of the goddess of Einhasad to Priest Adonius

data.name: Sinister Totem
data.description: A black colored totem that exudes an evil aura. Take it to High Priestess Levian

data.name: Bear Skin
data.description: The pelts obtained by hunting bears. Collect 20 of them and take them to Grocer Pano of Floran Village

data.name: Enku Orc's Head
data.description: Beheaded head of an Enku Orc. Collect 100 of them and take them to Orc Lady Jennifer

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -1
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to High Prefect Drikus

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -2
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Priest Manuel

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -3
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Vuku Chief Driko

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -4
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Seer Somak

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -5
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Prefect Dowki

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -6
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Warden Endrigo

data.name: Orc Heads Bouquet -7
data.description: A bouquet made by tying 100 orc heads together. On behalf of Jennifer who is shy, deliver it to Captain Lucas

data.name: Jennifer's Box
data.description: The box that a man who is smitten by Orc Lady Jennifer asked this to be delivered to her. What do you think is in the box...?\0

data.name: Articles of Dead Heroes
data.description: The articles of dead soldiers who were sent as an expeditionary force 1,000 years ago. These articles have been collected by hunting cave servants. Take them to Antharas Watchman Gilmore

data.name: Old Key
data.description: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendent Sir Kristof Rodemai is living in Town of Giran. Take it to him

data.name: Old Hilt
data.description: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendant Duelist Kaien is living in the Town of Oren. Take it to him

data.name: Totem Necklace
data.description: An article left by a dead soldier. His descendent, High Prefect Garvarentz, is living in Hunters Village. Take it to him

data.name: Einhasad Crucifix
data.description: An article left by a dead soldier. Take it to High Priest Orven of Einhasad Temple in Town of Aden where the dead soldier used to be stationed

data.name: Victim's Arm Bone
data.description: The arm bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia

data.name: Victim's Thigh Bone
data.description: The thigh bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia

data.name: Victim's Skull
data.description: The skull of a victim who has been eaten alive by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia

data.name: Victim's Rib Bone
data.description: The rib bone of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia

data.name: Victim's Spine
data.description: The spine of a victim who has been eaten by a Crokian. Collect the five types of bones and take them to Xenovia

data.name: Jar of Bones
data.description: An urn that contains the bones of all the victims. Ask Mad Doctor Orpheus to resurrect the victims

data.name: Useless Bone Pieces
data.description: Useless bone pieces obtained after hunting Crokians. If you take them to Orpheus, perhaps something good will happen...?\0

data.name: Powder to Summon Dead Souls
data.description: The magic powder bought from Magister Xenovia. Throw it along with the victims' bones into the Psychic Medium's Urn

data.name: Sack of the Dead
data.description: A sack containing a victim's soul. An urn was possessed by the victim's soul. Take it to Locksmith Dorothy

data.name: Frog Prince
data.description: What are you waiting for? You promised to help me! Release me from this curse immediately! I must regain my appearance as soon as possible!!!\0

data.name: Fly Powder
data.description: Powder made by grinding dried flies. Use it when you fail in your attempt to transform a frog

data.name: Calculator
data.description: The latest model of calculator. Take it to Blacksmith Brunon

data.name: Gemstone Beast's Crystal
data.description: Crystal obtained by slaying a gemstone beast. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera

data.name: Titan's Powerstone
data.description: The Titan's Powerstone that has been extracted from the corpse of a Giant. Take it to Magister Hanellin

data.name: Hanellin's 1st Letter
data.description: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Magister Harne of the Dark Elven Village and receive your next assignment from her

data.name: Hanellin's 2nd Letter
data.description: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Claudia Athebaldt of Town of Aden and receive your next assignment from her

data.name: Hanellin's 3rd Letter
data.description: A letter that Hanellin entrusted you with. Take it to Martien of the Town of Giran and receive your next assignment from him

data.name: 1st Key of Ark
data.description: The key that was found upon the corpse of the guardian of the sacred ark. Use this key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object

data.name: 2nd Key of Ark
data.description: The key that was taken after killing Elberos, the guardian of the sacred ark. Use the key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object

data.name: 3rd Key of Ark
data.description: The key that was taken after killing Shadowfang, the guardian of the sacred ark. Use the key to open the sacred ark and retrieve the sacred object

data.name: White Fabric
data.description: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Kill the Platinum Tribe Shamans and Overlords and soak the cloth with their blood

data.name: Blooded Fabric
data.description: A piece of cloth soaked in the blood of angels and the Platinum race. Hanellin has told you that in order to challenge Baium, you must wrap this blood-soaked cloth around your body

data.name: Order of Gosta
data.description: The order states that you should hunt Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman and bring back their fangs as proof

data.name: Lizard Fang
data.description: The fangs that have been collected as proofs that Tasaba Lizardmen and Tasaba Lizardman Shaman have been hunted

data.name: Barrel of League
data.description: This seems to be the cargo that was stolen from Iason Heine's wagon by Tasaba Lizardmen

data.name: Operation Document - 1/10
data.description: This document was found in the cargo of the Trade Guild. The document contains various information regarding Innadril. How could this have happened...?\0

data.name: Completed Operation Order
data.description: A book consisting of 10 pages of operation orders bound together. Who should we take it to...?\0

data.name: Iason Heine's Bill
data.description: The bill's face value is 1,000 adena. If you take it to Roman of the Blacksmith Guild in Innadril, you can use it to purchase various ingredients

data.name: Gillian's Diary
data.description: Gillian's diary. The last entry was made one year ago

data.name: Gillian's Notes
data.description: Partial lyrics of a song Gillian was jotting down

data.name: Unfinished Music
data.description: An unfinished music score of a song that Gilian composed for a former lover

data.name: Gillian's Heart
data.description: The heart that Gillian threw out to forget his feelings of love. Return it to the Revenant of Gillian

data.name: Gandi Tribe's Relic
data.description: The sacred object of the Gandi Tribe that has been recovered from Bugbears. Take it to Gandi Chief Chianta in the Town of Dion

data.name: Swan's Flute
data.description: A flute that Troubadour Swan had obtained as a gift for Musician Nanarin

data.name: Swan's Letter
data.description: A love letter that Troubadour Swan wants to send to Musician Nanarin along with the flute. Take them to Musician Nanarin

data.name: Event Clothes
data.description: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado

data.name: Nanarin's Flute
data.description: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado

data.name: Sabrin's Black Beer
data.description: A gift that Musician Nanarin is sending to Musician Barbado. Take it to Barbado

data.name: Stolen Black Beer
data.description: Black beer that was stolen from Jonas. Take it to Trader Sabrin

data.name: Stolen Event Clothes
data.description: Event clothes that were stolen from Trader Sonia. Take them to Guard Xaber

data.name: Clothes Chest Key
data.description: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the clothes chest and retrieve the event clothes

data.name: Beer Chest Key
data.description: The key given by Bard Swan. Use this key to open the beer chest and get the black beer out of it

data.name: Fairy Leaf
data.description: A leaf given by Fairy Mimyu to put on the fairy's neck wound that was inflicted by a Hatchling

data.name: Ratman Scavenger's Skull
data.description: Heads of Ratman Scavengers that you hunted after receiving a request from Katari. Collect 10 of them and take them to Katari

data.name: Turek War Hound's Tail
data.description: The tails of Turek war Hounds that Piotur asks you to catch. Collect 10 of them and take them to Piotur

data.name: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart
data.description: Tyrant Kingpin's Heart. Take it to Elder Casian

data.name: Trisalim Tarantula's Venom Sac
data.description: The venom sacs of Trisalim Tarantulas that Magister Joan asked you to hunt. Collect three and take them to Magister Joan

data.name: Penitent's Manacles
data.description: A heavy set of manacles forged at the Black Judge's behest. Take them to the Black Judge

data.name: Manual of Manacles
data.description: Blacksmith's Frame x 1, Steel x 5, Adamantite Nugget x 2, Silver Nugget x 10, Cokes x 10\0

data.name: Tarlk Amulet
data.description: A mark that can be obtained by catching a Tarlk Bugbear or a Tarlk Basilisk. Collect 30 and take them to a Clan Hall Herald

data.name: Contest Certificate
data.description: A certificate that one can present to participate in the hunt for Tarlk Basilisks, a preliminary contest for a Clan Hall Siege War

data.name: Ant's Ichor
data.description: Bodily fluids extracted from ants or ant captains. Collect 20 and take them to Elder Casian

data.name: Noble Ant's Nerve Tissue
data.description: The nerve tissue harvested from a Noble Ant's head. Take it to Elder Casian along with the Ant's Ichor

data.name: Casian's Enzyme
data.description: Enzyme created by Elder Casian. Find the Ant Larvae sleeping within the Ant Nest Dungeon and administer the enzyme to them

data.name: Alligator Leather
data.description: Pelts obtained from alligators caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enverun

data.name: Blue Back Alligator Leather
data.description: Leather from Blue Back Alligators caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enverun at a high price

data.name: Jewel Studded Alligator Leather
data.description: A piece of Jewel Studded Alligator Leather caught on Alligator Island. You can sell it to Enverun at a high price

data.name: Certificate of Approval to Create a Belt
data.description: If you take a sufficient amount of Alligator Leather and show it to Gaban a master leather craftsman, you can have an Alligator Leather Belt made

data.name: Certificate of Approval to Create a Purse
data.description: If you take a sufficient amount of Alligator Leather and show it to Gaban a master leather craftsman, you can have an Alligator Leather Purse made

data.name: Water Crystal
data.description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of water. You should find the Stone Statue of Water and dedicate it to the statue

data.name: Fire Crystal
data.description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of fire. You should find the Stone Statue of Fire and dedicate it to the statue

data.name: Wind Crystal
data.description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of wind. You should find the Stone Statue of Wind and dedicate it to the statue

data.name: Earth Crystal
data.description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of earth. You should find the Stone Statue of Earth and dedicate it to the statue

data.name: Dark Crystal
data.description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of darkness. You should find the Stone Statue of Darkness and dedicate it to the statue

data.name: Crystal of Light
data.description: A lump of crystal that contains the energy of light. You should find the Stone Statue of Light and dedicate it to the statue

data.name: Jade Crystal
data.description: Jade crystals that had been gathered from the Enchanted Valley. Collect them and take them to Bentley of Hunters Village

data.name: Bust of Ancient Goddess
data.description: A statue of a goddess that was created by the ancient sculptor Berona in ancient times

data.name: The Work of the ancient sculptor Berona
data.description: A statue created by the ancient sculptor Berona. It has not been evaluated by antique experts yet

data.name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Prototype
data.description: A statue created by Beron an ancient sculptor. - Prototype\0

data.name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Original
data.description: A statue created by Beron a sculptor in ancient times. - Original\0

data.name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Replica
data.description: Replicated statues that have been created by present day sculptors who imitated Berona's works

data.name: Ancient Statue of Goddess: Forgery
data.description: Forgeries that have been created in imitation of the ancient sculptor Berona's works

data.name: Blue Eva
data.description: Special Coin\0

data.name: Gold Einhasad
data.description: Special Coin\0

data.name: Silver Shilen
data.description: Special Coin\0

data.name: Bloody Pa'agrio
data.description: Special Coin\0

data.name: Barrel of Liquor
data.description: A barrel that is filled to the brim with delicious and fragrant liquor. The barrel is very heavy

data.name: Precious Scarab
data.description: A scarab that is transparent and shines like a precious stone. Among hustlers it is traded at a high price

data.name: Simbelmyne
data.description: A type of flower that is believed to have the power to heal sickness. It is a favorite of elves

data.name: Odd (looking) Doll
data.description: It is a strange looking statue of a living creature that looks like an imp. It is an orc's favorite item

data.name: Scarlet Dress
data.description: A very attractive scarlet Aden-style dress designed for a virtuous lady

data.name: Nebulite Orb
data.description: It is made by cutting Nebulite into a spherical shape. Take this to Magic Trader Cema in Hardin's Academy

data.name: Ectoplasm Liqueur
data.description: An exotic tasting liqueur made from ectoplasm. Very popular among connoisseurs

data.name: Prince's Trophy
data.description: The winning trophy that Prince Malcom won in a dance competition. You can sell it at a store or keep it as a souvenir

data.name: Prince's Autobiography
data.description: The autobiography of Prince Malcom that bears his hand-written signature. Sell it at a store

data.name: Prince's Bust
data.description: A statue of Prince Malcom made of pure gold. Although quite ugly, it will fetch a handsome price

data.name: Silk Handkerchief
data.description: A beautiful and elaborate handkerchief decorated with a flower pattern and lace. Its design could attract the attention of princes and princesses

data.name: Luxurious Goblet
data.description: A luxuriously designed goblet. It seems to be an object made during the period of the Elmo Aden Empire

data.name: Scepter of Darkness
data.description: A staff that gives off dark M. Atk. On its handle, the words "Great Demon King" are engraved

data.name: Succubus Perfume
data.description: Perfume used by Succubus noblewomen. A very strong fragrance, not popular among Elves and Humans

data.name: Succubus Mirror
data.description: A mirror used by Succubus noblewomen when they put on cosmetics. It is also said to be used occasionally by blood queens

data.name: Heart of Darkness
data.description: A heart-shaped stone piece that gives off the aura of dark M. Atk. On its reverse, the words "I love you Merkenis!" are engraved

data.name: Royal Orc Totem
data.description: A totem made by carving out a whole lump of red granite

data.name: Pearl Trodden/Trampled By A Wild Hog
data.description: A walnut sized bead that is smeared with dirt. Perhaps, it is a pearl

data.name: Boar's Tusk
data.description: The tusk of a boar that looks somewhat similar to the ivory of an elephant

data.name: Sweet Potato
data.description: A large sized sweet potato that was just plucked out of the soil. You s it or roast it. It will make a delicious treat

data.name: Beast's Claws
data.description: White lion's sharp claws. It is rumored that it is being traded among collectors at a high price

data.name: Beast's Mane
data.description: A white lion's luxuriant mane. It is rumored to be sold at a high price among collectors

data.name: Ginseng Root
data.description: Rare medicine imported from the Orient

data.name: Honey Jar
data.description: A jar containing sweet honey

data.name: Bear's Gall
data.description: The gall of a bear that is known to be highly effective in promoting one's health and well-being as well as having mysterious healing properties

data.name: Fresh Samon
data.description: A fresh salmon that seems to have been just caught from a river

data.name: Sushi Riceball
data.description: The Schuttgart type sushi rice ball. The delicious seasoning of well minced meat gets absorbed into the rice and produces a wonderful taste

data.name: Avellan Spice
data.description: Exotic spice that has been imported from Avella of the Orient

data.name: Lucky Rabbit Weed
data.description: Rabbit weed that is supposed to bring luck. It is the favorite food of rabbits and elpys

data.name: Malcom's Check
data.description: A check of tremendous face value signed by Prince Malcom. It can be cashed at a warehouse in Town of Giran

data.name: Deposit Box Key
data.description: A key for a private deposit box located in a warehouse in Town of Giran

data.name: Dwarven Royal Seal
data.description: A royal seal made of carved jade. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family

data.name: Dwarven Royal Crown
data.description: A king's crown made of gold. It is engraved with the seal of the Dwarven royal family

data.name: Dwarven Dance Manual
data.description: A dance manual that details ballroom dancing techniques. This book will make you a dancing hero!\0

data.name: Calculator
data.description: Allows one to perform a simple calculation

data.name: Hanellin's White Flower
data.description: A mark of Hanellin. Along with your companions each carrying a red flower and yellow flower respectively, go to Town of Aden to see her

data.name: Hanellin's Red Flower
data.description: A mark of Hanellin. Along with your companions each carrying a white flower and yellow flower respectively, go to Town of Aden to see her

data.name: Hanellin's Yellow Flower
data.description: A mark of Hanellin. Along with your companions each carrying a white flower and red flower respectively, go to Town of Aden to see her

data.name: Book of Saint
data.description: The book of Saint Solina. Take it along with the blood of a Saint and the bough of a Saint to Magister Hanellin

data.name: Blood of Saint
data.description: The blood of Saint Solin hardened into a dark-colored substance contained in a glass bottle. Take it, along with the Book of Saint and the Bough of Saint to Magister Hanellin

data.name: Bough of Saint
data.description: The Scepter of Saint Solina. It appears to be just a dead dry tree branch. Take it along with the book of a Saint and the blood of a Saint and take it to Magister Hanellin

data.name: White Fabric
data.description: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Hanellin will tell you its purpose

data.name: Green Dimensional Stone
data.description: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 1st to 3rd floor of the Tower of Insolence

data.name: Blue Dimensional Stone
data.description: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 4th to 6th floor of the Tower of Insolence

data.name: Red Dimensional Stone
data.description: Activates a Dimensional Vortex. Allows you to move to the 7th to 10th floor of the Tower of Insolence

data.name: Green Dimensional Stone - Shard
data.description: A broken shard of the green Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Kaplan

data.name: Blue Dimensional Stone - Shard
data.description: A broken shard of the blue Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Euclie

data.name: Red Dimensional Stone - Shard
data.description: A broken shard of the red Dimensional Stone. Collect these and take them to Researcher Pitagon

data.name: Bill of Iason Heine
data.description: Its value is 1000 aden redeemable by Roman of the Blacksmith Guild in Innadril. You can use it to buy various ingredients

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of Love
data.description: Posthumously released musical score of Gillian. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of Battle
data.description: The musical score for the Battle March of Flames. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of Journey
data.description: A musical score composed by Troubadour Swan. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Journey
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a journey. May only be used once

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Battle
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a battle

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Love
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of love. May only be used once

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Solitude
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of solitude. May only be used once

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of the Feast
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a feast. May only be used once

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Celebration
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a celebration. May only be used once

data.name: Echo Crystal - Theme of Comedy
data.description: An echo crystal that plays the theme music of a comedy. May only be used once

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of Celebration
data.description: A musical score containing the theme music of a celebration. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of Comedy
data.description: A musical score containing the theme music of a comedy. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of Solitude
data.description: A musical score composed by Musician Nanarin. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Musical Score - Theme of the Feast
data.description: A musical score composed by Musician Barbado. If you take it to Maestro Melody, you can have an echo crystal made

data.name: Dragon Bugle of Wind
data.description: A bugle used to summon a Wind Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master

data.name: Dragon Bugle of Star
data.description: A bugle used to summon a Star Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master

data.name: Dragon Bugle of Twilight
data.description: A bugle used to summon a Twilight Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master

data.name: Penitent's Manacles
data.description: The heavy manacles used to summon a Sin Eater. Summoning the Sin Eater consumes all the summoner's Exp. The Sin Eater must be fed Food for Wolves

data.name: Manacles of Penitent
data.description: Having consumed your sins, the Sin Eater has disappeared, leaving you with this ordinary pair of manacles. To repeat this quest, take them back to the Black Judge

data.name: Alligator Leather Belt
data.description: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman

data.name: Blue Alligator Leather Belt
data.description: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a rare blue type of Leather

data.name: Bejeweled Leather Belt
data.description: An Alligator Leather Belt designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a Leather that is studded with rare jewels

data.name: Alligator Leather Purse
data.description: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman

data.name: Blue Alligator Leather Purse
data.description: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made from a rare blue type of Leather

data.name: Bejeweled Purse
data.description: An Alligator Leather Purse designed and created by Verche, a master leather craftsman. It is made of Leather studded with rare jewels

data.name: Elemental Stone Powder
data.description: Elemental stone powder obtained from a stone statue in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell

data.name: Elemental Stone Shards
data.description: The shards of elemental stones obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell

data.name: Elemental Stone Lump
data.description: The lumps of elemental stone obtained from stone statues in the Forgotten Temple. Can be sold at any store or taken to Magister Nell

data.name: Bentley's Request
data.description: A request to find and bring back jade crystals from creatures such as Fline, Liele, Satyr etc. that inhabit the Enchanted Valley

data.name: Carson's Request
data.description: A request to recover the works of the ancient sculptor Berona from Hatar Ratmen and Vanor Silenos in the area near the Cemetery

data.name: Knuckle Duster Edge
data.description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Knuckle Duster. It can be bought from a regular store

data.name: Avadon Shield Fragment
data.description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make an Avadon Shield. It can be bought from a regular store

data.name: Recipe: Knuckle Duster
data.description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Knuckle Duster. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 5. The success rate is 100%

data.name: Recipe: Avadon Shield
data.description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for an Avadon Shield. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 6. The success rate is 100%

data.name: Lottery Ticket
data.description: A lottery ticket from Aden, redeemable at any lottery sales location. Winning numbers are posted every Saturday at 7 p.m. You can't win if you don't play! Good luck!\0

data.name: Monster Race Ticket - Single
data.description: A winning ticket from the monster race. Redeemable at the cashier of the race

data.name: Monster Race Ticket - Double
data.description: A winning daily double ticket from the monster race. Redeemable at the cashier of the race

data.name: Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3>
data.description: Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3> - Collect and take 10 units of this magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities. Can be used after completion of first class transfer and prior to completion of second class transfer by all classes

data.description: Greater Dye of STR <Str+1 Con-3>. data.description: A red crystal that absorbs souls. Once saturated it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used

data.name: Pipette Knife
data.description: An instrument used to collect the blood of living creatures. Use it to cut Baium and obtain a blood sample

data.name: Reiria's Soul Orb
data.description: A sphere containing Reiria's Soul. Take it to Maestro Reorin

data.description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from the demon Kernon. Take it to Maestro Reorin

data.description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from Golkond the Longhorn General. Take it to Maestro Reorin

data.description: A hammer used by a blacksmith. It is made by processing an adamantite nugget of high purity. Take it to Maestro Reorin

data.name: Seed: Alternative Dark Coda
data.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Gludio area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Dark Coda. For best results, a level 5-15 character must plant it on a level 5-15 monster

data.name: Keshanberk*Damascus
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, Max HP will increase by 25% as well. Enhances damage to target during PvP

data.name: Damascus*Damascus
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, Accuracy will increase by 6. Enhances damage to target during PvP

data.name: Stone of Contract
data.description: In order to obtain the power of darkness, you will first need to secure this item. Take it to Trader Galman in Dragon Valley

data.name: Alligator Tooth
data.description: Sharp canine tooth of the Alligator. Bring this to the warehouse keeper of Heine

data.name: Mysterious Map Piece
data.description: A faded piece of paper. Possibly part of a map

data.name: Carnivore Spore
data.description: A tissue sample collected from a spore zombie from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Herbivorous Spore
data.description: A spore sample collected from a rotting tree from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower

data.name: Jade Crystal
data.description: A jade crystal collected from the Enchanted Valley. Take it to Warehouse Freightman Silva of Hunters Village

data.name: Snake Scale
data.description: A snake scale from the bodies of Falibati and Trives. Take it to Grand Master Oltran of Town of Aden

data.name: Remains of Aden Residents
data.description: Remains of residents of Aden Castle who were killed during the Aden-Elmore war. Collect 60 of them and take them to High Priest Orven

data.name: Receipt of Supply
data.description: A document made from collected mysterious document pieces. Take it to Guard Coleman

data.name: Suspicious Document Piece
data.description: A piece of document that seems to contain some suspicious contents. If you collect 5 of them, you may be able to decipher the information the document conveys

data.name: Supply Items
data.description: Supply items for Taik Orcs. Take it to Guard Coleman and he will give you a reward

data.name: Pirate's Treasure Chest
data.description: A treasure chest that was obtained by slaying Zaken's followers. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Randolf of Town of Giran

data.name: Sairon's Silver Hair
data.description: Sairon's hair. Take it to Magister Dieter of Town of Giran

data.name: Karik Horn
data.description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia

data.name: Cave Howler Skull
data.description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia

data.name: Mysterious Book
data.description: A book obtained from The Giant's Cave. Written in an ancient language, its contents cannot be deciphered

data.name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Basic Level
data.description: A simple dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret some of the texts of the Titans

data.name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Intermediate Level
data.description: A dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret the entire texts of the Titans

data.name: Leaf of Eucalyptus
data.description: One of the ingredients used to make wine. Collect 80 of them and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion

data.name: Stone of Chill
data.description: A magical stone used by Enku Orc Shamans when they cast ice magic. Collect 100 of these and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion

data.name: Ritron's Fruit
data.description: A fruit with a tough, hard outer skin and a fragrant smell. Collect 4 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion

data.name: Moon Face Flower
data.description: A flower that is said to bloom only under moonlight. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion

data.name: Leech Fluids
data.description: The bodily fluids of a Leech that can be obtained from the Cruma Marshlands. Collect 10 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion

data.name: Royal Membership
data.description: It's a coin collectors' dream! Take it to Head Blacksmith Vergara

data.name: Kail's Coin
data.description: A coin owned by Sorcerer Kail who used to be an aid of Beleth. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Sorint

data.name: Coin Collecting Album
data.description: A high quality coin collecting album made of leather

data.name: Blood Offering
data.description: Blood that can be obtained by killing a Monster of Offering. The number of this item will determine your score

data.name: Scroll of Ancient Magic
data.description: A scroll that contains ancient magic. Take it to Gatekeeper Ziggurat

data.name: Ancient Ash Urn
data.description: An ancient urn that was found in the Tower of Insolence. Take it to Seer Reva of Town of Aden

data.name: Wesley's Mixing Stone
data.description: A small gemstone that is given by Wesley. This item is required to use a mixing urn

data.name: Magister's Mixing Stone
data.description: A gemstone that activates the mixing urn in the basement of the Ivory Tower

data.name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (10 Honey Rice Cake Set)
data.description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage II, this wrapped gift box contains 10 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage II Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (9 Honey Rice Cake Set)
data.description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage II, this wrapped gift box contains 9 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage II Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Red Soul Crystal: Stage 13
data.description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (8 Honey Rice Cake Set)
data.description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage II, this wrapped gift box contains 8 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage II Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (7 Honey Rice Cake Set)
data.description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage II, this wrapped gift box contains 7 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage II Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Green Soul Crystal: Stage 13
data.description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (6 Honey Rice Cake Set)
data.description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage II, this wrapped gift box contains 6 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage II Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (3 Honey Wheat Cake Set)
data.description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage II, this wrapped gift box contains 3 multi-colored honey wheat cakes and 1 Lineage II Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blue Soul Crystal: Stage 13
data.description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.name: Pirate's Treasure Map

data.name: Green Colored Lure - Low Grade
data.description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fast fish

data.description: This fishing lure is preferred by fast fish

data.description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fast fish

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 8 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 2 for all D-grade weapons with the exception of bow, which will increase by 4. M. Atk. increases by 2 for all weapons. Starting at +4, the P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 5 for S-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 10 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for S-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Infinity Blade
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, casts a P. Def.-decreasing de-buff on the target. Also causes damage shield, increases Max HP/Max MP/Max CP, and Shield Defense. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Cleaver
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts additional damage on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max CP and Critical Damage/Rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Axe
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts discord on the target. Also causes damage shield, and increases Max HP/Max MP/Max CP and shield rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Rod
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. Recovers HP 100%, increases Max MP/Max CP, increases spell Casting Spd., and increases MP Regeneration Rate during magic skill use. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Crusher
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts stun on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max CP and Atk. Spd. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Scepter
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. Recovers HP 100% and adds holy P. Atk. Has a chance of increasing Max MP, Max CP, M. Atk., and M. Critical Rate, and of decreasing MP consumption and Magic Cancel Rate while using a magic skill. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Stinger
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts silence on the target. Also causes Vampiric Rage, and increases success rate when using mortal type skills. Increases Max MP/Max CP, Atk. Spd. and MP Regeneration Rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Fang
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts stun on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max MP/Max CP and evasion. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Bow
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts slow on the target. Also causes Cheap Shot. Decreases reuse delay and increases Max MP/Max CP. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Wing
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts physical skill silence on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max MP/Max CP and Critical Rate. Adds holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Infinity Spear
data.description: Divine hero's weapon. During a critical attack, inflicts cancel on the target. Also has a chance of causing skill reflect and increasing Max HP/Max CP, Atk. Spd., and Accuracy. Adds Holy P. Atk. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Old Golden Spice
data.description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop adena

data.name: Old Crystal Spice
data.description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop materials

data.name: Beast Soulshot
data.description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of attack. The number of soulshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)\0

data.name: Beast Spiritshot
data.description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)\0

data.name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
data.description: The light of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of blessed spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)\0

data.name: Baby Buffalo Panpipe
data.description: A panpipe that is used to call a baby buffalo. The baby buffalo will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires

data.name: Baby Cougar Chime
data.description: A chime that is used to call a baby cougar. The baby cougar will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires

data.name: Baby Kookaburra Ocarina
data.description: An ocarina that is used to call a baby Kookaburra. The baby Kookaburra will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires

data.name: Noblesse Gate Pass
data.description: Expired certificate. Can be purchased from a shop

data.name: Scroll: Protection of Valakas
data.description: Fire dragon's protection amulet. Upon use, resistance against Fire dragon's front attack increases

data.name: Scroll: Flames of Valakas
data.description: Removes the abnormal state resulting from the fiery breath attack of Valakas

data.name: Scroll: Slay Valakas
data.description: Increases your P. Atk. when fighting against Valakas

data.name: Earring of Antharas
data.description: MP +37, Resistance to Bleed +40%, Bleed attack rate +40%, vampiric rage effect, Resistance to Stun/Mental attacks +30%, Stun/Mental attack rate +30%, decreases MP consumption, and increases heal amount and Resistance to Earth. Only one effect is applied when two of the same earrings are equipped

data.name: Necklace of Valakas
data.description: MP +50, Resistance to Sleep +40%, Sleep attack rate +40%, HP +445, decreases skill reuse delay, and increases P. Atk., M. Atk., Wild Magic effect, Damage Shield effect, and Resistance to Fire

data.name: Ring of Baium
data.description: MP +21, Resistance to Poison +40%, Poison attack rate +40%, Resistance to Hold +30%, Hold attack rate +30%, increase Accuracy, Critical Damage, Atk. Spd. and Casting Spd. When equipped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied

data.name: Earring of Zaken
data.description: MP+31; Resistance to Bleed +30%; Bleed attack rate +30%; increases heal amount; vampiric rage effect; Resistance to Shock/Mental attacks +20%; Shock/Mental attack rate +20%. When equipped with two identical earrings, only one effect is applied. When equipped together with Blessed Earring of Zaken, only the effect of Earring of Zaken will be applied

data.name: Ring of Queen Ant
data.description: MP +21, Resistance to Poison +30%, Poison attack rate +30%, increase Accuracy, increase Critical Damage, Resistance to Hold +20%, and Hold attack rate +20%. When equipped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied

data.name: Earring of Orfen
data.description: MP +31, Resistance to Bleed +20%, chance of Bleed attack +20%, and increase healing effects. When eqiupped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied

data.name: Ring of Core
data.description: MP +21, Resistance to Poison +20%, Poison attack rate +20%, and increase Accuracy. When eqiupped with two identical rings, the effect of only one ring will be applied

data.description: A totem doll you have obtained while hunting black magi according to the instructions of Lidia's maid. Take this to the mysterious magus and question him

data.description: A flower bouquet that Dorian asked you to lay at the gravestone in the south

data.name: Silver Cross of Einhasad
data.description: A talisman given by Dorian. He asked you to find information about the monsters that appear in the Forest of the Dead at night

data.name: Broken Silver Cross of Einhasad
data.description: A talisman given by Dorian. It seems to have been cracked by a powerful force

data.name: Lidia's Dress
data.description: A red dress that was unearthed from the grave of Rose. It exhibits an aristocratic taste

data.name: Suspicious Totem Doll
data.description: The totem doll that was returned by the mysterious magus. Take it to the priests of the Rune Township and question them about it

data.name: Gemstone Key
data.description: A gemstone studded key. It has a nickname of "bejeweled staff" that indicates the authority of the king

data.name: Suspicious Totem Doll
data.description: A suspicious totem doll that one obtains after slaying the underlings of Triol

data.name: Box of Cookies
data.description: Well sealed box of cookies

data.name: Luxury Wine
data.description: Premium wine that is on delivery

data.name: Skein of Yarn
data.description: Yarn made of twisted spider web. Tenacious and sturdy

data.name: Rough Jewel
data.description: Rough stone of jewel. Becomes a beautiful jewel when processed

data.name: Enchanted Iron
data.description: Sturdier than generic iron. Tools made of this iron are said to be priceless

data.name: Signet Ring
data.description: A seal that represents noble family

data.name: Map
data.description: A map that is drawn for Miki the Cat

data.name: Medicinal Herb
data.description: A medicinal herb that Miki the Cat found in Devil's Isle. Gentler is in need of this herb

data.name: Crystal of Seal
data.description: A crystal that is used to activate the sealing in the altar

data.name: Blood of Saint
data.description: Saint's blood that has power of holiness

data.name: Blood of Saint
data.description: The blood obtained at the time of Kel Mahum's death. It contains the power of Einhasad

data.name: Seal of Light
data.description: A seal from a Mysterious Necromancer. It uses the power of light

data.name: Bead of Obedience
data.description: A gem from Kel Mahum that has power of Einhasad

data.name: Gem of Saints
data.description: A gem that is left after the cremation of a saint. It has power of holiness

data.name: Feather Ornament
data.description: A warrior symbol for Langk Lizardman

data.name: Tooth of Totem
data.description: A tooth that has mysterious power

data.name: Tooth of Dragon
data.description: A tooth of Langk Lizardman Commanders that strengthens their warriors

data.name: Letter of Iris
data.description: A letter from Iris to Magister Rohmer in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Letter of Rohmer
data.description: A letter from Rohmer to Magister Iris in Gludin Village

data.name: Black Bone Necklace
data.description: A charm of Maille Lizardman Warriors

data.name: Red Bone Necklace
data.description: A charm of Maille Lizardman Commanders

data.name: Gem of Maille Lizardman
data.description: A gem of Maille Lizardman that has mysterious power

data.name: Patrol's Report
data.description: A report from Guard Praga to Magister Rohmer

data.name: Shining Gem
data.description: A gem that controls Araneid

data.description: A gem in Araneid's head that controls them

data.name: Jewel of Innocence

data.description: Nepenthes seed used by Varka Silenos as currency

data.description: Certificate acquired when one becomes an avenger

data.description: A dark crystal that constitutes Daimon

data.name: Ice Wine
data.description: A mysterious wine made with using an Ice Crystal

data.name: Donath's' Dish
data.description: A dish made by Donath

data.name: Donath's' Note - Vol.1
data.description: A note that has cooking tips written by Donath

data.name: Shaved Ice
data.description: Lilly's most favorite dessert that is made of a mixture of shaved ice and sweet flavorings

data.name: Ice Cream
data.description: Sweet, soft and cold scoop of ice cream

data.name: Ice Crystal Gemstone
data.description: When sunlight reflects on it, it shines brightly with a rainbow of colors

data.name: Offering
data.description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness

data.name: Offering
data.description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness
