data.name: Ancient Language Dictionary
data.description: A dictionary that is used to decipher an ancient language

data.name: Ancient Language Dictionary
data.description: A dictionary that is used to decipher an ancient language

data.name: Spinneret
data.description: A spider's anatomical structure from which spider web is produced

data.name: Investigative Report
data.description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Justin

data.name: Investigative Report
data.description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Alminas

data.name: Investigative Report
data.description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Kamilen

data.name: Investigative Report
data.description: A document received from Information Broker Bavarin. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Guard Baird

data.name: Investigative Report
data.description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by High Priest Gregory

data.name: Ice Cold Flower
data.description: An ice crystal that is wrapped in fish scales and emits cold, icy air. Since it is beautifully created with a highly skilled hand, it looks like a flower

data.name: Pure Ice
data.description: A chunk of purest ice that is made by freezing purified water. It is known to contain the power of the gods from the beginning of the world

data.name: Bitter Cold Beer
data.description: The beer requested by Blacksmith Feynn. Just touching it makes your hands feel like they are freezing

data.name: Multiple Course Meal
data.description: An elaborate meal requested by the Arena Manager. It is said to be eaten by duelists in ancient times to strengthen their stamina the day before their match

data.name: Dead Souls Fish Soup
data.description: A soup that is supposed to contain all the nutrition of the fish it is made from. According to legend, depending on the fish you use to make it, it can have the effect of increasing or decreasing one's lifespan

data.name: Bitter Cold Vodka
data.description: A legendary liquor that is made by dipping hot flames into cold, freezing ice. Although it feels cold to the lips it becomes hot in one's body

data.name: Silver Crystal
data.description: The type of crystal that is needed to store wedding march music

data.name: Red Crystal
data.description: The type of crystal that is needed to store birthday party music

data.name: Vampire's Heart
data.description: The heart that is ripped out of the body of a vampire. It is still beating and pumping out blood

data.name: Zombie's Brain
data.description: A piece of brain collected from an undead monster in the Forest of the Dead. It may contain the memory of the moment of its death

data.name: Rib Bone of a Black Magus
data.description: The remaining bone that is left in the place where a necromancer died and disappeared. Perhaps it was used to transfix the shape of the necromancer

data.name: Zombie's Liver
data.description: A liver that is rotting and emitting a strong stench. It is known to be a source of magical power of undead

data.name: Top Quality Meat
data.description: A piece of top quality meat that is obtained by slaughtering a wild beast of proper age. Only one piece of this high quality meat can be obtained from one beast

data.name: Young Wild Beast Meat
data.description: A piece of meat obtained by slaughtering a wild beast that is too young. Although it may have a pleasant arom it doesn't give good flavor when eating it

data.name: Map Piece
data.description: A piece of a map that was once possessed by Monster Eyes

data.name: Yellow Map
data.description: A map that contains a plot of the beasts. Take it to Mercenary Captain Sophya

data.name: Map Piece
data.description: A piece of map obtained from the ghostly apparitions that haunt the Execution Grounds

data.name: Ivory Colored Map
data.description: A map that contains strange information. By the way, sometime ago, Trader Galladucci complained that one of the maps he was supposed to receive didn't arrive...?\0

data.name: Broken Gemstone Fragment
data.description: A fragment of gemstone that can be obtained by hunting Maille Lizardmen

data.name: Gold Colored Gemstone
data.description: A gold colored orb. High Priest Drikus is supposed to be looking for it

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Talking Island Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Talking Island

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Elven Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Elven Village

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Dark Elven Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Dark Elven Village

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Orc Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Orc Village

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Dwarven Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Dwarven Village

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Town of Giran
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Town of Giran

data.name: Fishing Manual
data.description: An instructional book of fishing techniques. You can double-click it to read it

data.name: Dimensional Diamond
data.description: A crystal that is filled with magical power. It is needed when casting Teleportation magic. If you collect this item and take them to a gatekeeper, you can trade them for various types of Scroll of Escape

data.name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
data.description: A document with Galladucci's trader order. Take it to Trader Gentler at his magic shop

data.name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
data.description: A document with Galladucci's trader order. Take it to Jeweler Sandra at her shop

data.name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
data.description: A document with Galladucci's order. Take it to Priest Dustin at his shop

data.name: Purified Magic Necklace
data.description: It's the item given by Priest Dustin. It seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for

data.name: Gemstone Powder
data.description: The item given by Jeweler Sandra. This seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for

data.name: Magic Sword Hilt
data.description: An item given by Trader Gentler. This seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for

data.name: Four-leaf Golden Clover Coin
data.description: A gold coin that is engraved with a four-leaf clover design

data.name: Mark of Traveler
data.description: A certificate to prove to Trader Galladucci the traveler's identity

data.name: Baulro's Letter
data.description: The letter sent by Magister Baulro to Archon Sir Windawood

data.name: Ariel's Recommendation
data.description: A letter of recommendation Trader Ariel wrote for you to be sent to Hierarch Asterios

data.name: Roselyn's Note
data.description: A note Roselyn wrote while being angry and wrathful. You should deliver it to Magister Harne

data.name: Very Expensive Necklace
data.description: A gift from Head Blacksmith Reed for Priest of the Earth Gerald. It looks very expensive

data.name: Draconic Bow
data.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Cheap Shot, Focus, or Critical Slow

data.name: Draconic Bow
data.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a 26% chance of decreasing MP consumption to 1 on a general attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Draconic Bow
data.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Critical by 88. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Draconic Bow
data.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nHas a chance of casting Slow on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Draconic Bow Shaft
data.description: Main ingredient essentially required for a Dwarf to make a Draconic Bow. Can also be sold at ordinary shops

data.name: Recipe: Draconic Bow (60%)
data.description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Draconic Bow. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 60%

data.name: Recipe: Draconic Bow (100%)
data.description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Draconic Bow. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 100%

data.name: Baby Spice
data.description: When the food gauge of a baby buffalo, a baby cougar or a baby kookaburra drops to 55% or below, this feed will be consumed automatically

data.name: Sweet Fluid
data.description: A type of fluid with a sweet fragrance. It is used as an ingredient to make a fishing shot

data.name: Legend of Seventeen
data.description: A record of the seventeen heroes who fought against Antharas, the Land Dragon

data.name: Faded Poetry Book
data.description: A poetry book written by an unknown Elven bard several hundred years ago

data.name: Echo Crystal - Forgotten Song
data.description: An echo crystal that contains the song of Forgotten Heroes

data.name: Strand of Golden Hair
data.description: A strand of hair that seems to have fallen from a blonde-haired lady

data.name: Ring of Goddess: Waterbinder
data.description: Ring with a subtle blue gem. When picked up, it makes a sound like a flowing brook

data.name: Necklace of Goddess: EverGreen
data.description: A necklace with a clear and bright bluish green crystal as a medallion. The moment when you hold it in your hand, you smell the scent of grass, wet with spring rain

data.name: Staff of Goddess: Rain Song
data.description: A wooden staff that is embedded with a light blue orb at the top of it. It gives you a feeling of an ocean breeze filled with moisture blowing gently in your face

data.name: Relic Box
data.description: Box containing 3 relics of Goddess\0

data.name: Orb of Binding
data.description: A silver colored orb that emanates a strong feeling of magical power

data.name: Sorcery Ingredient
data.description: A sorcery ingredient that is used by Witch Kalis

data.name: Malruk Succubus Claw
data.description: Thin and sharp claw obtained from Malruk Succubus\0

data.name: Crimson Moss
data.description: Crimson Moss obtained from Swamp of Screams\0

data.name: Rahorakti's Miraculous Medicine
data.description: Remedy prescribed by Grand Seer Rahorakti for Dwarf Girl Kassandra\0

data.name: Worn Tarot Card - Wealth
data.description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes wealth

data.name: Worn Tarot Card - Power
data.description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes power

data.name: Worn Tarot Card - Love
data.description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes love

data.name: Worn Tarot Card - Knowledge
data.description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes knowledge

data.name: Summoner Keats' Letter
data.description: A clumsily written letter written by Summoner Keats who was turned into a frog

data.name: Miracle Potion of Transferred Life
data.description: An Elven miracle cure mixed by Priest Cerenas

data.name: Kamilen's Antidote
data.description: A medicine made by Magister Kamilen to cure Summoner Noctisse

data.name: Sealed Envelope
data.description: A sealed envelope given by Information Broker Bavarin

data.name: Proof of Catching a Fish
data.description: A fishing certificate. If you collect it and take it to a member of the Fishermen's Guild, you can learn a skill that is related to expanding a slot

data.name: Wind Fishing Lure
data.description: A lure that was given out by Lanosco. It contains the hidden power of wind. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it

data.name: Icy Air Fishing Lure
data.description: A lure that was given out by O'Fulle. It contains the hidden power of icy air. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it

data.name: Earth Fishing Lure
data.description: A lure that was given out by Willie. It contains the hidden power of earth. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it

data.name: Flaming Fishing Lure
data.description: A lure that was given out by Linnaeus. It contains the hidden power of flames. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it

data.name: Chest Caught by Wind Fishing Lure
data.description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of wind by using the wind fishing lure

data.name: Chest Caught by Icy Air Fishing Lure
data.description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of icy air by using the wind fishing lure

data.name: Chest Caught by Earth Fishing Lure
data.description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of earth by using the wind fishing lure

data.name: Chest Caught by using a Flaming Fishing Lure
data.description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of fire water by using the wind fishing lure

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Ketra Orc Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Ketra Orc Village. Cannot be sold in shops

data.name: Scroll of Escape: Varka Silenos Village
data.description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Varka Silenos Village. Cannot be sold in shops

data.name: Trash
data.description: Saint's blood that has power of holiness

data.name: Essence of Wind
data.description: Essence of wind extracted from Singing Wind. It is an item requested by Lanosco

data.name: Lost Bait Ingredient
data.description: The lost bait that was recovered from a Fettered Soul. O'Fulle asked you to bring it back to him

data.name: Eye of Tarlk Basilisk
data.description: An eye harvested from a Tarlk Basilisk. Willie asked you to bring it back to him

data.name: Crimson Drake Heart
data.description: Heart of a Crimson Drake surrounded by flames. Linnaeus asked you to bring it back to him

data.name: Strange Golem Blueprint
data.description: A golem blueprint with an unusual design that is different from any other golem blueprint. It seems to be designed by Shaling

data.name: Kiki's Letter
data.description: A completely sealed letter. On the envelope, Kiki's name is written as its recipient

data.name: Small Glass Box
data.description: A beautiful box made of glass. It is engraved with the names of Anabel and Liesel

data.name: Rukal's Musical Score
data.description: A musical score of beautiful music. Its author is written down as Composer Rukal

data.name: Watching Eyes

data.description: This is a scale of the Delu Lizardman that has been harassing the farmers of Floran. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village

data.description: Hammer and Torch Circlet. Can be worn by the lord of Schuttgart Castle and clan members but not by allies. Allows use of Residential Skills when equipped. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.description: MP +42, increase Resistance to sleep/paralysis/stun by 15%, increase sleep/paralysis/stun attack chance by 15%, increase Resistance to poison/bleed by 25%, increase poison/bleed attack chance by 25%, decrease in skill re-use delay, increase Damage Shield effect, and increase Resistance to Dark attacks

data.name: Soul Breaking Arrow
data.description: Double-clicking the arrow temporarily pauses Frintezza's musical performance. It cannot be dropped and is deleted upon entering the Last Imperial Tomb

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Green
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 1~3 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Jade
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a jade fish (level 4~6 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Blue
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a blue fish (level 7~9 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Yellow
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a yellow fish (level 10~12 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Orange
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch an orange fish (level 13~15 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Purple
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a purple fish (level 16~18 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Red
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a red fish (level 19~21 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - White
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a white fish (level 22~24 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion - Black
data.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 25~27 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect

data.name: Fisherman's Potion
data.description: Restores a player's fishing mastery level, which was lowered by the Fisherman's Potion, back to the previous level

data.name: Prize-Winning Fishing Lure
data.description: Use this lure to increase your chances of catching a large, prize-winning fish

data.name: Prize-Winning Night Fishing Lure
data.description: Use this lure at night to increase your chances of catching a large, prize-winning fish. It cannot be used during the day

data.name: Prize-Winning Novice Fishing Lure
data.description: Novice fishermen should use this lure to increase the chances of catching a large, prize-winning fish. Only fish intended for novice fishermen will take this bait, however

data.description: This formula for manufacturing a Destroyer Hammer can only be used by Dwarves and Requires Create Item - Skill Level 7. The success rate is 60%

data.name: Newbie Travel Token
data.description: This token is used to help novice travelers move to various places. Characters under level 20 may redeem it at a Newbie Guide for travel between Talking Island Village, Dark Elven Village, Elven Village, Dwarven Village, Orc Village, and Kamael Village

data.description: This crooked spider's tooth was pulled out by hand during close combat

data.name: Horn of Baar Dre Vanul

data.name: Old Box

data.description: This fishing lure can be used to catch old box while fishing in the Hot Springs area in Goddard. Only characters with Fishing Mastery Level 20 or higher can haul in the old box

data.name: Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)
data.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character of level 19 or below. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters

data.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters

data.description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters

data.name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Modern Language Version)

data.name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Version)
data.description: Awakens a forgotten ability. Those who lack the requisite knowledge cannot understand its contents. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)\0

data.name: Fire Stone
data.description: Fire elemental attack attribute increases by 5 when bestowed on a weapon. Water elemental defense attribute increases by 6 when bestowed on an armor. Attribute Stones can be used up to attribute level 3. Additionally, a maximum of three types of elemental defense attribute can be bestowed, and one type of elemental attack attribute. Opposite attributes cannot be bestowed together

data.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 14
data.description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 14
data.description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 14
data.description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.name: Life Stone - Level 80
data.description: An ordinary mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. May be used as an ingredient in weapon crafting by characters above level 80

data.name: Mid-Grade Life Stone - Level 80
data.description: A mid-grade mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. May be used as an ingredient in weapon crafting by characters above level 80

data.name: High-Grade Life Stone - Level 80
data.description: A high-grade mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. May be used as an ingredient in weapon crafting by characters above level 80

data.name: Top-Grade Life Stone - Level 80
data.description: This is the highest-grade mineral available, having been petrified by a creature's physical or magical force. May be used as an ingredient in weapon augmentation by characters higher than level 80

data.name: Orders
data.description: These Ol Mahum Orders can be found in the deserted campground. Collect them, as well as Ol Mahum Organization Charts, and give them to Kamael Master Sione

data.name: Organization Chart
data.description: This Ol Mahum Organization Chart can be found in the deserted campground. Collect them, as well as the Ol Mahum Orders, and give them to Kamael Master Sione

data.name: Gobie's Orders
data.description: Based on documents of the Ol Mahum, these orders outline the strategy for facing them. It should be delivered to Kamael Master Gobie

data.name: Letter to the Humans
data.description: This letter, written to the Human allies of the Kamael, should be delivered to Captain Bathis in the town of Gludio

data.name: Humans' Reply
data.description: This letter from Captain Bathis should be delivered to Master Gobie. \0

data.name: Letter to the Dark Elves
data.description: This letter, written to the Dark Elven allies of the Kamael, should be delivered to Grand Master Tobias in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Dark Elves' Reply
data.description: This letter from the Dark Elf Grand Master Tobias should be delivered to Kamael Master Gobie

data.name: Report to Sione
data.description: This report, written by Gobie on the progress of negotiations between the Humans and Dark Elves, should be delivered to Master Sione

data.name: Empty Soul Crystal
data.description: Ol Mahum Officer Tak can be imprisoned in this crystal. \0

data.name: Tak's Captured Soul
data.description: Ol Mahum Officer Tak is imprisoned within this crystal. Take it to Master Gobie for interrogation

data.name: Steelrazor Evaluation
data.description: An evaluation of the Kamael special forces, Steelrazor. Give it to a nearby Kamael Grand Master to complete the class transfer to a Warder

data.name: Enmity Crystal
data.description: Magister Clayton has been searching for this material. If you bring him a sufficient amount, he will give you information

data.name: Enmity Crystal Core
data.description: This magic item is made from Enmity Crystals. Give it to Blacksmith Poitan of Dion

data.name: Manuscript Page
data.description: Warehouse Keeper Holvas is searching for these pages. Collect them all and give them to him

data.name: Encoded Page on the Ancient Race
data.description: This coded document discusses new races. Holvas says that Kamael Grand Master Meldina can decode it

data.name: Kamael Inquisitor Trainee Mark
data.description: Show this to Selsi the head of the Kamael Intelligence Agency, to take the class transfer test

data.name: Fragment of Attack Orders
data.description: Fragments of attack orders gathered by killing Grandis. Collect all the fragments to discover who is behind the attack

data.name: Grandis' Attack Orders
data.description: Complete attack orders which say the attack was requested by Ivory Tower Magister Gaius. Let's interrogate Gaius with the request

data.name: Manashen's Talisman
data.description: Pieces of a control charm obtained by killing Manashen. You may find out who controlled Manashen if you can find every piece of the charm

data.name: Research on the Giants and the Ancient Race

data.name: Kamael Inquisitor Mark
data.description: This mark proves that you have successfully passed the Inquisitor test. Show it to a Kamael Grand Master to be transferred to Arbalester

data.name: Echo Crystal of Free Thought

data.name: Parme's Letter
data.description: This letter from the Witch of Water Dragon following the recovery of her memory should be delivered to Priest Karnis

data.name: Refined Crystal Sample
data.description: This magic material sought by a Wizard who was sent to the Ivory Tower to keep Hellbound Island under observation. Give it to him and try to talk with him

data.name: Stabilized Ectoplasm
data.description: Hardin requires this material for his studies on transformation magic. Deliver it to him to enable him to carry on with his experiments

data.name: Ectoplasm
data.description: This material is necessary for creating stabilized ectoplasm, which can be used in transformation magic. \0

data.name: Hardin's Instructions

When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical Attack by 109, and Max HP increases by 10%. Increases the damage inflicted during PvP

data.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 15
data.description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters

data.description: Dimensional item\\nYou can resurrect right away at the spot where you get killed if you have the Feather of Blessing. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant

data.name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (D-Grade)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nItem that raises a D-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 20%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (C-Grade)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nItem that raises a C-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 18%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (B-Grade)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nItem that raises a B-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 15%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (A-Grade)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nItem that raises an A-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 12%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (S-Grade)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nItem that raises an S-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 10%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Armor-Type Enhance Backup Stone (D-Grade)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nItem that raises a D-Grade armor's enchant rate by 35%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. For one-piece items, can only be used on items with 4~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Extra Entrance Pass - Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss). Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to the Hall of the Abyss exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant

Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant

data.name: For PC Cafe - Daimon Crystal
data.description: PC Cafe exclusive item with a power of Daimon Crystal Available to enchant by the enchanted scroll of PC Cafe exclusive weapons Increases Casting Spd. by 61 additionally, and increases damage inflicted during PvP. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or crystallized. Cannot be granted additional functions

data.name: For PC Cafe - Tallum Blade*Damascus
data.description: PC Cafe exclusive item with a power of Tallum Blade*Damascus Available to enchant by the enchanted scroll of PC Cafe exclusive weapons Upon enchanted over 4, the function to increase Atk. Spd. by 8% is given, and the damage on PvP increases. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or crystallized. Cannot be granted additional functions

data.name: For PC Cafe - Eclair Bijou
data.description: Kamael exclusive weapon.\\nPC Cafe exclusive item containing the power of an Eclair Bijou. Can be enchanted by using the PC Cafe Exclusive Weapon Enhance Scroll. Also increases Atk. Spd. by about 6% and damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted to 4 or more, during a critical attack, party members including yourself will receive at a fixed rate increased attack power, magic power, and healing capacity, as well as decreased MP consumption per skill. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or crystallized. Cannot be granted additional functions

data.name: For PC Cafe - Durendal
data.description: Kamael exclusive weapon.\\nPC Cafe exclusive item containing the power of a Durendal. Can be enchanted by using the PC Cafe Exclusive Weapon Enhance Scroll. data.name: Extra Entrance Pass - Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss) (Event)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss). Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to the Hall of the Abyss exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant

data.name: Extra Entrance Pass - Near Kamaloka (Event)
data.description: Dimensional item\\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Near Kamaloka. Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to Near Kamaloka exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Dimensional Merchant

data.name: Sealed Knight's Cloak
data.description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. When the seal is cancelled, it'll have Dark Attribute Defense +30 effect. The seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams. It cannot be worn before the seal cancellation. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Knight's Cloak
data.description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. When an armor set above the Dynasty level is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open so that the cloak can be equipped. Enchantment, attribute, and smelting are impossible. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Knight's Cloak - Light Armor exclusive
data.description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30, and Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. When the entire Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. The cloak is exclusively for Bow Masters and Dagger Masters excluding Kamaels. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Knight's Cloak - Robe exclusive
data.description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30, and Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. When the entire Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. The cloak is exclusively for Healer, Enchanter, Summoner and Wizard excluding Kamaels. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Knight's Cloak - Kamael exclusive
data.description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30, and Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. When the entire Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. Kamael exclusive cloak. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Mark of Keucereus - Stage 1
data.description: Mark given to an adventurer who successfully completes Keucereus' order to break through to the Hall of Suffering. This mark is required for taking on higher level missions

data.name: Mark of Keucereus - Stage 2
data.description: Mark given to an adventurer who successfully completes Kucereus' order to conquer the Hall of Erosion. Mark given to prove heroic achievements at the Seed of Infinity

data.name: Olympiad Warrior's Ring
data.description: Olympiad Warrior's ring. Limited time item available for 60 days. Limited time item available forMP+ 21, increased Accuracy, increased Critical Damage, hold resistance increase by 30% and hold attack rate increase by 30%. Only one effect is applied even when two identical rings are worn. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Olympiad Warrior's Necklace
data.description: Olympiad Warrior's necklace. Limited time item available for 60 days. MP+ 42, Sleep/Paralysis/Shock Resistance increase by 15%. Sleep/Paralysis/Shock attack rate increase by 15%. Decreased skill reuse delay and damage shield effects. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Olympiad Warrior's Earring
data.description: Olympiad Warrior's earring. Limited-time item available for 60 days. It has effects of MP +31, shock/mind attack resistance +20%, Shock/Mental attack rate +20% and Vampiric Rage. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. When equipped with two identical earrings, the effect of only one earring will be applied

data.name: Olympiad Warrior's Weapon (undetermined)
data.description: (not determined)\0

data.name: Agathion Summon Bracelet - Knight
data.description: Summons an Agathion. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Gludio Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Gludio territory

data.name: Dion Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Dion territory

data.name: Giran Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Giran territory

data.name: Oren Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Oren territory

data.name: Aden Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Aden territory

data.name: Innadril Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Innadril territory

data.name: Goddard Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Goddard territory

data.name: Rune Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Rune territory

data.name: Schuttgart Territory Badge
data.description: Badge bearing the mark of Schuttgart territory

data.name: Ordinary Mercenary Certificate
data.description: Certificate showing your qualification as a mercenary

data.name: Elite Mercenary Certificate
data.description: Certificate showing your qualification as a mercenary

data.name: Top Elite Mercenary Certificate
data.description: Certificate showing your qualification as a mercenary

data.name: Artificial Regeneration Incubator
data.description: By putting catalyzer inside Seed of Infinity, the device creates artificial tissue to eliminate the monsters that attack the Seed of Life. Can be used only to defend the instant dungeon Hall of Erosion in the Seed of Infinity. Exclusively used by Dwarf Fighters, Artisans, Warsmiths, and Maestros. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Shadow Item - Shield of Yehan Miakesh
data.description: Shield type shadow item that bears the crest of last hero of Ancient Gracian Kingdom. The user of this item will have the powerful skill against some monsters inside Tumor of Death and Seed of Infinity. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or crystallized. Cannot be granted additional functions. Can be used only in the instant dungeons of the Seed of Infinity. Exclusively for Phoenix Knight, Hell Knight, Eva's Templar and Shillien Templar

data.name: Strong Alkaline Ointment
data.description: It's an ointment that's made of the ingredients easily found in daily life and almost completely blocks the skin oxidation. It lessens the effects of lethal de-buff skills inside the Hall of Erosion. Can be used only inside Hall of Erosion instant dungeons

data.name: Life Aid Bandage
data.description: A wondrous curative cloth that almost completely blocks the foreign contagion, which is the true nature of the Seed of Infinity, when you adhere it to your body. It increases Resistance to bleeding, poison, and Netherworld's Magyun induced special de-buff skills that the monsters use inside Seed of Infinity. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons

data.name: Scent of Preservation
data.description: An ancient Gracian scent used to keep a body from decaying. It stops severe bleeding up to the maximum effect 8 caused by the monsters inside Seed of Infinity. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons

data.name: Scent of Exorcism
data.description: An ancient Gracian scent used to cure people who are possessed by ghosts. It neutralizes the powerful poison up to the maximum effect 8 caused by the monsters inside Seed of Infinity. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons

data.name: Miracle Cure of Resuscitation
data.description: A wondrous drug that seems to have been used in ancient Gracian sacrificial rituals. It cancels the effect of bleeding and poison caused by the monsters inside Seed of Infinity up to the maximum effect 8 or Netherworld's Magyun induced special de-buff up to the maximum effect 4. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons

data.name: Structure Scarab
data.description: Amulet frequently used by ancient Gracian nobles. It gives the ability to resurrect and protection against death. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Jewel Ornamented Duel Supplies
data.description: Lavishly adorned with jewels, this box looks like contains items of exceeding value

data.name: Mother-of-Pearl Ornamented Duel Supplies
data.description: Covered in opaque multi-colored mother-of-pearl, just looking at this box fills you with expectation

data.name: Gold-Ornamented Duel Supplies
data.description: Covered in gold, this box looks like it would fetch a hefty sum in any market

data.name: Silver-Ornamented Duel Supplies
data.description: Covered in silver, this box shines like a mirror

data.name: Bronze-Ornamented Duel Supplies
data.description: This utilitarian box looks like it might contain some useful items

data.name: Non-Ornamented Duel Supplies
data.description: This plain box makes you curious to look inside

data.name: Weak-Looking Duel Supplies
data.description: This small box can't hold anything of value -- can it?\0

data.name: Sad-Looking Duel Supplies
data.description: This small, battered-looking box probably isn't worth your time

data.name: Poor-Looking Duel Supplies
data.description: This old, dust-covered box looks fairly worthless

data.name: Worthless Duel Supplies
data.description: This box looks like it's falling apart

data.name: Bond
data.description: Item can be useful in Handy's Block Checker matches. Used in the blocks

data.name: Land Mine
data.description: Item can be useful in Handy's Block Checker matches. Used in the blocks

data.name: Red Boing Hammer
data.description: Used during the block-flipping match, it is needed to attach the block to the floor

data.name: Blue Boing Hammer
data.description: Used during the block-flipping match, it is needed to attach the block to the floor

data.name: Small Red Boing Hammer
data.description: Used during the block-flipping match

data.name: Small Blue Boing Hammer
data.description: Used during the block-flipping match

data.name: Kratei's Cube Name Hiding Scroll
data.description: Used to hide your name in Kratei's Cube

data.name: Transformed Object: Handy's Block Checker Transformation Scroll Blue
data.description: Transformed Object: Block-Flipping Transformation Scroll\0

data.name: Transformed Object: Handy's Block Checker Transformation Scroll Red
data.description: Transformed Object: Block-Flipping Transformation Scroll\0

data.name: Freed Soul
data.description: Energy from ghosts that flow through the Seed of Infinity reside within this item. Can be used at Special Product Broker Kirklan

data.name: Tear of a Freed Soul
data.description: A container having a ghosts being flown out of the Seed of Infinity . Seed of Infinity attack/defend reward\0

data.name: Portion of a Soul
data.description: The ruin left when the ghosts have run out of their energy while being flown in the Seed of Infinity. Seed of Infinity collection additional reward\0

data.name: Treasure Sack of the Ancient Giants
data.description: Contains the treasure of the ancient Giants. Double-click to open it

data.name: Transformation Scroll: Frog
data.description: Frog transformation scroll that was given by Secret Agent Colin. Use the scroll to obtain the bead from the Frog King at Narsell Lake

data.name: Transformation Scroll: Young Child
data.description: Frog transformation scroll that was given by Secret Agent Colin. Use the scroll to obtain candy from Grandma Tess at Narsell Lake

data.name: Native's Hood
data.description: Equip this hood, obtained from Secret Agent Colin, to alter your appearance, speak with Native Kuta at Narsell Lake and obtain the Native's Gloves

data.name: Native's Tunic
data.description: Equip this tunic, obtained from Secret Agent Colin, to alter your appearance, speak with Native Kuta at Narsell Lake and obtain the Native's Gloves

data.name: Native's Trousers
data.description: Equip these trousers, obtained from Secret Agent Colin, to alter your appearance, speak with Native Kuta at Narsell Lake and obtain the Native's Gloves

data.name: Guards of the Dawn Helmet
data.description: Obtained from Secret Agent Colin, it allows you use the Guards' Transformation skill when equipped with the Guards of Dawn Tunic and Trousers. \0

data.name: Guards of the Dawn Tunic
data.description: Obtained from Secret Agent Colin, it allows you use the Guards' Transformation skill when equipped with the Guards of Dawn Helmet and Trousers. \0

data.name: Guards of the Dawn Trousers
data.description: Obtained from Secret Agent Colin, it allows you use the Guards' Transformation skill when equipped with the Guards of Dawn Tunic and Helmet. \0

data.name: Elmoreden Holy Water
data.description: Used by Elmoreden Emperor Shunaiman's guards, it can open the door engulfed in the Flame of Lilim inside the Necropolis

data.name: Court Magician's Magic Staff
data.description: This magic staff can open the door to the Disciple's Necropolis using its powerful removal skill

data.name: High Priest Orven's Letter
data.description: Letter detailing Gracia's imminent crisis. Deliver it to Commander Keucereus in the Gracia region

data.name: Keucereus' Introduction - Seed of Infinity
data.description: Introduction received from Keucereus. If you go northwest from Keucereus Alliance Base, you can reach the Seed of Infinity. Deliver this mark to Officer Tepios there

data.name: Keucereus' Introduction - Seed of Destruction
data.description: Introduction received from Keucereus. Deliver it to Sergeant Allenos, located at the Seed of Destruction west of Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Croop's Introduction
data.description: Introduction received from Croop. Deliver it to Guard Hector at the north entrance to Oren Castle and learn about the whereabouts of Contractor Jacob

data.name: Jacob's Necklace
data.description: Necklace discovered at contractor Jacob's body

data.name: Croop's Letter Requesting a Memorial Service
data.description: Deliver Croop's letter requesting a memorial service for Contractor Jacob to High Priest Hollint in Einhasad's Temple inside Oren Castle

data.name: Deadman's Herb
data.description: Deliver this herb, collected in Enchanted Valley, to Priest Cain near the Town of Oren

data.name: Priest Cain's Investigation Report
data.description: Deliver Priest Cain's report about the Seven Signs to Sir Gustav Athebaldt in the Town of Oren

data.name: Athebaldt's Introduction
data.description: Introduction received from Sir Athebaldt. Bring it to Secret Agent Colin in the Southern entrance of the town of Aden. \0

data.name: Native's Glove
data.description: A glove received from the Native Kuta. Bring it to the Secret Agent Colin of the town of Aden

data.name: Frog King's Bead
data.description: Bead obtained from the Frog King. Bring it to the Secret Agent Colin of the town of Aden

data.name: Grandma Tess' Candy Pouch
data.description: Candy pouch obtained from Grandma Tess. Bring it to the Secret Agent Colin of the town of Aden

data.name: Guards of the Dawn Identity Card
data.description: Identity card of the guards of the Dawn that was given by Lady Claudia. The qualification one needs to enter the Dawn Lord's temple

data.name: Emperor Shunaiman's Contract
data.description: Details a secret contract between Emperor Shunaiman and the Merchant of Mammon regarding the Seven Signs. Deliver it to High Priest Rayment in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Ancient Seal Stone of Mammon
data.description: This apparently sealed a promise the Merchant of Mammon made to the Elmoreden Emperor Shunaiman. It seems to be hiding a mysterious power

data.name: Grail of Einhasad
data.description: Proof that all Necropolis and Catacombs have been sealed. Deliver it to Emperor Shunaiman (Elmoreden Era)

data.name: Blood of the Emperor
data.description: A vial of Emperor Shunaiman's blood, which is the key to activate the Necropolis sealing device. Activate the device!\0

data.name: Iason's Introduction
data.description: This allows you meet Franz. Deliver it to High Priest Orven in the Town of Aden

data.name: Prayer: Emperor's Key
data.description: This prayer has been passed down from one high-ranking Priest of the Dawn to the next, stretching back to the Elmoreden Era

data.name: Mysterious Hand-written Text
data.description: This obscure text is hand-written in ancient ciphers

data.name: Tomlan Kamos' Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rohmer in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Ol Ariosh's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rohmer in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Gludio

data.name: Crimson Hatu Otis' Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Mirien in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion

data.name: Seer Flouros' Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Mirien in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Dion

data.name: Blade Otis' Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Minevia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Heine

data.name: Weird Bunei's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Minevia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Heine

data.name: Kaim Abigore's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rovia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Oren

data.name: Knight Montagnar's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Rovia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Oren

data.name: Venomous Storace's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Atraxia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Schuttgart

data.name: Kel Bilette's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Atraxia in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Schuttgart

data.name: White Allosce's Cellular Tissue
data.description: Deliver this tissue sample to Magister Kayan in the Temple of Einhasad in the Town of Rune

data.name: Dragonkin Charm
data.description: Energy from the Dragonkin that infest the Seed of Destruction. Can be used at Special Product Broker Kirklan

data.name: Tiat Two-Handed Weapon
data.description: Tiat's two-handed weapon

data.name: Draconic Peltast Weapon
data.description: Peltast's weapon

data.name: Star Stone Extraction Scroll
data.description: A supplemental scroll created for adventurers who are inexperienced in collecting Star Stones

data.name: Attribute Master Yin's Sword
data.description: Weapon provided by Attribute Master Yin for capturing the Reckless Sprites of Water. You can feel the powerful fire energy. The sprite's power contained in this weapon will be useful when capturing the reckless sprite. 10-minute-limited-time Item. Fire power +10. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Seal of Binding
data.description: Obtained after activating the sealing device, it proves that the sealing device was properly sealed. Deliver it to Emperor Shunaiman

data.name: Piece of Doubt
data.description: This piece of doubt seems to possess a wicked power

data.name: Headless Knight's Armor
data.description: Obtain this ionized set of armor after defeating the Headless Knight who terrorized the natives

data.name: Mandragora Root
data.description: The signature product of the Town of Dion

data.name: Bloody Axe Black Epaulette
data.description: Epaulette once worn by the Bloody Axe Aide

data.name: Nebulite Orb
data.description: Nebulite Orb requested by the Ivory Tower

data.name: Inspector Medibal's Document
data.description: Contains an account of Inspector Medibal's investigation of the Seed of Destruction. Deliver it to the wounded Guard Ell at Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Destroyed Darkness Fragment Powder
data.description: The destroyed darkness fragment powder, which bore out of the lifeforms of evil when they were destroyed. Collect them and take them to War Mage Artius at Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Destroyed Light Fragment Powder
data.description: Obtained by purging the destroyed Darkness Fragment Powder, deliver it to War Mage Artius

data.name: Sacred Light Fragment
data.description: Fragment piece that looks like it will break at any moment. A sacred light flows out from it. If you are prepared for it to break, the sacred power of this fragment piece may allow you to inflict damage on Witch Tiat of the Dragon of Darkness. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Rider's Mark
data.description: Obtained from Vulture Rider's and Elite Rider's. Deliver them to Dwarf Engineer Lekon at Keucereus Alliance Base as proof of your skill in flying

data.name: Lekon's Certificate
data.description: Issued by Dwarven Engineer Lekon. This certificate proves you have the ability to fly safely in Gracian airs

data.name: Extracted Coarse Red Star Stone
data.description: Coarse, Red Star Stone fragment. Higher quality Red Star Stone fragments can be extracted when you have more practice

data.name: Extracted Coarse Blue Star Stone
data.description: Coarse, Blue Star Stone fragment. Higher quality Blue Star Stone fragments can be extracted when you have more practice

data.name: Extracted Coarse Green Star Stone
data.description: Coarse, Green Star Stone fragment. Higher quality Green Star Stone fragments can be extracted when you have more practice

data.name: Reckless Soul Piece - Water
data.description: Materializes after the reckless Sprite of Water is destroyed. Take it to the Male Attribute Master

data.name: Reckless Soul Piece - Air
data.description: Materializes after the reckless Sprite of Air is destroyed. Take it to Attribute Master Yang

data.name: Freed Soul Fragment
data.description: Obtained through hunting in the Seed of Infinity. If you take them to Special Products Broker Kirklan you can exchange 5 of these items for a Freed Soul

data.name: Seal of Tiat
data.description: Obtained after defeating Tiat, it represents Tiat's authority and power. Take it to Special Products Broker Kirklan at Keucereus Alliance Base to exchange it for a special item

data.name: Dragonkin Charm Fragment
data.description: Obtained through hunting in the Seed of Destruction. If you take them to Special Products Broker Kirklan you can exchange 5 of these items for a Dragonkin Charm

data.name: Restless Soul
data.description: Obtained in the Seed of Infinity. Take these Restless Souls to Special Products Broker Kirklan to exchange them for a reward

data.name: Tiat Charm
data.description: Breath of Tiat fragment that can be harvested by collecting in the Seed of Destruction region. If you bring it to the special products broker Kutran at the Kucereus clan outpost, you can exchange it for a useful item

data.name: Yehan Klodekus' Badge
data.description: Badge of Yehan Klodekus, who degenerated into a Death Knight through M. Atk. of the Seed of Infinity

data.name: Yehan Klanikus' Badge
data.description: Badge of Yehan Klanikus, who degenerated into a Death Knight through M. Atk. of the Seed of Infinity

data.name: Lich Crystal
data.description: Crystal left behind after the death of Kohemenus, who degenerated into a Lich through M. Atk. of the Seed of Infinity

data.name: Vulture's Golden Feather
data.description: Take this large golden feather to Dwarven Engineer Lekon at Keucereus Alliance Base and receive a reward

data.name: Swallowed Skull
data.description: Swallowed by the Rok that roams the Seed of Destruction's dungeon or one of its Variant Falcon or Dra Hawk minions. Collect the remains of those who were sacrificed and take them to Soldier Orbyu at Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Swallowed Sternum
data.description: Swallowed by the Rok that roams the Seed of Destruction's dungeon or one of its Variant Falcon or Dra Hawk minions. Collect the remains of those who were sacrificed and take them to Soldier Orbyu at Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Swallowed Bones
data.description: Swallowed by the Rok that roams the Seed of Destruction's dungeon or one of its Variant Falcon or Dra Hawk minions. Collect the remains of those who were sacrificed and take them to Soldier Orbyu at Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Deadman's Remains
data.description: Obtained by hunting Floating Skulls and Floating Zombies. Take them to War Mage Artius

data.name: Banshee Queen's Eye
data.description: Proof that you have captured the Banshee Queen. Take it to War Mage Artius

data.name: Drake's Flesh
data.description: Obtained by hunting Variant Drake Wing minions. Collect them and take them to injured Soldier Tenius at Keucereus Alliance Base

data.name: Rotten Blood
data.description: Obtained from injured Soldier Tenius, this small vial contains spoiled blood that he claims contains the collected anger toward Keucereus. Its true origin is obscure

data.name: Bait for Drakes
data.description: Drake exclusive bait made by combining Drake flesh and a little bit of the rotten blood. If this Drake bait is used when Seed of Destruction is stabilized, one can call the Dead of Destruction, Dius

data.name: Variant Drake Wing Horns
data.description: Horn that sprouts out from the body of the Variant Drake. If you bring it to the injured soldier Tenis or soldier Plenos at Keucereus Alliance Base, you can receive a reward

data.name: Attribute Master Yang's Sword
data.description: Weapon provided by Attribute Master Yang for capturing the Reckless Sprites of Air. You can feel the powerful earth energy. The sprite's power contained in this weapon will be useful when capturing the reckless sprite. 10-minute-limited-time Item. Earth power +10. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Dynasty Dual Daggers
data.description: P. Atk. of Dual Daggers increase more than that of regular one-handed swords when enchanted. When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical by 109. Increases the damage inflicted during PvP. Can be equipped by Dagger Masters above level 81

data.name: Icarus Dual Daggers
data.description: P. Atk. of Dual Daggers increase more than that of regular one-handed swords when enchanted. When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical by 109. Increases the damage inflicted during PvP. Can be equipped by Dagger Masters above level 81

data.name: Vesper Dual Daggers
data.description: P. Atk. of Dual Daggers increase more than that of regular one-handed swords when enchanted. When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical by 109. Increases the damage inflicted during PvP. Can be equipped by Dagger Masters above level 81

data.name: Sealed Arcana Sigil
data.description: Sealed Arcana Sigil. Seal can be removed by the blacksmith of Mammon. \0

data.name: Sealed Dynasty Sigil
data.description: Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Seal can be removed by the blacksmith of Mammon. \0

data.name: Sealed Vesper Sigil
data.description: Sealed Vesper Sigil. Seal can be removed by the blacksmith of Mammon and Maestro Ishuma. \0

data.name: Holy Spirit's Cloak - Kamael exclusive
data.description: Cloak covered with energy of the Holy Spirit. Dark Attribute Defense +30. When the entire set of Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. Kamael exclusive cloak. Enchantment, attribute and augmenting are impossible

data.name: Holy Spirit's Cloak
data.description: Cloak covered with energy of the Holy Spirit. Resistance to Dark +30. When an armor set above the Dynasty level is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open so that the cloak can be equipped. Enchantment, attribute and smelting are impossible

data.name: Holy Spirit's Cloak - Light Armor exclusive
data.description: Cloak covered with energy of the Holy Spirit. Dark Attribute Defense +30. When the entire set of Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. The cloak is exclusively for Dagger Master and Bow Master excluding Kamaels. Enchantment, attribute and augmenting are impossible

data.name: Holy Spirit's Cloak - Robe exclusive
data.description: Cloak covered with energy of the Holy Spirit. Dark Attribute Defense +30. When the entire set of Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. The cloak is exclusively for Healer, Enchanter, Summoner and Wizard excluding Kamaels. Enchantment, attribute and augmenting are impossible

data.name: Sealed Holy Spirit's Cloak
data.description: Sealed Holy Spirit's Cloak. When the seal is cancelled, it'll have Dark Attribute Defense +30 effect. The seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams. It cannot be worn before the seal cancellation. Enchantment, attribute and augmenting are impossible

data.name: Icarus Sawsword {PvP}
data.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Focus, Health or Light. Increases damage inflicted during PvP, during an attack, cancels a target's enhanced status by more than 1 occasionally

data.name: Icarus Disperser {PvP}
data.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Focus, Evasion or Crit. Damage. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack

data.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Acumen, Mana Up or Conversion. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defense during an attack

data.name: Event - Gloomy Milk Cow Summon Scroll

data.name: Shadow Item - Refined Carnival Circlet
data.description: Refined Carnival Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Can use the fireworks skill after equipping. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Shadow Item - Refined Medieval Style Party Mask
data.description: Refined Medieval Style Party Mask. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Can use the skill Blessed Return after equipping. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Shadow Item - Refined Medieval Style Party Mask
data.description: Refined Medieval Style Party Mask. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Can use the head enlarging skill after equipping. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Shadow Item - Refined Medieval Style Party Mask
data.description: Refined Medieval Style Party Mask. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Can use the fireworks skill after equipping. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: For Events - Extra Entrance Pass - Rim Kamaloka
data.description: Entrance pass that lets you enter Near Kamaloka for a second time. Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to Rim Kamaloka exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

data.name: Special White Day Candy Basket
data.description: Candy basket for showing your heart on White Day. Contains 5 White Day candies. Can receive a bonus limited item (coronet, suit, Agathion - Juju) occasionally. Cannot be dropped or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop

data.name: White Day Candy Basket
data.description: Candy basket for showing your heart on White Day. Contains 1 White Day candies. Can receive a bonus limited item (Kat the Cat Hat, Agathion Seal Bracelet - Love) occasionally. Cannot be dropped or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop

data.name: White Day Solo Package
data.description: White Day gift box for solo players. Contains 1 solo escape petition. Can receive a bonus limited item (wild rose pig candy) occasionally. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop

data.name: White Day Candy
data.description: White Day candy filled with a loving heart. Energy is fully replenished upon use. Duration for reuse: 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop

data.name: Solo Escape Petition
data.description: Fragrant grass that wishes for a solo player's escape. Energy is maintained for 10 minutes upon use. Re-use time is 30 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Cannot be registered at a private shop

data.name: Kat the Cat Hat
data.description: Hat that looks like Kat the Cat. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Can be used for 14 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. No restore after deletion available for this item

data.name: Coronet
data.description: Formal bridal hair accessory. Exclusive female hair accessory that cannot be equipped by males. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. No restore after deletion available for this item

data.name: Suit
data.description: Tuxedo for males and wedding gown for females. When equipped, armor is cancelled and cannot be used. However, hair accessories, weapons, and magic armor are not cancelled. Can be used for 14 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. No restore after deletion available for this item

data.name: Wild Rose Pig Candy
data.description: Even if I'm lonely or sad, I won't cry~ Let's laugh and run through the lush field~. When equipped, can find oneself laughing and running. Can use the head enlarging skill after equipped, and Speed increases by 20. Can be used for 14 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. No restore after deletion available for this item

data.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Love
data.description: Can summon an Agathion of Love when equipped. Can be used for 14 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. No restore after deletion available for this item

data.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Juju
data.description: Can summon a Juju Agathion when equipped. Can be used for 14 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. No restore after deletion available for this item

data.name: Baguette's Herb
data.description: For 10 minutes, increases Max HP and increases some HP Regeneration. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Fresh Cream Herb
data.description: For 10 minutes, increases Max MP and HP. Increases P. Def., M. Def., Resistance to debuff., Atk. Spd., Casting Spd., and Speed. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Cheesecake Herb
data.description: For 10 minutes, increases Max MP and increases some MP Regeneration. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Baguette's Bread Sword
data.description: Sword made of bread. Contains Baguette's joy. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Dagger
data.description: Dagger made of bread. Contains Baguette's tears. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Two-handed Sword
data.description: Two-handed sword made of bread. Contains Baguette's passion. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Mace
data.description: Mace made of bread. Contains Baguette's pain. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Two-handed Hammer
data.description: Hammer made of bread. Can feel Baguette's melancholy. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Spear
data.description: Spear made of bread. Can feel Baguette's loneliness. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Bow
data.description: Bow made of bread. Can feel Baguette's vigorous energy. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Fist
data.description: Hand-to-hand combat weapon made of bread. Can feel Baguette's persevering disposition. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Magic Sword
data.description: Magic sword made of bread. Contains Baguette's madness. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Staff
data.description: Staff made of bread. Contains Baguette's wisdom. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Two-handed Staff
data.description: Two-handed staff made of bread. Contains Baguette's tears. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Shield
data.description: Shield made of bread. Can feel Baguette's sorrow. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Rapier
data.description: Rapier made of bread. Contains Baguette's sigh. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Ancient Sword
data.description: Ancient Sword made of bread. Can feel Baguette's regret. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Crossbow
data.description: Crossbow made of bread. Contains Baguette's anger. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Dualsword
data.description: Two-handed sword made of bread. Two-handed sword containing Baguett's great power. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Sigil
data.description: Sigil made of bread. Can feel Baguette's ease. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Baguette's Two-handed Dagger
data.description: Two-handed dagger made of bread. Can feel Baguette's sharpness. No exchange, drop, or sale available. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Afro Perm Wig - Black
data.description: Lush Afro perm hair. Cannot undo equip\0

data.name: Afro Perm Wig - Gold
data.description: Lush Afro perm hair. Cannot undo equip\0

data.name: Afro Perm Wig - Pink
data.description: Lush Afro perm hair. Cannot undo equip\0

data.name: Gludio Guard Earring
data.description: Ring given to the royal guard of Gludio territory. Stun Attack +15%, Bleed Defense +15%, Water Power Defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Dion Guard Earring
data.description: Ring given to the royal guard of Dion territory. Hold Attack +15%, Resistance to Poison +15%, Resistance to Holy +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Giran Guard Earring
data.description: Ring given to the royal guard of Giran territory. Bleed Attack +15%, Paralysis Defense +15%, Wind Power Defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Oren Guard Earring
data.description: Necklace given to the royal guard of Oren territory. Paralysis attack +15%, hold defense +15%, darkness defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Aden Guard Earring
data.description: Earring given to the royal guard of Aden territory. Mind Attack +15%, Stun Defense +15%, Earth Power Defense +10. CP +5% increase. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing two earrings with the same effect

data.name: Innadril Guard Earring
data.description: Earring given to the royal guard of Innadril territory. Sleep Attack +15%, Stun Defense +15%, Water Power Defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Goddard Guard Earring
data.description: Earring given to the royal guard of Goddard territory. Stun Attack +15%, Sleep Defense +15%, Fire Power Defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Rune Guard Earring
data.description: Earring given to the royal guard of Rune territory. Poison Attack +15%, Hold Defense +15%, Fire Power Defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Schuttgart Guard Earring
data.description: Necklace given to the royal guard of Schuttgart territory. Hold Attack +15%, Fear Defense +15%, Wind Power Defense +10. CP +5%. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Only one effect is applied when wearing the same two earrings

data.name: Blue Talisman - Buff Cancel
data.description: Cancels the buffs of nearby enemies upon use. Only one effect is applied when you wear the same two talismans. Shadow Item with no exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Blue Talisman - Buff Steal
data.description: Steals the target's abnormal status upon use. Only one effect is applied when you wear the same two talismans. Shadow Item with no exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Red Talisman - Territory Guard
data.description: When used, Max CP is greatly increased and a certain amount of CP is greatly recovered. Only one effect is applied when you wear the same two talismans. Shadow Item with no exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Blue Talisman - Lord's Divine Protection
data.description: Upon use, greatly decreases the damage received during PvP. Only one effect is applied when you wear the same two talismans. Shadow Item with no exchange/drop available\0

data.name: White Talisman - All Resistance
data.description: Increases Resistance to all elements. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped

data.name: Territory Health Recovery Potion
data.description: Recovers HP when in use. Restricted to characters higher than level 61 and lower than level 75. Can only be used on the battlefield during a Territory War

data.name: Territory Mana Recovery Potion
data.description: Recovers MP when in use. Restricted to characters higher than level 61 and lower than level 75. Can only be used on the battlefield during a Territory War

data.name: Territory CP Recovery Potion
data.description: Recovers CP when in use. Restricted to characters higher than level 61 and lower than level 75. Can only be used on the battlefield during a Territory War

data.name: Enriched Pet Food for Wolves
data.description: Pet food for Great Wolves and Fenrirs. When your pet's hunger gauge drops below 55% they will be able to feed themselves automatically

data.name: Guardian's Dragon Bugle
data.description: A bugle used to summon a Guardian's Strider. This pet uses some of the experience points earned by its master

data.name: Skull Key of Suffering
data.description: Key used to remove the time restriction on instance and allows you to enter the Hall of Suffering. Can only be used once a day outside the entrance to the Hall of Suffering. Cannot use multiple skull keys daily. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Skull Key of Erosion
data.description: Key used to remove the time restriction on instance and allows you to enter the Hall of Erosion. Can only be used once a day outside the entrance to the Hall of Erosion. Cannot use multiple skull keys daily. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Skull Key of the Heart
data.description: Key used to lift the entrance limit to the Hall of Suffering. Can only be used once a day outside the instance. After use, the effect disappears when the instance is reset. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Soul Extraction Device
data.description: Device that can be used on a recently killed monster in the Seed of Infinity to collect additional Tears of a Freed Soul. Can be used only inside Seed of Infinity instant dungeons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Deinonychus Mesozoic Stone
data.description: Stone used to summon a Deinonychus. This pet can consume Food For Wolves to replenish hunger. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns

data.name: Cave Exploration Text 1 Sheet
data.description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cave's origins\0

data.name: Cave Exploration Text 2 Sheet
data.description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cause of transformation of the ancient giants\0

data.name: Cave Exploration Text 3 Sheet
data.description: Report of explorers that contains information about the secret of Hekaton Prime\0

data.name: Growth Accelerator
data.description: Syringe containing Stakato secretion. When injected into a Bizarre Cocoon, this substance will stimulate the growth of a Cannibalistic Stakato Chief

data.name: Small Stakato Cocoon
data.description: Tightly wrapped item that resembles a cocoon. But it doesn't seem to contain a lifeform. Small size

data.name: Large Stakato Cocoon
data.description: Tightly wrapped item that resembles a cocoon. But it doesn't seem to contain a lifeform. Fairly heavy

data.name: Multi-colored Jewel
data.description: Lump of ore containing mysterious power. Upon use, you are teleported to the Stakato nest entrance. \0

data.name: Knowledge of the Giants Anthology, Chapter 1
data.description: Portion of the knowledge anthology from the Titans era. Chapter 1 of 5

data.description: Book containing a collection of wisdom from the Titans era. Chapter 1 of 5
