data.name: Protection Soul's Pendant
data.description: Amulet with protection from the evil spirits of the altar. Soul cores are purged above and driven into the pendant to make it shine with a red glow

data.name: Kahman's Supply Box
data.description: Supply box received from Mercenary Kahman as mission compensation. Double click to check more information

data.name: Droph's Support Items
data.description: Support items received from Dwarven Explorer Droph for defeating Hekaton Prime. Double click to check more information

data.name: Cave Exploration Text 1 Sheet
data.description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cave's origins\0

data.name: Cave Exploration Text 2 Sheet
data.description: Report of explorers that contains information about the cause of transformation of the ancient giants\0

data.name: Cave Exploration Text 3 Sheet
data.description: Report of explorers that contains information about the secret of Hekaton Prime\0

data.name: Recipe - Spiteful Soul Energy
data.description: Recipe for quests. Needed to make soul energy. Requires the Create Item skill level 2

data.name: Spiteful Soul Energy
data.description: Energy form soul received from the spiteful soul Leader. Collect and bring them to Balthazar

data.name: Spiteful Soul Vengeance
data.description: Vindictive spirit received from the spiteful soul Leader. Cannot be formed into energy and is pretty much useless

data.name: Shell of Monsters
data.description: Hard shell obtained by defeating the monsters near the cave of the giants. Take it to Magister Hanellin

data.name: Scout's Note
data.description: Note obtained from the scout's body. Deliver the note to Mercenary Captain Pierce

data.name: Stakato Queen's Fang
data.description: Fang obtained from defeating Stakato Queen Shyeed. Bring it to Mercenary Kahman

data.name: Box Containing the Flame of the Holy Spirit
data.description: Box protecting the flame of the Holy Spirit. Deliver it to Beacon Town Manager Torrant at the Den of Evil

data.name: Cursed Burial Items
data.description: Item that gives physical power to souls with deep grudges

data.name: Flauen's Letter
data.description: Letter from Gatekeeper Flauen of Heine. If you bring it to Iason Heine, you can hear more information about the mission

data.name: Letter to Helvetica
data.description: Certificate containing Iason Heine's promise of support. Bring it to Dr. Helvetica at the Field of Silence Research Center located in the Field of Silence

data.name: Letter to Athenia
data.description: Certificate containing Iason Heine's promise of support. Bring it to the Priestess Athenia of the Ritual Site of Purge located in the Field of Silence. \0

data.name: Certificate of Support
data.description: Certificate received from Dr. Helvetica of the Field of Silence Research Center. This certificate is necessary to receive an additional mission from him

data.name: Certificate of Support
data.description: This certificate shows your support for Priestess Athenia and her cause. This certificate is necessary to receive an additional mission from her

data.name: Damaged Torch Fragment
data.description: Broken piece left after the destruction of the Brazier of Purity built around the Ritual Site of Purge. Gather all and bring them to Dr. Helvetica in the Field of Silence Development Research Center. \0

data.name: Guardian Spirit Fragment
data.description: Broken piece of Guardian Spirit acquired from destroying the Magic Force Guardian Spirit and Evil Spirit in the Magic Force near the Ritual Site of Purge. Gather all and bring them to Dr. Helvetica in the Field of Silence Development Research Center. \0

data.name: Destroyed machine piece
data.description: This is a part you salvaged from one of the Landfill Machines you destroyed. Once you have collected 10 pieces, return to Athenia

data.name: Enchanted Golem Shard
data.description: Fragment obtained from the destruction of the Suppressors and Exterminators belonging to Dr. Helvetica. Collect 20 fragments, then return to Athenia in the Field of Whispers

data.name: Mucrokian Hide
data.description: This hide was obtained by killing a Mucrokian. When you are ready, return to Katensa to trade your hides for a reward

data.name: Awakened Mucrokian Hide
data.description: Proof of defeating an Awakened Mucrokian. Gather and bring them to Katensa of the Field of Silence Research Center

data.name: Mucrokian Hide
data.description: This hide was obtained by killing a Mucrokian. When you are ready, return to Priestess Athenia to trade your hides for a reward

data.name: Fallen Mucrokian Hide
data.description: This hide was obtained by defeating a Contaminated Mucrokian. When you are ready, return to Priestess Athenia to trade these hides for a reward

data.name: Mineral Fragment
data.description: Mineral fragment obtained as proof of defeating the enemies in the Mithril Mines. Collect and bring them to representative Filaur of the Grey Column guild at the Dwarven Village Chief Hall

data.name: Evidence of Migration
data.description: Proof received from the Red Man Robbers that you have succeeded in convincing them. Collect and bring them to Grave Robber Leader Kanemika

data.name: Replenished Power Bead
data.description: Bead needed to replenish the energy of power in Lucien's altar. Take it to each of Lucien's altars and enhance the energy of power

data.name: Discharged Power Bead
data.description: Discharged power bead that has replenished Lucien's altar as a replenished power bead. Also proof that replenishment is complete. When all replenishments are complete, take this bead as proof of the mission's completion to the Priest of the Earth Daichir in Maphr's Temple in the Dwarven Village

data.name: Stakato Fang
data.description: Fangs obtained from Stakato carcasses. Once you have 25, take them to Bounty Hunter Kintaijin

data.name: Dirty Bead
data.description: Part of an artifact stolen by Billy Haari, these beads are obtained by defeating monsters inside the Stakato's Nest. Once you have 500, return to Kintaijin to receive your reward

data.name: Soul Core Containing Evil Spirit
data.description: Monster's soul core containing an evil spirit. Small jewel with evil energy appearing in dark purple

data.name: Ragna Orc's Amulet
data.description: Doll used in shamanism to control the evil creatures by the Ragna Orcs. Collect and bring them to Beacon Town Manager Torrant at the Den of Evil

data.name: Hisilrome's Heart
data.description: Heart obtained after defeating Shilen's Priest Hisilrome

Spd. by about 7% and damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted to 4 or more, during a critical attack, party members including yourself will receive at a fixed rate increased attack power, magic power, and healing capacity, as well as decreased MP consumption per skill. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or crystallized. Cannot be granted additional functions. \0

data.name: Event - Herdsman's Love Scroll
data.description: July 7th event. Enchant scroll exclusively for the Weaver's Multi-colored Clothes. Increases the P. Def. and Magic M. Def. of the Weaver's Multi-colored Clothes. Can be safely enchanted to +3, and the item disappears when the enchant fails. When the Weaver's Multi-colored Clothes is enchanted above +4, attributes, STR, CON, INT, and MEN also increase according to the enhancement value. Can only be used during the July 7th event period, and it is deleted in bulk once the event ends

data.name: Event - Vitality Belt Enchant Scroll
data.description: Enchant scroll exclusively for the Vitality Belt. Increases the Vitality Belt's P. Def. and Magic M. Def. Vitality maintenance effect. Vitality maintenance re-use time reduced. Can be safely enchanted to +3, and the item disappears when the enchant fails. When the Vitality Belt is enchanted above +4, vitality maintenance duration increases, and the decreases vitality maintenance re-use time. Can only be used during the Vitality Belt event period, and it s deleted in bulk once the event ends

data.name: Event - Uldie Summon Scroll
data.description: When used, summons the oldest girl Uldie among the Three Siblings, and can play Jack's game. You cannot summon Uldie if a pet is summoned or if the Halloween mask isn't equipped. You cannot play Jack's game is you are currently transformed or your stance is in a switched state!\0

data.name: Beast Handler's Whip
data.description: Obtained from Tunatun on the Beast Farm, this whip will enable the bearer to control tamed pets. Must be equipped to use

data.name: Golden Spice
data.description: Feed used to tame baby animals on the Beast Farm. Using this feed will allow the monster to drop adena and/or items, but will give less experience

data.name: Crystal Spice
data.description: Feed used to tame baby animals on the Beast Farm. This feed will cause the monster to give more experience, but no adena or items

data.name: Blessed Golden Spice
data.description: A better quality feed that has a chance to tame animals on the Beast Farm with just one application

data.name: Blessed Crystal Spice
data.description: A better quality feed that has a chance to tame animals on the Beast Farm with just one application

data.name: Golden Spice (S-Grade)
data.description: A better quality feed that has a chance to turn Beast Farm babies into fully grown pets with just one application. Using this feed will allow the monster to drop adena and/or items, but will give less experience

data.name: Crystal Spice (S-Grade)
data.description: A better quality feed that has a chance to turn Beast Farm babies into fully grown pets with just one application. This feed causes the monster to give more experience, but no adena or items

data.name: Spirit Stone Fragment

data.name: Maguen Plasma Collector
data.description: This device is used to collect plasma from the Wild Maguen that inhabit the Seed of Annihilation. Under the right circumstances, plasma collection allows you to obtain a pet Maguen

data.name: Maguen Pet Collar
data.description: Necklace that summons a Maguen. The summoned Maguen can eat wolf-type feed, and it takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. No exchange, drop, sale, or mail available

data.name: Elite Maguen Pet Collar
data.description: Necklace that summons an Elite Maguen. The summoned Maguen can eat wolf-type feed, and it takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. No exchange, drop, sale, or mail available

data.description: Document from Investigator Johnny in the Plains of the Lizardmen that verifies you possess the required skills. It indicates that you have the right to go and see Tanta Lizardman Seer Ugoros. Show it to Gatekeeper Batracos near the Plains of the Lizardmen

data.name: High-Grade Lizard Scale
data.description: The highest-quality Lizardman Scale without any blemishes obtained after defeating Tanta Lizardmen Seer Ugoros. Take it to Researcher Ankumi on the Plains of the Lizardmen

data.name: Middle-Grade Lizard Scale
data.description: The medium-quality Lizardman Scale obtained after defeating Tanta Lizardmen Seer Ugoros. Take it to Researcher Ankumi on the Plains of the Lizardmen

data.name: Vial of Tanta Blood
data.description: Vial containing the blood of Tanta Lizardmen. Take it to Investigator Laki on the Plains of the Lizardmen

data.name: Sel Mahum Diary
data.description: Diary containing the daily life of the Sel Mahum. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village

data.name: Sel Mahum Cookbook Page
data.description: Part of the cookbook used by the Sel Mahum Chef. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village

data.name: Sel Mahum Cookbook
data.description: Cookbook used by the Sel Mahum Chef. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village

data.name: Shiny Salmon
data.description: Shiny and tantalizing salmon. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village

data.name: Gray Salmon
data.description: Not so shiny but still OK-looking salmon. If you take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village, he'll take care of everything else, right?\0

data.name: Sickly Salmon
data.description: Scales are falling off and it doesn't look good at all. If you take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village, he'll take care of everything else, right?\0

data.name: Salmon Lure
data.description: Lure used to catch salmon. You cannot catch salmon without it

data.name: Foul Fruit
data.description: Horrible tasting fruit. If you put it in the salmon porridge, which is cooking on the fire at the Sel Mahum Training Grounds, you could ruin the dish

data.name: Sel Mahum Training Diary
data.description: Dairy containing detailed examples of the Sel Mahum training. Take it back to Guard Pinaps of Oren Village

data.name: Sel Mahum Training Timetable
data.description: Paper containing the training schedule of the Sel Mahum. Take it back to Guard Pinaps of Oren Village

data.name: Golem Corps Log
data.description: Paper containing some logs for recognizing Golem Corps. Collect all needed logs

data.name: Golem Corps Collection
data.description: Bundle of papers containing all the logs for recognizing Golem Corps. Take it back to Collector Gutenhagen at Pavel Ruins

data.name: Seed of Annihilation Orders
data.description: Kucereus' Clan Outpost Commander Kbaldir's written orders. Go to the pier of the Seed of Annihilation and deliver it to his subordinate, Officer Klemis. \0

data.name: Gracian Soldier Tag
data.description: ID Tag of a Gracian soldier who was killed near the Seed of Annihilation. Let's take it to Officer Jakan who is stationed at the pier near the Seed of Annihilation

data.name: Cold Resistance Potion
data.description: A potion especially crafted from the Jinia Guild to protect the body from the cursed cold powers of the Ice Queen. Needed to rescue Kegor, who has fallen into trouble

data.name: Seal Breaker - 5th Floor
data.description: Seal Breaker needed to speak face to face with the Demon Prince on the 5th floor of the Tower of Infinitum in the Steel Citadel. It is destroyed after one use

data.name: Seal Breaker - 10th Floor
data.description: Seal Breaker needed to speak face to face with Ranku on the 10th floor of the Tower of Infinitum in the Steel Citadel. It is destroyed after one use

data.name: Seal Components Part 1
data.description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Guard in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it

data.name: Seal Components Part 2
data.description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Gazer in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it

data.name: Seal Components Part 3
data.description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Priest in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it

data.name: Seal Components Part 4
data.description: A Seal Breaker component. Acquired after defeating the Space Ruler in the Tower of Infinitum. You can make a Seal Breaker that negates great power by putting this piece together with others like it

data.name: Broken Golem Shard
data.description: Fragment obtained by hunting golems

data.name: Shabby Necklace
data.description: Shabby necklace that Watcher of Antharas Theodric supposedly gives only to those who are worthy of going after the Earth Dragon Antharas. He says the necklace will transform after you defeat Antharas

data.name: Miracle Necklace
data.description: After you defeated the Earth dragon Antharas, the shabby necklace that you received from Watcher of Antharas Theodric changed into this item. Take this necklace to him

data.name: Poor Necklace
data.description: Watcher of Valakas Klein gave you this necklace. It is of poor quality and not worth much. However, it is said to transform into something worth much more after killing Valakas

data.name: Valor Necklace
data.description: After killing Valakas the Poor Necklace has transformed into this necklace. Take this necklace to Watcher of Valakas Klein

data.name: Tattered Monk Clothes
data.description: Tattered clothes are the remains of the monks you battled in the Monastery of Silence. The clothes are nothing more than rags after their years of use. Let's take them to Greymore in the Monastery of Silence

data.name: Mark of Splendor
data.description: Proof that you successfully defeated the Master of Splendor Anays at Priest Greymore's request. If you take it to Greymore, you will receive a reward

data.name: Mark of Darkness
data.description: You succeeded in defeating the Master of Splendor Anays at Priest Greymore's request. But you received the Mark of Darkness rather than the Mark of Splendor. If you take this to Greymore, he will laugh at you

data.name: Priest Dominic's Letter
data.description: A secret letter sent by Priest Dominic of the Rune Village temple to Greymore. Deliver it to Priest Greymore in the Monastery of Silence

data.name: Monk Scripture
data.description: Sacred text obtained after defeating the monks in the Monastery of Silence. Bring it to Greymore in the Monastery of Silence

data.name: Sel Mahum Mane
data.description: Mane obtained by defeating the Sel Mahums that were attacking the animals the Beast Farm. Collect them and bring them to Tunatun in the Beast Farm

data.name: Veal
data.description: Meat from a young animal. Smells good but tastes bad. Take it to Beast Herder Tunatun at the Beast Farm

data.name: Innocence Jewel
data.description: A white gem produce by animals. Looking at it reminds you of a time long ago. I wonder what my old friends are doing now?0

data.name: Prime Meat
data.description: Top quality meat obtained from an adult animal. Only one piece comes out per animal. Collect these and take them to Beast Herder Tunatun

data.name: Concentrated Spirit Energy
data.description: Obtained in the Seed of Annihilation. Take this Concentrated Spirit Energy to Special Products Broker Kirklan to exchange them for a reward

data.name: Spirit Stone Dust
data.description: Obtained through hunting in the Seed of Annihilation. If you take them to Special Products Broker Kirklan you can exchange 5 of these items for a Spirit Stone Fragment

data.name: Strongbox of Promise
data.description: Small safe obtained by defeating the monks in the Monastery of Silence. You can find out about the quest by clicking on it. Quest start item

data.name: Book of Silence
data.description: Ancient book contained inside the Strongbox of Promise. Before you can return it to its owner, you must figure out who it belongs to. Go to Library of Sages Director Sophia in the Rune Castle Library and ask for help

data.name: Book of Silence
data.description: You heard about the book's owner from the Library of Sages Director Sophia. Return the book to its owner

data.name: Unlit Torchlight
data.description: Torch that doesn't light. Item needed to obtain the treasure chest in the secret room inside the Monastery of Silence

data.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 17
data.description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 17. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters

data.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 17
data.description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 17. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters

data.name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 17
data.description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 17. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters

data.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Eternal Core Sword Conversion\\nHealth, Focus, or Haste can be bestowed.\\nWhen enchanted to 4 or more, there is a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk. and the amount of recieved heal, and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack

data.name: War Veteran Voucher
data.description: Document showing military service in the Seed of Annihilation region. Collect plenty of these and take them back to Soldier Ilvenis at the pier in the Seed of Annihilation to exchange for a reward

data.name: Full Barrel of Soup
data.description: Food container of the Sel Mahums. Contains a lot of porridge. Take it back to Guard Stan of Oren Village

data.name: Empty Soup Barrel

data.name: Sel Mahum ID Tag
data.description: ID Tag of a Sel Mahum who is training at the Sel Mahum Training Grounds. Take it back to Guard Pinaps of Oren Village

data.name: Damaged Book
data.description: Ancient text that is too damaged to determine its contents. It served its purpose as a book. Sell it at the shop and get at least a little money

data.name: Packaged Book
data.description: Item received after saving a Treasure Hunter. It's tightly wrapped so you can't see what book is inside. Double click for more information

data.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 18
data.description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 18. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. MP 26 is consumed each time of use. This level crystal is said to absorb crystals on its own, so it doesn't seem like you need to use it directly on the monsters

Can be equipped by Dagger Masters above level 81

data.name: Event - Scroll of Summon Baby White Tiger
data.description: Scroll that summons a baby White Tiger. If you relieve the Baby White Tiger's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible

data.name: Event - Scroll of Summon Gloomy Baby White Tiger
data.description: Scroll that summons a Gloomy Baby White Tiger. Can sometimes transform into a White Tiger while trying to recover the Baby White Tiger. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible

data.name: Event - Scroll of Summon Baby White Tiger Captain
data.description: Scroll that summons a baby White Tiger Captain. If you relieve the Baby White Tiger Captain's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible

data.name: Event - Scroll of Summon Gloomy Baby White Tiger Captain
data.description: Scroll that summons a Gloomy Baby White Tiger Captain. Can sometimes transform into a White Tiger Captain while trying to recover the Baby White Tiger. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.) Exchange possible

data.name: Event - Save the White Tiger Event Pack
data.description: An event pack that can be obtained 1 time per account every 12 hours. By double clicking, you can obtain the Baby White Tiger Summon Scroll and "Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion" that are needed for the event. No exchange available

data.name: Event - Cupid's Fatigue Relief Potion
data.description: Decreases fatigue when used on a White Tiger

data.name: Event - Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Relief Potion
data.description: Decreases fatigue when used on a White Tiger. It has a better effect than Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion

data.name: Freesia Bouquet (Event)
data.description: A bouquet of freesias which implies innocent naivety. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: Baby Breath Bouquet (Event)
data.description: A bouquet of gypsophila which implies sorrow. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: Pink Lady (Event)
data.description: A cocktail dedicated to the heroine of the play <Pink Lady> in a celebration of its success, which was first performed on the stage in London in 1912. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: June Bug (Event)
data.description: A cocktail with fresh color of summer green and sweet fragrance, which reminds of bugs flying from flower to flower following the scent in the month of June. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: Soft Cheesecake (Event)
data.description: A gourmet cheesecake that is soft like a souffle and delightfully sweet. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: Freshly-Baked Baguette (Event)
data.description: A freshly-baked baguette that is soft and delicious unlike its tough look. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: Sweet Cream Bun (Event)
data.description: A cream bun that features sweet and soft custard cream made of egg yolk, instead of normal butter cream or whipped cream. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple. Can also be used on Event Manager Freya in town

data.name: White Day Candy (Event)
data.description: A cute looking candy perfect for a gift. If used against a chaotic character or a character whose name is purple, your name will turn purple

data.name: Freya's Gift
data.description: Gift box containing Freya's heart

data.description: Scroll that changes your appearance into that of Zaken for 30 minutes. Cannot be traded, dropped, or stored in a private store. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: National Representative Warrior's Ring
data.description: National Representative Warrior's Ring. Limited time item available for 3 days. MP+ 21; Resistance to Hold +30%; a chance of Hold attack +30%; increases Accuracy and Critical Damage. Only one effect is applied even when two identical rings are worn. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: National Representative Warrior's Necklace
data.description: National Representative Warrior's Necklace. Limited time item available for 3 days. MP+ 42, Sleep/Paralysis/Shock Resistance increase by 15%. Sleep/Paralysis/Shock attack rate increase by 15%. Decreased skill reuse delay and damage shield effects. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: National Representative Warrior's Earring
data.description: National Representative Warrior's Earring. Limited-time item that can be worn for 3 days. It has effects of MP +31, shock/mind attack resistance +20%, Shock/Mental attack rate +20% and Vampiric Rage. data.name: Solina's Biography
data.description: A biography containing the life story of Solin a saintess of the Elmore-Aden kingdom. This text has been banned throughout the kingdom and is incredibly difficult to find and intact copy. Double click for more information

data.name: Kaerun's Memoir
data.description: A complete copy of Kaerun's Memoir. It is a detailed look at Solina's life written by Kaerun from his perspective. This book was never circulated but it's original print has been archived inside the monastery. Double click for more information

data.name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 1
data.description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information

data.name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 2
data.description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information

data.name: Olympiad Match 3 Participation Certificate
data.description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 3. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive the minimum reward

data.name: Olympiad Match 5 Participation Certificate
data.description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 5. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive an incomplete reward

data.name: Olympiad Match 10 Participation Certificate
data.description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 10. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive a whole reward

data.name: Olympiad Team Event Certificate
data.description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad team event 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the class-free and class battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward

data.name: Olympiad Class-Free Battle Certificate
data.description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad class-free battle 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the team event and class battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward

data.name: Olympiad Class Battle Certificate
data.description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad class battle 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the team event and class-free battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward

data.name: Olympiad 2 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
data.description: Document needed to confirm 2 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this confirmation to the Olympiad Operator to receive the minimum reward

data.name: Olympiad 5 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
data.description: Document needed to confirm 5 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive an incomplete reward

data.name: Olympiad 10 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
data.description: Document needed to confirm 10 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive a whole reward

data.name: Party Vitality Herb
data.description: Herb that brings Vitality to stage 4 for 10 minutes upon use. Effect works for all party members

data.name: Box of Theodric

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 8 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 2 for all D-grade weapons with the exception of bow, which will increase by 4. M. Atk. increases by 2 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

Atk. increases by 6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 10 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

data.name: Certificate of Dawn
data.description: A certificate received from the Witness of Dawn Franz. It says that if you show this certificate to Priest Wood, he will exchange it for an occupation specific Forgotten Scroll that can be learned at level 81

data.name: Will of Antharas
data.description: A command stone made by Antharas embedded in his high commanding minions so he will always have control over them. Used to create Antharas Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul

data.name: Sealed Blood Crystal
data.description: Small crystal particles made from the blood of Antharas. After his blood was spilt, the land absorbed the blood and acted as a filter that separated the poison from the blood creating a pure form of his blood that crystallized over time. Used to create an Atharas's Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul

data.name: Antharas Blood Crystal
data.description: Using the power held within the blood of Antharas, this crystal can revive and fully restore EXP of all dead characters in the Command Channel. Can only be used while inside the Lair of Antharas. Reuse time is 1 hour

data.name: Beast Soulshot
data.description: The light of Sprites is enclosed in pet/summoner; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. The Soulshot consumption can be verified in pet/summoner information window. (Used from the owner's inventory.)\0

data.name: Beast Spiritshot
data.description: The light of Sprites is enclosed in pet/summoner, so it instantly increases the magic power of pet/summoner. It is very light. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. The Spiritshot consumption can be verified in pet/summoner information window. (Used from the owner's inventory.)\0

data.name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
data.description: The light of high-level Sprites is enclosed in pet/summoner, so it instantly increases the magic power of pet/summoner. It is very light. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. The Blessed Spiritshot consumption can be verified in pet/summoner information window. (Used from the owner's inventory.)\0

data.name: Rune of Experience Points 30%
data.description: An ancient charm endowed with mysterious symbols. When held in your inventory, increases acquired Experience Points by 30%. The timer decreases even during log-off state. Only one XP Rune can be applied at any given time regardless of additional XP Runes in ones inventory. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
data.description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
data.description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
data.description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot use weapons enchanted by above 16. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Ancient Armor Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
data.description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot use armors enchanted by above 16. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Divine Weapon Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
data.description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \\nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Divine Armor Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
data.description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \\nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

Recovers as HP 9% of the standard short-range physical damage inflicted on the enemy. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Mysterious Scroll - Prophecy of Wind
data.description: Dimensional item\\nFor 60 minutes, receives help from a great spirit to increase Max HP by 20%, rate of critical attack by 20%, power of Prominent Damage through magic damage by 20%, P. Atk. by 10%, P. Def. by 20%, Atk. Spd. by 20%, M. Atk. by 20%, M. Def. by 20%, Casting Spd. by 20%, and Resistance to de-buff by 10%. Decreases moving speed by 20%. Bestows the ability to recover as HP 5% of the standard short-range physical damage inflicted on the enemy. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Dimensional Merchant. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Neolithic Crystal - S84
data.description: If you bring it to the Dimensional Merchant, you can exchange an ordinary S84 Grade item for a Masterwork Item

data.name: Olf's T-shirt
data.description: Dimensional item\\nOlf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll. Can enhance up to +10 using a Blessed Olf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Olf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll
data.description: Enchant scroll exclusive to Olf's T-shirt.\\nIncreases the T-shirt's P. Def. and M. Def. by 1. Starting from +4, increases P. Def. by 3. Can safely enchant to +3 and up to a max +10. From +4, "basic abilities (CON, MEN, STR, INT, DEX, WIT)" are raised in stages. Addtional options are added at +5, +7, +8 and +9. Cannot be dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blessed Olf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll
data.description: Dimensional item\\nEnchant scroll exclusive to Olf's T-shirt.\\nIncreases the T-shirt's P. Def. and M. Def. by 1. Starting from +4, increases P. Def. by 3. Can safely enchant to +3 and up to a max +10. From +4, "basic abilities (CON, MEN, STR, INT, DEX, WIT)" are raised in stages. Additional options are added at +5, +7, +8 and +9. If the enchant fails, the existing enchant value becomes 0. Cannot be dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: 7th Anniversary Cloak - Pitch Black
data.description: Dimensional Item\\nLineage II 7th Anniversary commemorative item.\\nWhen an armor set above the Dynasty level is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open so that the cloak can be equipped. Enchanting, attribute enhancing, or augmenting are not possible. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or destroyed

data.name: Ziggo's Jewel
data.description: Shiny jewel obtained through the Wondrous Cubic. It looks like you would get quite a large sum by selling it at a shop

data.name: Birthday Hat
data.description: It's your birthday! Hair accessory that shows you are 1 year older. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Birthday Cake
data.description: Sweet and tasty birthday cake that you can share with others. This special cake casts a Vitality maintenance buff on all party members for 5 minutes - meaning that you will not lose Vitality while this buff is active. Your cake will disappear after 20 minutes. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped, but can be stored in your private warehouse

data.name: Vitality Replenishing Beverage
data.description: When used, replenishes energy to 100%. Reuse time is 60 minutes. Cannot be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Santa Claus's Blessing
data.description: When used, HP Recovery Bonus, Max MP, and Critical Atk. Rate +20%, and you can feel the effects of Prophecy of Water, Might, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Shield, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration for 1 hour. Cannot be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blessed Earring of Zaken
data.description: MP+37, Resistance to Bleed +30%, Bleed attack rate +30%, heal amount +15%, vampiric rage effect, Resistance to Shock/Mental attacks +30%, Shock/Mental attack rate +30%, and Resistance to Dark +15. Only one effect is applied even when the same two earrings are worn. If it is equipped together with a standard Earring of Zaken, only the effect of Blessed Earring of Zaken will be applied

data.name: Sealed Cloak of Zaken
data.description: When the seal is released, P. Def. and attribute resistance increase, and special skills can be used. It can be equipped only after releasing the seal through the weavers Olf Kanore in Aden or Olf Adams in Rune. Enchantment, attribute, and refining are impossible. Can be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Sealed Cloak of Freya
data.description: When the seal is released, P. Def. and attribute resistance increase, and special skills can be used. data.name: Cloak of Freya

data.name: Maestro's Key
data.description: Can open Treasure Chests between level 21-85 with 100% chance. When a character below level 77 uses it on a treasure chest that is more than 6 levels above, or when a character above level 78 uses it on a treasure chest that is more than 5 levels above, the key disappears but the reward cannot be obtained

data.name: Beginner Adventurer's Treasure Sack
data.description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of beginner adventurers. Open it to obtain one random C or D-Grade Weapon

data.name: Experienced Adventurer's Treasure Sack
data.description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of experienced adventurers. Open it to obtain one random B, A or S-Grade Weapon (Dynasty excluded)

data.name: Great Adventurer's Treasure Sack
data.description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of great adventurers. Open it to obtain one random Dynasty, Icarus or Vesper Weapon

data.name: Blue Elmore Coin
data.description: Token received by adventurers for their service to the Elmore king. If you bring it to Captain Mathias in Rune, you will receive a reward. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Rune Jewelry Box - Crystal
data.description: Jewelry box containing the precious treasure of Rune. When used, you can obtain 15 Crystals of Life with a certain rate of chance

data.name: Rune Jewelry Box - Talisman
data.description: Jewelry box containing the precious treasure of Rune. When used, you can obtain a Talisman with a certain rate of chance

data.name: Pablo's Box
data.description: Box containing the precious treasure of Elmore's renowned scholar Pablo. When used, you can obtain a hat with a certain rate of chance

data.name: Server Ziggi's Magic Pencil
data.description: Magic pencil with a sharp tip. Item that can be used only on the server Ziggi. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Manor Scholar's Hat
data.description: Scholar's hat showing knowledge. A gold tassle is attached. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Rank 1 Scholar's Hat
data.description: Scholar's hat showing knowledge. A silver tassle is attached. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Rank 2 Scholar's Hat
data.description: Scholar's hat showing knowledge. A red tassle is attached. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Rank 3 Scholar's Hat
data.description: Scholar's hat showing knowledge. A blue tassle is attached. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Hero's Gold Chest
data.description: Hero's Gold Chest\\nGift box containing 1 each of a Hero's Treasure Box, Dimensional Support Pack, Potion Support Pack, and Supplies Support Pack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Dimensional Support Pack
data.description: Dimensional support pack\\nGift box containing 2 high quality hunting helper exchange coupon, 3 feathers of blessing, 5 Kamaloka (Near Kamalok Hall of the Abyss, Labyrinth of the Abyss) entrance passes, and 3 Vitality Replenishing Beverages. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Potion Support Pack
data.description: Potion support pack\\nGift box containing 20 highest power temporary healing potion, 50 greater healing potions, 5 fresh milks, and 5 energy of sprouts. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Supplies Support Pack
data.description: Supplies support pack\\nGift box containing 200,000 mysterious soulshots and spirits according to grade. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Energy - 1 hour
data.description: When used, for 1 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Energy Pack
data.description: PC cafe energy pack\\nGift box containing 3 PC cafe energies. When used, duration can receive a 1~4 hour PC Cafe Energy with a certain rate of chance. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Blessing
data.description: When used, for 20 minute(s), energy is replenished for party members, including the user, when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Blessing Pack
data.description: PC cafe blessing pack\\nGift box containing 1 PC cafe blessing. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Energy - 2 hour
data.description: When used, for 2 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Energy - 3 hour
data.description: When used, for 3 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: PC Cafe Energy - 4 hour
data.description: When used, for 4 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Joy of Halloween

data.name: Hero's Gold Chest Pack
data.description: Hero's Gold Chest Pack\\nA gift box that contains a Hero's Gold Chest. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Agathion Seal Bracelet - Neolithica
data.description: A bracelet that can summon a Neolithic Agathion. Requires room in inventory and weight limit to receive a New Year gift from a Neolithic Agathion. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. \0

data.name: Hero Assistance Package
data.description: A coupon for an item set that helps a hero to grow stronger. Bestows an Equipment Set 7-Day Pak, a Button-Eyed Bear Doll Agathion 7-Day Pack, a Quick Healing Potion, and a Steam Beatle Mount Bracelet 7-Day Pack. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse. \0

data.name: Fresh Herb
data.description: Herb that Rudolph likes. When the seal on Rudolph is removed, Rudolph automatically eats for 10 minutes

data.name: Santa Claus's Treasure Box
data.description: Santa Claus's treasure box. When used, you can receive Santa Claus's gift

data.name: Medal of Glory
data.description: Item for obtaining Fame. If you bring it to the Olympiad Manager, you can exchange it for 100 Fame points

data.name: Campfire Flint
data.description: You can use this item if you have gathered 30 tree branches to start a campfire. A campfire near a battlefield can help to raise HP, MP, and CP recovery rate. You can only make campfires when you are away from towns. You can only receive the recovery bonus while near the campfire. \\nCannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Pa'agrio's Christmas Package
data.description: Dimensional item\\nGift box containing 1 each of Pa'agrio's Warm Breeze - 4 hour pack, Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour pack, party cake, and shiny party hat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Dimensional Merchant. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Scroll: Valakas Call

data.name: Jewel of Antharas

data.name: Totem of Body
data.description: Summons a totem that increases HP recovery speed by 30% and decreases damage from the topography by 80%. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes

data.name: Totem of Spirit
data.description: Summons a totem that increases MP recovery speed by 15%. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes

data.name: Totem of Courage
data.description: Summons a totem that increases P. Def. by 30%. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes

data.name: Totem of Fortitude
data.description: Summons a totem that increases M. Def. by 25% and cancels petrification at a certain cycle. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes

data.name: Refined Red Dragon Blood
data.description: When used, instantly recovers some HP to yourself and to party members. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 5 minutes

data.name: Refined Blue Dragon Blood
data.description: When used, instantly recovers some MP to yourself and to party members. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 5 minutes

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nAttack power for D-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, other swords, two-handed sword, two-handed blunt, dualsword, and combat/two-handed weapons increases by 2 when enchanted. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 4. Magic power for all weapons increases by 2. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop are allowed

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nAttack power for C-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 3 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 4. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 6. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nAttack power for B-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 3 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 4. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 6. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nAttack power for A-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 4 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 5. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 8. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nDefense power for D-grade armor and accessories increases by 1. It increases by 3 after +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nDefense power for C-grade armor and accessories increases by 1. It increases by 3 after +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nDefense power for B-grade armor and accessories increases by 1. It increases by 3 after +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nDefense power for A-grade armor and accessories increases by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (B-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nAttack power for B-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 3 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 4. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 6. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot use weapons enchanted by above 16. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (A-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nAttack power for A-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 4 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 5. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 8. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Weapons enchanted by above 16 can be neither used, exchanged, nor dropped

data.name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (B-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nDefense power for B-grade armor and accessories increases by 1. It increases by 3 after +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. Cannot use armor enchanted by above 16. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Ancient Armor Enchant Crystal (A-Grade)
data.description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \\nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \\nDefense power for A-grade armor and accessories increases by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. Cannot use armor enchanted by above 16. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Divine Weapon Enchant Crystal (B-Grade)
data.description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \\nAttack power for B-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 3 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 4. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 6. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Divine Weapon Enchant Crystal (A-Grade)
data.description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \\nAttack power for A-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 4 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 5. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 8. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available\0

data.name: Angry Bunny Lure Scroll

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon of Destruction (S-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, increases P. Atk. by 5 for S-Grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and hand-to-hand combat weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 10 for bows. Increases P. Atk. by 4 for all weapons. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. increase by 2 times. When enchant fails, the item is not crystallized by the power of the goddess of destruction, and the existing enchant value is maintained. Cannot be used on weapons that are +15 or above

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor of Destruction (S-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, increases P. Def. by 1 for S-Grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. When enchant fails, the item is not crystallized by the power of the goddess of destruction, and the existing enchant value is maintained. When armor is enchanted up to +4, HP increases according to the enchant value. Cannot be used on armor that are +6 or above

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon of Destruction (A-Grade)
data.description: When enchanted, increases P. Atk. by 4 for A-Grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and hand-to-hand combat weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for bows. Increases P. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. increase by 2 times. When enchant fails, the item is not crystallized by the power of the goddess of destruction, and the existing enchant value is maintained. Cannot be used on weapons that are +15 or above

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
data.description: Increases P. Atk. by 4 for A-grade one-handed sword, one-handed blunt, dagger, spear, and other weapons when enchanted. Increases P. Atk. by 5 for two-handed sword, two-handed blunt, dualsword, and two-handed combat weapon. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for bow weapons. Increases M. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. P. Atk./M. Atk. increase by double starting at +4

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
data.description: Increases P. Def. by 1 for S-grade armor and accessories when enchanted. Increases by 3 starting from +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. When armor is enchanted above +4, HP also increases depending on the enchant value

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
data.description: Increases P. Def. by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Increases by 3 starting from +4. It can safely be enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. When armor is enchanted above +4, HP also increases depending on the enchant value

data.name: Allegra Box
data.description: There is a chance of obtaining a high-grade transformation scroll, Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon, and Scroll: Enchant Weapon

data.name: Latus Box
data.description: A Divine Weapon Enchant Crystal and a high grade Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal can be acquired at a constant rate

data.name: Top-Grade Magic Pin Cloth Belt
data.description: Weight +6000. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Top-Grade Magic Pouch Cloth Belt
data.description: Inventory Slot +18. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
data.description: Increases P. Atk. by 5 for S-grade one-handed sword, one-handed blunt, dagger, spear, and other weapons when enchanted. Increases P. Atk. by 6 for two-handed sword, two-handed blunt, dualsword, and two-handed combat weapon. Increases P. Atk. by 10 for bow weapons. Increases M. Atk. by 4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk./M. Atk. increases by double. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)

For one-piece armor, it can safely be enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0. data.name: Transformation Scroll: Ranku
data.description: Transformation scroll that transform you into Ranku for 30 minute(s). No effect if used while transformed. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Transformation Scroll: Zaken
data.description: Transformation scroll that transform you into Zaken for 30 minute(s). No effect if used while transformed. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blue Talisman - Buff Cancel
data.description: Cancels the buffs of nearby enemies upon use. Only one effect is applies when you wear two of the same talismans. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Blue Talisman - Buff Steal
data.description: Stealsthe target's abnormal status upon use. Only one effect is applies when you wear two of the same talismans. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Territory Health Recovery Potion
data.description: Recovers HP upon use. It can only be used by characters between levels 61-75. Can only be used on the battlefield. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Territory Mana Recovery Potion
data.description: Recovers MP upon use. It can only be used by characters between levels 61-75. Can only be used on the battlefield. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Territory CP Recovery Potion
data.description: Recovers CP upon use. It can only be used by characters between levels 61-75. Can only be used on the battlefield. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: 7th Anniversary Pack
data.description: Dimensional Item\\nCelebrating the Lineage II 7th anniversary, this pack contains various items that you should find useful. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be shared between characters on the same account through the Dimensional Merchant

data.name: 7th Anniversary Bonus Pack
data.description: Dimensional Item\\nCelebrating the Lineage II 7th anniversary, this bonus pack contains various items that you should find useful. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be shared between characters on the same account through the Dimensional Merchant

data.name: Hero's Treasure Chest
data.description: Dimensional Item\\nChest containing an equipment set pack which can be used for 90 days. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Dimensional Merchant

data.name: Rune of Experience Points 50%
data.description: Ancient characters that bestow a mysterious ability when possessed in the inventory. Increases acquired Exp. by 50%. The remaining period decreases even while logged off. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse

data.name: Essence of Destruction
data.description: An item filled with the essence of Shilen's followers that you have defeated

data.name: Pathfinder's Reward - Relief
data.description: A gift for adventurers who have especially provided high contributions in discovering the cause of the plague

data.name: Extra Entrance Pass - Rim Kamaloka
data.description: Entrance pass that allows you five addtional admissions. Can cancel the limit on entry if used while a limit on entry to Rim Kamaloka exists. Can only be used once per day from outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Extra Entrance Pass - Rim Kamaloka 1 Sheet Pack
data.description: Wrapped pack containing an entrance pass that lets you enter Rim Kamaloka

data.name: S84 Top-grade Weapon Chest
data.description: The chest contains 1 S84 top-grade weapon. Which one could it be?\0

data.name: Elegia Armor Chest
data.description: The chest contains 1 Elegia armor. Which one could it be?\0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon - C Grade
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0. Can be exchanged, dropped, and destroyed. Can be stored in a Private Warehouse

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon - C Grade
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Can be exchanged, dropped, and destroyed. Can be stored in a Private Warehouse

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor - C Grade
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. Increases HP according to enchant level when armor is enchanted +4 or above. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a Private Warehouse. \0

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon - D Grade
data.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 2 for D-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, two-handed combat weapons, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 2 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Can be exchanged, dropped, and destroyed. Can be stored in a Private Warehouse

data.name: Scroll: Enchant Armor - D Grade
data.description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. Increases HP according to enchant level when armor is enchanted +4 or above. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a Private Warehouse. \0

data.name: Enchantment Tool Box
data.description: A box of enchantment-related itmes. Double-click for a chance to receive an item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

data.name: Rune of Fate
data.description: Ancient characters which bestow a mysterious ability if it is possessed in the inventory. It increases acquired XP and SP by 200%. It will be removed from the inventory on June 15, 2011 when the event ends. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse
